Kirby's Pinball Land (USA, Europe).name: 卡比的彈球樂園
Kirby's Pinball Land (USA, Europe).original_desc:
Kirby's Pinball Land is a game of pinball based on the Kirby series of games, with Kirby as the ball.  In the game you have to help Kirby defeat King Dedede and the three bosses who each guard one of the Pinball Lands.  

The game is divided into three tables or Pinball Lands, each consisting of four screens, three ordinary screens, and a boss screen  If you fall off the bottom of the lowest one, you lose a life, unless you press A at the right moment to activate the springboard, which becomes harder each time.  Each screen has a variety of things to do.  The middle screen will give access to some sort of bonus game, where you must try to get as many points as you can, and can add to your bonus and bonus multiplier.  The bonus is added to your score when you lose a life, as in ordinary pinball.

The aim is to defeat each boss.  To get to the boss you must perform a task on the top ordinary screen.  The bosses themselves must be defeated by firing Kirby at them, but they will try to stop you, sometimes by temporarily de-activating one or both of the flippers.  If you defeat the boss on each table, you face Kind Dedede himself.
Kirby's Pinball Land (USA, Europe).desc:
卡比彈球樂園是一款以卡比系列遊戲為基礎，以卡比為球的彈球遊戲。在遊戲中，你必須幫助卡比擊敗帝帝帝王和三個各自守護彈球之地的三個首領。

遊戲分為三個桌子或彈珠台，每個桌子由四個屏幕、三個普通屏幕和一個老闆屏幕組成。如果你從最低的一個屏幕的底部掉下來，你就會失去一條生命，除非你在正確的時刻按A鍵激活跳板，每次都會變得更難。每個屏幕都有各種各樣的事情要做。中間的屏幕將提供某種獎金遊戲的訪問權限，您必須嘗試獲得盡可能多的積分，並且可以添加到您的獎金和獎金乘數中。當你失去生命時，獎金就會添加到你的分數中，就像普通的彈球遊戲一樣。

目標是擊敗每個老闆。要找到老闆，您必須在頂部普通屏幕上執行任務。必須通過向頭目射擊卡比來擊敗頭目本身，但他們會試圖阻止你，有時會暫時停用一個或兩個腳蹼。如果你擊敗了每張桌子上的 Boss，你將面對 Kind Dedede 本人。

Monster Max (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl).name: 怪物麥克斯
Monster Max (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl).original_desc:
A powerful human called Krond conquers the Monster Planet, bans all music and declares himself king. Max, a monster rock musician decides to fight back. In order to defeat the evil monarch, he enlists in the training course at the Mega Hero Academy.

Monster Max is a surreal isometric adventure by the same duo that created the 8-bit classic Head Over Heels. Not surprisingly it is very similar to that game in terms of control and general design, and almost identical graphically. The character moves on a bizarre landscape, where he has to collect and use objects (with either the A or B button) to accomplish mission objectives. The game starts on a training academy that serves as the mission hub. Each mission has as an entrance with a terminal and a door. By touching the terminal with the character, the mission objective and reward is displayed on the screen. The missions available can be played in any order, but Max has to pay a fee to access other levels with more advanced missions. On the top left of the screen there is a counter for the lucky stars collected. Lucky stars allow the character to touch dangerous objects once without suffering damage. Besides that are several hearts representing the number of lives. On the top right is the inventory display, showing the two objects assigned to the buttons. Hitting START while on a mission brings up a map, while pressing SELECT displays a menu with options and the password at the bottom of the screen.


The game is far larger than previous isometric adventures like Knight Lore, with over 600 more detailed locations (the double of Head Over Heels). There is a password system to save progress.
Monster Max (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It,Nl).desc:
一個名叫克朗德的強大人類征服了怪物星球，禁止所有音樂並宣布自己為王。怪物搖滾音樂家麥克斯決定反擊。為了打倒邪惡的君主，他參加了超級英雄學院的訓練課程。

《Monster Max》是一款超現實的等距冒險遊戲，由創作 8 位經典《Head Over Heels》的同一對組合創作。毫不奇怪，它在控制和總體設計方面與該遊戲非常相似，並且在圖形上幾乎相同。角色在奇異的景觀中移動，他必須收集和使用物體（使用 A 或 B 按鈕）來完成任務目標。遊戲從作為任務中心的培訓學院開始。每個任務都有一個帶有終端和門的入口。通過用角色觸摸終端，任務目標和獎勵就會顯示在屏幕上。可用的任務可以按任何順序進行，但麥克斯必須支付費用才能進入具有更高級任務的其他級別。屏幕左上方有一個收集幸運星的計數器。幸運星允許角色接觸危險物體一次而不會受到傷害。除此之外還有幾顆心，代表著生命的數量。右上角是庫存顯示，顯示分配給按鈕的兩個對象。在執行任務時按“開始”會顯示地圖，而按“選擇”則會在屏幕底部顯示一個包含選項和密碼的菜單。


該遊戲比《Knight Lore》等之前的等距冒險遊戲要大得多，有 600 多個更詳細的地點（《Head Over Heels》的兩倍）。有一個密碼系統來保存進度。

Pinball - Revenge of the 'Gator (USA, Eu.name: 彈球：鱷魚的複仇
Pinball - Revenge of the 'Gator (USA, Eu.original_desc: It's pinball....with gators!  This arcade-style title brings pinball on the go with the Game Boy!  Score as many points as possible, but don't let your ball be eaten by the 'Gator!
Pinball - Revenge of the 'Gator (USA, Eu.desc: 這是彈球......有鱷魚！這款街機風格的遊戲讓您可以通過 Game Boy 隨時隨地玩彈球遊戲！盡可能多地得分，但不要讓你的球被“鱷魚”吃掉！

Spud's Adventure (USA).name: 斯巴德的冒險
Spud's Adventure (USA).original_desc:
In Spud's Adventure the player takes the role of a potato who is tasked with rescuing the king's kidnapped daughter. To do so, he has to climb a tower consisting of many floors. There are two types of gameplay  encountered during the game: Finding the exit in a maze-like stage while shooting enemies (touching them takes away life energy and eventually leads to death) or a Soko-Ban variant. Here the player has to push blocks into certain marked positions, but they cant be pulled. In those stages the level can be reset without penalty. 
Shooting enemies awards experience points which eventually leads to a health upgrade.
The protagonist also encounters various friendly sprites who can be talked to and give hints.
Spud's Adventure (USA).desc:
在《Spud's Adventure》中，玩家扮演土豆的角色，負責營救國王被綁架的女兒。為此，他必須爬上一座由多層組成的塔。遊戲過程中有兩種類型的遊戲玩法：在迷宮般的階段中尋找出口，同時射擊敵人（觸摸他們會奪走生命能量並最終導致死亡）或 Soko-Ban 變體。在這裡，玩家必須將方塊推入某些標記位置，但無法拉動它們。在這些階段中，可以重置級別而不會受到懲罰。
射擊敵人會獎勵經驗值，最終導致生命值升級。
主角還會遇到各種友好的精靈，可以與它們交談並給予提示。

Faceball 2000 (USA).name: 面球2000
Faceball 2000 (USA).original_desc:
Faceball 2000 is a first-person shooter.  You control a H.A.P.P.Y.F.A.C.E., or Holographically Assisted Physical Pattern Yielded For Active Computerized Embarkation. The graphics consist of flat shaded corridors. Enemies are all simple geometric shapes with smiley faces on them. Although the graphics are simple, they allow for full freedom of movement, not unlike Wolfenstein 3-D.

There are two modes of play. First there is a single player mode in which your goal is to find the exit to each level.  There are 70 mazes in this mode. The second mode is the multiplayer arena. For the Game Boy: up to 4 Game Boys can be linked together in this mode.
Faceball 2000 (USA).desc:
Faceball 2000 是一款第一人稱射擊遊戲。您可以控制 H.A.P.P.Y.F.A.C.E.，或用於主動計算機化登船的全息輔助物理圖案。圖形由平坦的陰影走廊組成。敵人都是簡單的幾何形狀，上面有笑臉。雖然圖形很簡單，但它們允許完全自由的移動，就像德軍總部 3-D 一樣。

有兩種遊戲模式。首先有一個單人遊戲模式，您的目標是找到每個級別的出口。該模式中有70個迷宮。第二種模式是多人競技場。對於 Game Boy：在此模式下最多可以將 4 個 Game Boy 連接在一起。

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Fall of t.key: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Fall of the Foot Clan (USA)
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Fall of t.original_name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles : Fall of the Foot Clan
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Fall of t.name: 忍者神龜：足部部落的隕落
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Fall of t.original_desc: The Turtles' first Game Boy game is a fairly simple platforming-style game, where Leonardo, Michaelangelo, Raphael, and Donatello must battle against Krang and Shredder and save their friend April O'Neil in the process.
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Fall of t.desc: 海龜隊的第一款 Game Boy 遊戲是一款相當簡單的平台遊戲，萊昂納多、米開朗基羅、拉斐爾和多納泰羅必須與克朗和施萊德戰鬥，並在此過程中拯救他們的朋友阿普麗爾·奧尼爾。

Pokemon - Yellow Version - Special Pikac.key: Pokemon - Yellow Version - Special Pikachu Edition (USA, Europe) (CGB+SGB Enhanced)
Pokemon - Yellow Version - Special Pikac.name: 神奇寶貝黃色特別皮卡丘版
Pokemon - Yellow Version - Special Pikac.original_desc: You've finally been granted your Pokemon trainer's license, and now you're on your way to becoming the world's greatest Pokemon trainer! The shockingly cute Pikachu tags along behind you as you search the enormous world for monsters to train and evolve. Face off against Blastoise's torrential water gun. Stand strong when facing Pidgeot's stormy gust. Develop the ultimate Pokemon strategy to defeat the eight GYM leaders and become the greatest Pokemon master of all time!
Pokemon - Yellow Version - Special Pikac.desc: 你終於獲得了口袋妖怪訓練師執照，現在你正朝著成為世界上最偉大的口袋妖怪訓練師的方向前進！當你在廣闊的世界中尋找可以訓練和進化的怪物時，可愛得令人震驚的皮卡丘會跟隨在你身後。對抗 Blastoise 的洶湧水槍。面對比比鳥的狂風時，要堅強地站立。制定終極口袋妖怪策略，擊敗八位 GYM 領袖，成為有史以來最偉大的口袋妖怪大師！

F-1 Race (World) (Rev 1).name: F-1 競賽
F-1 Race (World) (Rev 1).original_desc:
F-1 Race is an arcade style racing game featuring tracks in locations all around the world.  You will find tracks from Australia, Canada, Portugal, India, Russia, and even Egypt.  Gameplay is viewed from a behind-the-car perspective using scaled bitmaps.

There are three modes of play.  First is a championship mode, where you compete in a series of races, and must place first in each to advance to the next. Second is a time trial mode, in which you try to achieve your shortest lap time around the track of your choice.  Finally, there is the multi-player mode for up to four drivers.
F-1 Race (World) (Rev 1).desc:
F-1 Race 是一款街機風格的賽車遊戲，賽道遍布世界各地。您會找到來自澳大利亞、加拿大、葡萄牙、印度、俄羅斯，甚至埃及的曲目。使用縮放位圖從車後視角查看遊戲玩法。

共有三種遊戲模式。首先是錦標賽模式，您將參加一系列比賽，並且必須在每場比賽中獲得第一名才能晉級下一場。第二種是計時賽模式，您可以嘗試在您選擇的賽道上實現最短的單圈時間。最後，還有最多可容納四名車手的多人遊戲模式。

Metroid II - Return of Samus (World).name: 银河战士II 萨姆斯的回归
Metroid II - Return of Samus (World).original_desc: This is the sequel to the very popular Metroid for the NES.  In Metroid 2, you control Samus Aran in her quest to rid the planet SR388 of the Metroid parasites.  After killing the space pirate Mother Brain in the original Metroid, Samus must take on this adventure to prevent the Metroids from multiplying throughout the galaxy.  Samus soon finds out that the Metroids have mutated, making them much more difficult to defeat.
Metroid II - Return of Samus (World).desc: 這是 NES 上非常流行的《銀河戰士》的續作。在《銀河戰士 2》中，你控制 Samus Aran 去消滅 SR388 星球上的銀河戰士寄生蟲。在殺死原版銀河戰士中的太空海盜母腦後，薩姆斯必須踏上這次冒險，以防止銀河戰士在整個銀河系繁殖。薩姆斯很快發現銀河戰士已經變異，使他們更難以擊敗。

Bugs Bunny Crazy Castle, The (USA, Europ.key: Bugs Bunny Crazy Castle, The (USA, Europe)
Bugs Bunny Crazy Castle, The (USA, Europ.name: 兔八哥瘋狂城堡
Bugs Bunny Crazy Castle, The (USA, Europ.original_desc: This game is the first in the Crazy Castle series of Bugs Bunny games for the Game Boy. The object of this game is to move Bugs around the 80 levels of a castle and collect all of the carrots. Preventing Bugs' progress are the usual Warner Bros. characters, such as Daffy Duck, Yosemite Sam, and Sylvester. Bugs himself does not have any attack moves, but you can find various objects like anvils and boxing gloves to thwart your enemies.
Bugs Bunny Crazy Castle, The (USA, Europ.desc: 該遊戲是 Game Boy 上的兔八哥遊戲《瘋狂城堡》系列中的第一款。該遊戲的目標是在城堡的 80 層中移動蟲子並收集所有胡蘿蔔。阻礙蟲蟲前進的是常見的華納兄弟角色，如達菲鴨、優勝美地山姆和西爾維斯特。蟲子本身沒有任何攻擊動作，但你可以找到各種物品，如鐵砧和拳擊手套來挫敗你的敵人。

Kingdom Crusade (USA).name: 王國遠征
Kingdom Crusade (USA).original_desc:
Different from the NES game of the same name. In the game the player takes on the role of the legendary Prince Valiant licensed from the cartoon series of the same name which is in turn based on the comic series Prince Valiant. Prince Valiant must lead Arthur's armies against the Tyrant Cynan. The goal is to capture all his castles or defeat all his armies.

A giant over-map shows the world and is divided in tiles. Each tiles has different terrain and shows whether units or castles are present in a tile. Tiles are either white or gray depending on whether Arthur or Cynan controls it.

Characters on the map can be directly controlled after being selected. This happens in a top-down view similar to The Legend of Zelda. Characters can attack and jump. Each character has different attacks. Items can be collected and the player can move freely between tiles. Moving through tiles that are occupied by the enemy conquers those territories, but the enemy can take them back at any time by moving through them again. If two enemy units meet on the same tile, combat ensues. In real time the player must try to defeat the AI opponent. This is done through dodging his attack and trying to land a blow. To conquer a castle all enemies including those in adjacent tiles must be defeated. 

It is also possible to find and collect items in the direct control mode. Items serve as power-ups that for example make the player faster or restore health points.The player can return to a castle at any time to heal completely.

The player can select the size of the world to increase or decrease the game's length. Additionally he or she and change the difficulty of the AI player (Cynan) and select a handicap for himself. It is also possible to play against another player.
Kingdom Crusade (USA).desc:
與同名的NES遊戲不同。在遊戲中，玩家扮演傳奇的英勇王子，該角色來自同名卡通系列，而該系列又基於漫畫系列英勇王子。英勇王子必須率領亞瑟的軍隊對抗暴君西南。目標是佔領他所有的城堡或擊敗他所有的軍隊。

一張巨大的大地圖顯示了世界並被劃分為瓷磚。每個圖塊都有不同的地形，並顯示圖塊中是否存在單位或城堡。瓷磚是白色或灰色，取決於亞瑟或西南控制它。

地圖上的角色被選中後可以直接控制。這發生在類似於《塞爾達傳說》的自上而下的視圖中。角色可以攻擊和跳躍。每個角色都有不同的攻擊方式。可以收集物品，玩家可以在圖塊之間自由移動。穿過被敵人佔領的地塊即可征服這些領土，但敵人可以隨時通過再次穿過它們來奪回這些領土。如果兩個敵方單位在同一個方塊上相遇，就會發生戰鬥。玩家必須實時嘗試擊敗人工智能對手。這是通過躲避他的攻擊並試圖進行打擊來完成的。要征服城堡，必須擊敗所有敵人，包括相鄰方塊中的敵人。

也可以在直接控制模式下查找和收集物品。物品可以作為能量提升，例如使玩家更快或恢復生命值。玩家可以隨時返回城堡以完全治愈。

玩家可以選擇世界的大小來增加或減少游戲的長度。此外，他或她還可以更改人工智能玩家（Cynan）的難度並為自己選擇一個障礙。也可以與其他玩家對戰。

Dexterity (USA, Europe).name: 靈巧
Dexterity (USA, Europe).original_desc:
Dexterity is a puzzle game with a 7x8 grid, each one filled with a tile or another item. The goal is to flip over all tiles within a time limit. This has to be triggered manually by pressing a button, but if there is another flipped tile on the field, all other tiles between the player's position and the other tile will flip, too. Some grids are filled with stationary blocks, moveable blocks (either pushing them normally or send them flying with a strong kick) and holes.

There are also monsters which need to be avoided. All five of them have different behaviour patterns and have the ability to reverse already flipped tiles; some of them can even push blocks or destroy tiles. The monsters can be killed by using blocks against them: pushing them over the borders of the playfield or a hole will kill them. Alternatively they also can be trapped. Killed monsters slowly respawn at pre-defined spawn points; this takes place over several phases. In the "egg" phase, it can be picked up to kill another enemy with it. Another possible weapon are stunned enemies which stood on a multi-flipped row.

When pushing blocks into a corner, they will disappear and transform into power ups, e.g. bonus points, extra time or a temporary stun of all enemies. A life is lost when an enemy is touched or the time runs out. When that happens, all flipped tiles stay flipped.
Dexterity (USA, Europe).desc:
Dexterity 是一款具有 7x8 網格的益智遊戲，每個網格都填充了一塊瓷磚或其他物品。目標是在限定時間內翻轉所有瓷磚。這必須通過按下按鈕手動觸發，但如果場上有另一個翻轉的圖塊，則玩家位置和另一個圖塊之間的所有其他圖塊也會翻轉。一些網格充滿了固定方塊、可移動方塊（正常推動它們或用強力踢將它們踢飛）和洞。

還有需要避免的怪物。他們五個人都有不同的行為模式，並且都有能力反轉已經翻轉的牌；其中一些甚至可以推動方塊或破壞瓷磚。怪物可以通過使用方塊來殺死它們：將它們推過遊戲場的邊界或一個洞就會殺死它們。或者，它們也可能被困住。被殺死的怪物會在預先定義的重生點緩慢重生；這分幾個階段進行。在“蛋”階段，可以撿起它來殺死另一個敵人。另一種可能的武器是擊暈站在多翻轉行上的敵人。

當將方塊推入角落時，它們會消失並轉變為能量提升，例如獎勵積分、額外時間或暫時擊暈所有敵人。當觸及敵人或時間耗盡時，就會失去生命。當這種情況發生時，所有翻轉的圖塊都會保持翻轉狀態。

X (Japan) (Translated).name: X (游戏)
X (Japan) (Translated).original_desc: In X the player pilots a space tank sent to another planet to defend the earth from an alien invasion. There are ten missions with different objective ranging from restoring power to a power plant, to 'seek and destroy' missions. The player can guide the tank freely across the over world, but there are enemy patrols that will open fire. The alternative is going though underground tunnels, where there are spots to replenish the tank and its weapons. The player only has a limited amount of time for each mission, and shielding for the tank. If either runs out, the game is over.
X (Japan) (Translated).desc: 在《X》中，玩家駕駛一輛太空坦克前往另一個星球，保衛地球免受外星人入侵。有十個具有不同目標的任務，從恢復發電廠的電力到“尋找並摧毀”任務。玩家可以自由駕駛坦克穿越世界，但敵人的巡邏隊會開火。另一種選擇是穿過地下隧道，那裡有補充坦克及其武器的地方。玩家每次任務的時間和坦克的防護時間都是有限的。如果其中一個耗盡，遊戲就結束。

Mystical Ninja Starring Goemon (USA) (SG.name: 五右衛門主演的神秘忍者
Mystical Ninja Starring Goemon (USA) (SG.original_desc:
Oh no!  The evil Skull King and his army of evil pirates are plotting to take over Ancient Japan!  Only Goemon, Ebisumaru, Sasuke and Yae stand in their way.  Fight your way through Gadget Castle, The Black Ship Skull, The Demon Cave and Skeleton Island as you make your way to face off against the Skull King himself.

Mystical Ninja Starring Goemon is an overhead action game with light RPG elements, similar to Link's Awakening.  Players explore towns, dungeons, castles and more, searching for treasure chests and attacking enemies.  There are also shops and inns where you can purchase items or rest to recover your strength.

At the end of each level, there is a boss waiting for you.  However, to defeat them, you must compete in a mini-game called 'The Surprise Match'.  These mini-games usually feature button-mashing of some kind or a variation on a memory match game.
Mystical Ninja Starring Goemon (USA) (SG.desc:
哦不！邪惡的骷髏王和他的邪惡海盜大軍正密謀佔領古代日本！只有五右衛門、戎丸、佐助和八重擋住了他們的路。在小工具城堡、黑船骷髏、惡魔洞穴和骷髏島中殺出一條血路，與骷髏王本人對峙。

五右衛門主演的神秘忍者是一款帶有輕RPG元素的架空動作遊戲，類似於林克的覺醒。玩家探索城鎮、地下城、城堡等，尋找寶箱並攻擊敵人。還有商店和旅館，您可以在那裡購買物品或休息以恢復體力。

每個關卡的最後，都有一個boss在等著你。然而，要擊敗他們，您必須參加名為“驚喜比賽”的迷你游戲。這些迷你游戲通常以某種按鍵搗亂或記憶匹配遊戲的變體為特色。

Amazing Penguin (USA, Europe).name: 神奇企鵝
Amazing Penguin (USA, Europe).original_desc: Amazin Penguin is a basic action game with a penguin protagonist. Each of the 40 levels consists of a number of lines which divide the playfield into squares. On those lines are switches (represented by a minus) and dots which need to be activated respectively kicked. If all lines around a square are cleared, it gets filled out and all enemies which happen to stand on one of the lines are killed (but respawn shortly after). The goal of the level is to fill all squares out. A life is lost by touching an enemy or running out of time.
Amazing Penguin (USA, Europe).desc: Amazin Penguin 是一款以企鵝為主角的基本動作遊戲。40 個級別中的每個級別均由多條線組成，這些線將游戲場地劃分為多個方塊。這些線上有開關（用減號表示）和需要分別激活的點。如果一個方塊周圍的所有線都被清除，它就會被填滿，並且所有恰好站在其中一條線上的敵人都會被殺死（但很快就會重生）。該關卡的目標是填滿所有方塊。接觸敵人或時間耗盡就會失去生命。

Mega Man - Dr. Wily's Revenge (USA).name: 洛克人：威利博士的複仇
Mega Man - Dr. Wily's Revenge (USA).original_desc:
Mega Man is the robot creation of Dr. Light, whose sworn archenemy Dr. Wily spends innumerable games trying to cause trouble with his own odd robots. As Mega Man, you run and jump through futuristic levels, shooting baddies with your blaster, and defeat each of Dr. Wily's Robot Masters. When you defeat them, you can take their ability as your own, which can provide an advantage against other types of evil robots.

In this Game Boy version, Mega Man must fight against Ice Man, Electric Man, Cut Man, and Fire Man. After he defeats those four he battles Quick Man, Heat Man, Bubble Man, and Flash Man. And after that, there's Dr. Wily's Space Node. That sounds like a lot, but passwords will save your progress, if you make it past certain milestones.
Mega Man - Dr. Wily's Revenge (USA).desc:
《洛克人》是萊特博士創造的機器人，他的死敵威利博士花了無數的遊戲時間試圖用他自己的奇怪機器人製造麻煩。作為《洛克人》，你可以奔跑跳躍，穿越未來的關卡，用爆能槍射擊壞人，並擊敗威利博士的每一位機器人大師。當你擊敗他們時，你可以將他們的能力據為己有，這可以為你對抗其他類型的邪惡機器人提供優勢。

在這個 Game Boy 版本中，洛克人必須與冰人、電人、切割人和火人戰鬥。擊敗這四個人後，他將與快人、熱火人、泡泡人和閃電人戰鬥。之後是威利博士的太空節點。這聽起來很多，但如果您超過了某些里程碑，密碼將保存您的進度。

Pokemon - Blue Version (USA, Europe) (SG.name: 神奇寶貝藍色版
Pokemon - Blue Version (USA, Europe) (SG.original_desc: After venturing alone into tall grass, a voice warns the player to stop, which is revealed to be Professor Oak, a famous Pokémon researcher. Professor Oak explains to the player that wild Pokémon may be living there, and encountering them alone can be very dangerous. He takes the player to his laboratory where the player meets Oak's grandson, a rival aspiring Pokémon Trainer. The player and the rival are both instructed to select a starter Pokémon for their travels out of Bulbasaur, Squirtle, and Charmander. Oak's Grandson will always choose the Pokémon which is stronger against the player's starting Pokémon. He will then challenge the player to a Pokémon battle with their newly obtained Pokémon, and will continue to battle the player at certain points throughout the games.
Pokemon - Blue Version (USA, Europe) (SG.desc: 獨自冒險進入高高的草叢後，一個聲音警告玩家停止，原來是著名的神奇寶貝研究員大木教授。大木教授向玩家解釋說，野生神奇寶貝可能生活在那裡，單獨遇到它們可能會非常危險。他將玩家帶到他的實驗室，在那裡玩家遇到了大木的孫子，一位有抱負的神奇寶貝訓練師的競爭對手。玩家和對手都被指示從妙蛙種子、傑尼龜和小火龍中選擇一隻起始神奇寶貝作為他們的旅行。大橡之孫總是會選擇對玩家的起始神奇寶貝更強的神奇寶貝。然後，他將挑戰玩家與新獲得的神奇寶貝進行神奇寶貝戰鬥，並將在整個遊戲的某些時刻繼續與玩家戰鬥。

Kirby's Star Stacker (USA, Europe) (SGB.name: 卡比的星星堆垛機
Kirby's Star Stacker (USA, Europe) (SGB.original_desc:
Kirby's Star Stacker is a Tetris-like puzzle game.  There are varying modes of play, such as Time Trial, Challenge and Story Mode, but the basic idea of play is the same: you must sandwich Star Blocks between two like Friend Blocks, either horizontally or vertically.  The Friend Blocks and any Star Blocks in-between are then removed from play.  Similar to Tetris, sets of blocks fall into the bin that contain any two of the following types:

Star Blocks: The most important block, as all of the game types rely on it. Sandwich these blocks between two Friend Blocks either horizontally or vertically, and they will be cleared.  The more stars you clear, the higher the score.

Friend Blocks: These blocks have pictures of Kirby's friends - Rick the Hamster, Kine the Fish, and Coo the Owl (all from Kirby's Dream Land 2) - on them. Match two of each to clear them from the screen.  Any Star Blocks between the two character blocks will also be cleared.
Kirby's Star Stacker (USA, Europe) (SGB.desc:
《星之卡比》是一款類似俄羅斯方塊的益智遊戲。有不同的遊戲模式，例如計時賽、挑戰和故事模式，但遊戲的基本思想是相同的：你必須將星星塊夾在兩個類似的朋友塊之間，無論是水平還是垂直。然後，朋友塊和中間的任何星星塊都會從遊戲中移除。與俄羅斯方塊類似，塊集落入包含以下任意兩種類型的容器中：

星塊：最重要的塊，因為所有遊戲類型都依賴它。將這些塊水平或垂直地夾在兩個朋友塊之間，它們就會被清除。清除的星星越多，分數就越高。

朋友塊：這些塊上有卡比朋友的照片 - 倉鼠瑞克、魚凱恩和貓頭鷹咕咕（全部來自《卡比的夢幻之地 2》）。每個匹配兩個即可將它們從屏幕上清除。兩個角色塊之間的任何星塊也將被清除。

Kirby's Dream Land (USA, Europe).name: 卡比的夢想之地
Kirby's Dream Land (USA, Europe).original_desc:
Dedede, King of Dream Land, is a penguin-like creature who is too gluttonous for his own good. Gathering food for his midnight feast, he got carried away and ended up taking all the food from the inhabitants of his country. One of them, a pink little guy named Kirby, decides to travel all the way to King Dedede's palace and retrieve the lost food by any means.

Kirby's Dream Land is a side-scrolling platform action game, and the first in the Kirby series. Although the protagonist appears to be a weak little marshmallow, he is actually quite powerful: he has the ability to suck up his enemies like a vacuum, and then shoot them out at other enemies.  Kirby can also swallow air and inflate himself, which allows him to fly. There are four levels in the game; no save feature is available.
Kirby's Dream Land (USA, Europe).desc:
夢境之王迪迪迪是一種像企鵝一樣的生物，他貪吃得不償失。在為他的午夜盛宴收集食物時，他得意忘形，最終從他的國家的居民那裡拿走了所有的食物。其中一個名叫卡比的粉色小傢伙決定千里迢迢前往帝帝帝王的宮殿，想盡一切辦法取回丟失的食物。

《卡比之夢境》是一款橫向捲軸平台動作遊戲，也是卡比系列中的第一款遊戲。雖然主角看上去是一個柔弱的小棉花糖，但實際上他的實力相當強大：他有能力像真空一樣吸住敵人，然後將它們射向其他敵人。卡比還可以吞下空氣並使自己膨脹，這使他能夠飛翔。遊戲有四個關卡；沒有保存功能可用。

Final Fantasy Adventure (USA).original_desc: In the Empire of Glaive, a gladiator-slave is forced to fight evil monsters controlled by the Dark Lord. But when his best friend is mortally wounded, he learns of a secret pendant which will give him great power. As the hero, you must battle your way out of the Dark Knight's castle and search through a dangerous world for the girl who has the pendant. But you discover she has been captured by the Dark Knight's men. To free her, you must find the legendary sword and fight off the Dark Knight's beasts and overlords through deserts, snowfields, lakes, forests, and caves. Are you ready for the adventure of your life?
Final Fantasy Adventure (USA).desc: 在利夫帝國，一名角斗士奴隸被迫與黑魔王控制的邪惡怪物作戰。但當他最好的朋友受了致命傷時，他得知了一個秘密吊墜，它將賦予他強大的力量。作為英雄，你必須殺出一條血路，逃離黑闇騎士的城堡，並在危險的世界中尋找擁有吊墜的女孩。但你發現她被黑闇騎士的手下俘虜了。為了釋放她，你必須找到傳說中的劍，穿越沙漠、雪地、湖泊、森林和洞穴，與黑闇騎士的野獸和霸主戰鬥。您準備好迎接人生的冒險了嗎？

Trax (USA, Europe).name: 特拉克斯
Trax (USA, Europe).original_desc:
Trax is a side scrolling shoot'em up game that put you in command of a tiny tank in some classic action levels. Pitting your tankmanship against a villainous tank master who is creating machine of destruction that has taken over the land.

You can fire from multiple angles but due to the control limitations of the Game Boy, your vehicle can only turn his turret clockwise.

There are a few power ups which increase your weapons like explosive cannonballs, multi-direction shots or anti-armor shells. 

The game also features some boss fights as you progress through the game's several different environments, forest, desert, cave, city, and tank factory.
Trax (USA, Europe).desc:
Trax 是一款橫向捲軸射擊遊戲，讓您在一些經典的動作關卡中指揮一輛小型坦克。用你的坦克技術對抗邪惡的坦克大師，他正在製造佔領這片土地的毀滅機器。

你可以從多個角度開火，但由於 Game Boy 的控制限制，你的車輛只能順時針轉動砲塔。

有一些能量提升可以增強你的武器，例如爆炸砲彈、多向射擊或反裝甲砲彈。

當您在遊戲的幾個不同環境（森林、沙漠、洞穴、城市和坦克工廠）中前進時，遊戲還包含一些頭目戰鬥。

Noobow (Japan) (Translated).name: 新的
Noobow (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
Noobow is a puzzle platformer featuring a Japanese chocolate mascot. The aim of the game is to pick up objects and use them wherever they're needed in order to stop the sun and rain from fighting each other. After using the objects in the right places they disappear to confirm that players have made the right choice.

There are 7 levels in the game and Noobow will always refuse to put his life in danger. Completing each level is done by reaching the goal and assisting the characters that are waiting there.
Noobow (Japan) (Translated).desc:
Noobow 是一款以日本巧克力吉祥物為特色的平台解謎遊戲。遊戲的目的是撿起物體並在需要的地方使用它們，以阻止陽光和雨水互相爭鬥。在正確的位置使用物品後，它們就會消失，以確認玩家做出了正確的選擇。

遊戲有 7 個關卡，Noobow 永遠不會讓自己的生命處於危險之中。通過達到目標並協助等待在那裡的角色來完成每個級別。

Out of Gas (USA).name: 沒油了
Out of Gas (USA).original_desc: You are cruising around in outer space when suddenly you are out of gas. The game is played from an top-down view. The gameplay is not very far from Asteroids, where you are the pilot of a ship and must complete level after level. For each level your objective is to get gas by shoot a the G-signs scattered around the levels. In some levels you have to shooting the signs in a special order. The levels must be completed in time, and you also have to watch out for enemy fire.
Out of Gas (USA).desc: 當你在外太空巡航時，突然沒了汽油。遊戲是從自上而下的視角進行的。遊戲玩法與《小行星》相差不遠，你是一艘飛船的飛行員，必須完成一個又一個的關卡。對於每個關卡，您的目標是通過射擊散佈在關卡周圍的 G 標誌來獲取汽油。在某些關卡中，您必須按照特殊順序射擊標誌。關卡必須及時完成，你還必須提防敵人的火力。

Mole Mania (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhanced).name: 鼴鼠狂熱
Mole Mania (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhanced).original_desc:
Muddy Mole's wife and seven kids have been kidnapped by the evil farmer, Jinbei!  It's up to you to help Muddy solve the many puzzles of Jinbei Land.  Snatch all of Jinbei's cabbages in every level, and if you get stuck, dig underground and create your own secret underground paths.  A word of warning, however - Jinbei has got his best goons guarding your family, so you'd better watch out!

Mole Mania plays from an overhead perspective.  Although in each room you have to destroy all the foes to progress, the game is much more puzzle-oriented than it is towards action.  It is quite common in later levels to get yourself 'stuck', which can be fixed by leaving and returning to the screen to reset the puzzle.  One of the game's clever 'hooks' is that players can dig underground in each stage to find a completely different map than they do above ground, which can be used to get through otherwise impassable terrain.

The game also features a two player mode, where one player is Muddy, and the other is Jinbei.  Muddy must swipe as many cabbages as possible, and Jinbei must stop him.  At the end of the round, players swap roles, and then the player who got the most cabbages wins.
Mole Mania (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhanced).desc:
泥鼴鼠的妻子和七個孩子被邪惡的農民金杯綁架了！你需要幫助 Muddy 解決金杯之地的眾多謎題。在每個關卡中搶奪甚平的所有捲心菜，如果你陷入困境，請挖掘地下並創建自己的秘密地下路徑。不過，請注意——甚平有他最好的打手保護你的家人，所以你最好小心！

《鼴鼠狂熱》以俯視視角進行遊戲。儘管在每個房間中你都必須消滅所有敵人才能前進，但遊戲更偏向解謎而非動作。在後面的關卡中，讓自己“卡住”是很常見的，這可以通過離開並返回屏幕來重置謎題來解決。遊戲的一個巧妙的“亮點”是，玩家可以在每個階段挖掘地下，找到與地面完全不同的地圖，這可以用來穿過原本無法通行的地形。

遊戲還設有兩人模式，其中一名玩家是穆迪，另一名玩家是金杯。泥巴必須盡可能多地砍掉白菜，甚平必須阻止他。回合結束時，玩家交換角色，然後獲得最多捲心菜的玩家獲勝。

Mario's Picross (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhan.name: 馬里奧的繪圖方塊
Mario's Picross (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhan.original_desc:
Nonograms are number puzzles where logic is used to find the solution. Clues are provided along the sides of the playfield grid, telling the player how many squares to fill in each row and column. With logic the player can figure out exactly which squares of the grid to fill. The thinking process is similar to solving Sudoku puzzles.

Mario's Picross (from PICture CROSSword) is Nintendo's take on Nonograms. In this game, Mario takes on the role of an archaeologist who chisels away the squares in each playfield. The result is a small picture. There are 256 different puzzles to solve, divided into four courses with increasing difficulty level.
Mario's Picross (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhan.desc:
Nonograms 是使用邏輯來尋找解決方案的數字謎題。遊戲場地網格的兩側提供了線索，告訴玩家每行和每列需要填充多少個方格。通過邏輯，玩家可以準確地找出要填充網格的哪些方格。思考過程類似於解決數獨謎題。

Mario's Picross（來自 PICture CROSSword）是任天堂對 Nonograms 的演繹。在這款遊戲中，馬里奧扮演考古學家的角色，在每個遊戲場地上鑿掉方塊。結果是一張小圖片。有 256 個不同的謎題需要解決，分為四個難度級別逐漸增加的課程。

Motocross Maniacs (USA).name: 越野摩托車狂人
Motocross Maniacs (USA).original_desc:
Motocross Maniacs is a side-scrolling racing game with extremely perilous courses. You maneuver your rider through many jumps, loops, and mud hazards to achieve a record time. To assist you there are several power ups that give you more time to race, more nitro boosts, and more top speed.

The main game is a solo affair. You attempt to complete the course before time runs out. You can also race one-on-one against the computer or against a friend via the link cable.
Motocross Maniacs (USA).desc:
Motocross Maniacs 是一款橫向捲軸賽車遊戲，賽道極其危險。你操縱你的騎手通過許多跳躍、循環和泥漿障礙，以達到創紀錄的時間。為了幫助您，有幾種能力提升可以讓您有更多的比賽時間、更多的硝基提升和更高的最高速度。

主要遊戲是單人遊戲。您嘗試在時間用完之前完成課程。您還可以通過連接線與計算機或朋友進行一對一的比賽。

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II - Back f.key: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II - Back from the Sewers (USA)
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II - Back f.original_name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II : Back from the Sewers
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II - Back f.name: 忍者神龜 II : 從下水道回來
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II - Back f.original_desc:
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II: Back from the Sewers is the second Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles for the Game Boy. It is a sequel to Fall of the Foot Clan.

This time, Splinter was captured by Krang. Leonardo, Michelangelo, Raphael and Donatello go in search of their master until arriving at Krang and Shredder.
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II - Back f.desc:
《忍者神龜 II：從下水道回來》是 Game Boy 的第二部《忍者神龜》。這是《足部部落的隕落》的續集。

這一次，斯普林特被克朗抓獲。列奧納多、米開朗基羅、拉斐爾和多納泰羅尋找他們的主人，直到到達克朗和施萊德。

Mega Man IV (USA).name: 洛克人 IV
Mega Man IV (USA).original_desc:
In the year 20XX...

Dr. Wily has broken into the local Robot Museum and has stolen the bodies of his previously destroyed Robot Masters, and now has brought them back for revenge against Mega Man! What's worse, Wily plans on using a massive laser cannon from outer space to blast Earth to dust!

Mega Man must team up with his friends to stop Dr. Wily before Earth is destroyed!

Mega Man IV contains elements of Mega Man 4 and 5 (NES) and is a Game Boy exclusive.
Mega Man IV (USA).desc:
20XX年...

威利博士闖入了當地的機器人博物館，偷走了他之前被摧毀的機器人大師的屍體，現在又將他們帶回來，向洛克人復仇！更糟糕的是，威利計劃使用來自外太空的巨型激光炮將地球炸成塵埃！

洛克人必須與他的朋友們聯手，在地球被毀滅之前阻止威利博士！

《洛克人 IV》包含《洛克人 4》和《洛克人 5》（NES）的元素，並且是 Game Boy 獨占的。

Tail 'Gator (USA, Europe).name: 尾鱷魚
Tail 'Gator (USA, Europe).original_desc: Tail Gator on Gameboy is a platform game in which you play as a crocodile moving through environments full of monsters. You'll only be able to jump and tail swipe your enemies, however if you collect enough "P" symbols you will be able to hit from a distance. Many chests are scattered around, it's up to you to open them to increase your score!
Tail 'Gator (USA, Europe).desc: Gameboy 上的 Tail Gator 是一款平台遊戲，您在其中扮演鱷魚，在充滿怪物的環境中移動。你只能跳躍和尾部攻擊你的敵人，但是如果你收集了足夠的“P”符號，你將能夠從遠處擊中敵人。周圍散佈著許多寶箱，由你來打開它們來增加你的分數！

DuckTales 2 (USA).name: 迪士尼鴨子故事 2
DuckTales 2 (USA).original_desc:
While in the basement of Uncle Scrooge's mansion, Huey, Dewey and Louie discover an old piece of paper.  When they show it to Uncle Scrooge, he recognizes it as part of his great, great Uncle Fergus McDuck's legendary treasure map!  With the remaining parts of the map hidden around the world, it's up to Uncle Scrooge to find them and discover Fergus McDuck's secret treasure!

Duck Tales 2 is the sequel to the NES and Game Boy game, Duck Tales.  Based on the Disney cartoon of the same name, players control Uncle Scrooge as he searches the globe for massive amounts of wealth while trying to discover hidden pieces of the map.

Scrooge's main method of attack is his cane - by jumping in the air and holding the B Button, the cane turns into a pogo stick, allowing players to jump onto most enemies' heads and cross dangerous terrain like spikes with ease.  By pushing up against a wall or an object, Scrooge will whack his cane like a golf club, either sending the object flying or occasionally revealing secret items.  New to Duck Tales 2 is the ability to push and pull certain objects with the cane after hitting them.

Familiar faces such as Huey, Dewey and Louie, Webby, Mrs. Beakley, and Launchpad McQuack all turn up to lend a hand.  Scrooge will even bump into the crazy inventor, Gyro Gearloose, who will improve Scrooge's cane so that he can access even more secret areas.
DuckTales 2 (USA).desc:
在史克魯奇叔叔豪宅的地下室裡，休伊、杜威和路易發現了一張舊紙。當他們把它拿給史克魯奇叔叔看時，他認出這是他偉大的弗格斯·麥克老鴨叔叔傳奇藏寶圖的一部分！地圖的其餘部分隱藏在世界各地，史克魯奇叔叔必須找到它們並發現弗格斯·麥克老鴨的秘密寶藏！

《Duck Tales 2》是 NES 和 Game Boy 遊戲《Duck Tales》的續作。改編自同名迪士尼卡通片，玩家控制史克魯奇叔叔在全球範圍內尋找大量財富，同時試圖發現地圖上隱藏的碎片。

斯克魯奇的主要攻擊方式是他的手杖——在空中跳躍並按住B按鈕，手杖就會變成彈簧單高蹺，讓玩家可以跳到大多數敵人的頭上，輕鬆穿越尖刺等危險地形。通過推向牆壁或物體，斯克魯奇會像高爾夫球桿一樣敲擊手杖，要么使物體飛走，要么偶爾洩露秘密物品。Duck Tales 2 的新增功能是能夠在擊中某些物體後用拐杖推拉它們。

休伊、杜威和路易、韋比、比克利夫人和 Launchpad McQuack 等熟悉的面孔都會前來提供幫助。斯克魯奇甚至會遇到瘋狂的發明家陀螺·吉爾魯斯，他將改進斯克魯奇的手杖，以便他能夠進入更多的秘密區域。

Pop'n TwinBee (Europe).name: Pop'n TwinBee
Pop'n TwinBee (Europe).original_desc:
Another top-down shooter in the Twinbee "cute'em up" franchise.

Heroes Light and Pastel decide to go out and help a young maiden bring sense back to her scientist father, who apparently has bumped his head and transformed into a evil mastermind that seeks world domination.

As the other games in the series Pop'n Twinbee is a vertically-scrolling arcade shooter in which you and a friend get behind the controls of Twinbee and Winbee, the cutest starfighters ever created, and try to clear stage after stage of enemies with your  weapons. Being a console original instead of a port, Pop'n features a number of additions to the gameplay mechanics, including an energy bar, eight difficulty levels and a handicap feature when playing with a friend (which makes most enemies target one fighter instead of the other).

The upgrade system remains consistent with the series's: you shoot colored bells which give different power-ups when collected, including multiple shots, "options" and shield energy. Also when correctly powered-up both fighters can join and perform powerful team-up moves.
Pop'n TwinBee (Europe).desc:
Twinbee“cute'em up”系列中的另一款俯視角射擊遊戲。

英雄光和帕斯特決定出去幫助一名年輕少女讓她的科學家父親恢復理智，她的科學家父親顯然已經撞到了頭，變成了一個尋求統治世界的邪惡策劃者。

與該系列中的其他遊戲一樣，Pop'n Twinbee 是一款垂直捲軸街機射擊遊戲，您和朋友可以控制有史以來最可愛的星際戰鬥機 Twinbee 和 Winbee，並嘗試用武器清除一個又一個的敵人。作為主機原創而非移植，Pop'n 在遊戲機制上添加了許多附加功能，包括能量條、八個難度級別以及與朋友一起玩時的障礙功能（這使得大多數敵人瞄準一名戰士而不是另一名戰士）。

升級系統與系列保持一致：你發射彩色鈴鐺，收集後會提供不同的能量提升，包括多次射擊、“選項”和護盾能量。此外，當正確啟動時，兩名戰士都可以加入並執行強大的團隊動作。

Mercenary Force (USA, Europe).name: 僱傭軍
Mercenary Force (USA, Europe).original_desc:
Mercenary Force is an unconventional shoot'em up set in Japan's Edo period and inspired by Japanese history and mythology. When Japan is invaded by the minions of a dark lord, the shogun sets out to hire the best warriors in the land to combat the enemy. 

Players start with 5000 yen and must begin by hiring their mercenaries. The team has four slots and can be recruited from five different character types (servant, ninja, monk, samurai and mystic) in any combination (including more than one of any character). The characters differ in hiring price, starting health, weapons (amount of projectiles, speed and direction), and their special attack.

The game consists of six levels, seen from an angled top-down/side-view perspective, with the screen scrolling automatically to the right. The mercenaries must shoot hordes of enemies to get to the next level, including several bosses. The mercenaries can change their formation between four different options: a vertical line, a diamond shape, a square shape and a horizontal arrowhead formation. It is also possible to switch the character in the lead position, leading to a large variety of tactical options. The hit points of each team member are counted individually, so if one is killed the remaining ones can fight on. Besides their standard weapon, each character also has a special suicide attack, triggered by pressing both buttons at the same time. These are usually highly devastating attacks, but the monk's power actually allows the group to skip ahead through a large part of the level.

Killed enemies drop coins of 10 yen in value that disappear after a short while if not picked up. The money reserve is used in a matter of ways: between stages, new recruits can be hired to replace fallen fighters. There are also various buildings in the levels that allow the spending of money. Cafes offer various items that restore or increase health and, in some levels, can change the character class of the team leader. There is a fortune-reading at a temple which makes it possible to recruit a hidden character, and the possibility to resurrect fallen comrades at a daibutsu. Only temples don't cost money and offer healing for free.
Mercenary Force (USA, Europe).desc:
《僱傭兵》是一款以日本江戶時代為背景的非傳統射擊遊戲，其靈感源自日本歷史和神話。當日本遭到黑暗領主的爪牙入侵時，幕府將軍著手僱傭該國最優秀的戰士來對抗敵人。

玩家從 5000 日元開始，必須從僱傭僱傭兵開始。該團隊有四個槽位，可以從五種不同的角色類型（僕人、忍者、僧侶、武士和神秘主義者）中以任意組合（包括多於一個的任何角色）進行招募。這些角色在僱傭價格、起始生命值、武器（射彈數量、速度和方向）以及特殊攻擊方面有所不同。

遊戲由六個關卡組成，從有角度的自上而下/側視圖視角觀看，屏幕自動向右滾動。僱傭兵必須射擊成群的敵人才能進入下一關，其中包括幾個頭目。僱傭兵可以在四種不同的選項之間改變陣型：垂直線、菱形、方形和水平箭頭隊形。還可以切換主角位置的角色，從而帶來多種戰術選擇。每個團隊成員的生命值都是單獨計算的，所以如果一個人被殺，剩下的人可以繼續戰鬥。除了標準武器外，每個角色還有特殊的自殺式攻擊，通過同時按下兩個按鈕來觸發。這些通常是極具破壞性的攻擊，但僧侶的力量實際上可以讓團隊跳過大部分關卡。

被殺死的敵人會掉落價值 10 日元的硬幣，如果不撿起，這些硬幣會在短時間內消失。資金儲備有多種使用方式：在各個階段之間，可以僱用新兵來代替陣亡的戰士。關卡中還有各種允許花錢的建築物。咖啡館提供各種可以恢復或增加生命值的物品，並且在某些級別上可以改變團隊領導者的角色類別。在寺廟裡進行算命，可以招募隱藏角色，並可以在大佛中復活倒下的戰友。只有寺廟不花錢並且免費提供治療。

Kirby's Dream Land 2 (USA, Europe) (SGB.name: 卡比的夢幻之地2
Kirby's Dream Land 2 (USA, Europe) (SGB.original_desc:
The lovable Kirby returns to the Game Boy! This time the bridges connecting the rainbow bridges have disappeared and King Dedede is to blame as always...or is he? The evil Dark Matter has him under his control and plans to turn Dream Land into a dark world. Kirby's goal is get the fabled rainbow sword and defeat him!

Gameplay consists of a platform game. Kirby is like no other platform character of its time because he can fly with no power-ups, and he can swallow enemies and get their powers. In addition to that, Kirby can now team up with his friends: Rick the hamster, Kine the fish, and Coo the owl. Each team-up has it's advantages and disadvantages, but Kirby can still swallow enemies, making more different powers available depending on the power/friend combination.
Kirby's Dream Land 2 (USA, Europe) (SGB.desc:
可愛的卡比重返 Game Boy！這次連接彩虹橋的橋樑消失了，迪迪迪國王一如既往地應該受到責備……或者是他？邪惡的暗物質控制了他，併計劃將夢境變成一個黑暗的世界。卡比的目標是獲得傳說中的彩虹劍並擊敗他！

遊戲玩法包括平台遊戲。卡比與當時的其他平台角色不同，因為他可以在沒有能量提升的情況下飛行，並且他可以吞噬敵人並獲得他們的力量。除此之外，卡比現在可以與他的朋友們組隊：倉鼠瑞克、魚凱恩和貓頭鷹咕咕。每個團隊都有其優點和缺點，但卡比仍然可以吞噬敵人，根據力量/朋友組合提供更多不同的力量。

Lock 'n' Chase (World).name: 鎖定與追逐
Lock 'n' Chase (World).original_desc:
There's money to be had, and it's waiting to be nabbed. Be an ace in Lock'N Chase.

This classic arcade game invites you to play as a thief who's trying to score big by collecting his weight in gold. Duck in and out of alleys while scooping up coins along the way. Maybe you'll get lucky and find some extra treasure. But being on the wrong side of the law is never easy, as the police are hot on your tail. If you think they're coming too close, try using a sliding door or power-up items to block their chase.

Think you can make a clean getaway? Test your skills in Lock'N Chase.
Lock 'n' Chase (World).desc:
有錢可賺，正等待著被奪取。成為 Lock'N Chase 中的王牌。

這款經典的街機遊戲邀請您扮演一名小偷，試圖通過收集與自己同等重量的黃金來獲得大筆獎金。進出小巷，同時沿途撿起硬幣。也許你會很幸運並找到一些額外的寶藏。但觸犯法律絕非易事，因為警察會緊追不捨。如果您認為他們離得太近，請嘗試使用滑動門或強化物品來阻止他們的追逐。

您認為您可以乾淨利落地逃脫嗎？在 Lock'N Chase 中測試您的技能。

Dr. Franken II (USA, Europe) (En,Fr,De,E.name: 弗蘭肯博士二世
Dr. Franken II (USA, Europe) (En,Fr,De,E.original_desc:
It is several years after the death of Dr. Von Frankenbone, and things around the castle are starting to fall apart. The electricity bill hasn't been paid in some time, and now Franky need to find the cash to pay it off. The locals have trapped Franky inside the late doctor's private manor, and you (as Franky) must escape and piece together the golden tablet depicting your beautiful girlfriend Bitsy to pay the bills.

Dr. Franken II is a side-scrolling platformer what places you in control of a Frankenstein-like character named Franky. The goal is collect different objects within different levels to put something back together. In order for Franky to recharge his health, you need to find the parts to fix the electricity machine that does it. You will also be taken to exotic locales such as Egypt and the bottom of the ocean to find pieces of Bitsy's golden tablet.

Like its predecessor, there are many trap doors, monsters, and other obstacles that need to be overcome. Keys are needed to unlock new areas of the game, which can be found in the far reaches of the level.
Dr. Franken II (USA, Europe) (En,Fr,De,E.desc:
馮·弗蘭肯伯恩博士去世幾年後，城堡周圍的一切開始分崩離析。電費已經有一段時間沒有支付了，現在弗蘭奇需要找到現金來還清。當地人將弗蘭基困在已故醫生的私人莊園內，你（作為弗蘭基）必須逃脫並拼湊出描繪你美麗女友比西的金色石碑來支付賬單。

《弗蘭肯博士 II》是一款橫向捲軸平台遊戲，讓你控制一個名叫弗蘭基的類似弗蘭肯斯坦的角色。目標是收集不同關卡中的不同物體，將某些東西重新組合在一起。為了讓弗蘭奇恢復健康，你需要找到零件來修理電機。您還將被帶到異國他鄉，例如埃及和海底，尋找比西的金碑碎片。

和它的前身一樣，有許多活板門、怪物和其他需要克服的障礙。需要鑰匙來解鎖遊戲的新區域，這些區域可以在關卡的最深處找到。

Blaster Master Boy (USA).name: 爆破大師男孩
Blaster Master Boy (USA).original_desc: Radioactive energy is destroying every living thing on Earth. Only Jason can stop it. And this time, he can't use his super-equipped car. He's gotta do it alone. Armed with blistering lanterns, mega-power hyper-bombs and skull-rattling super-bombs, Jason must blaze a dizzying path deep down beneath the surface of the planet to seek out the Mutant Bosses - then destroy them! Can you help Jason fight his way to the center of the Earth? He's running out of light. He's running out of time. And only you can make sure Jason blasts his enemies - before they blast him.
Blaster Master Boy (USA).desc: 放射性能量正在摧毀地球上的一切生物。只有傑森可以阻止它。而這一次，他也不能使用他的超級裝備汽車了。他必須獨自完成這件事。傑森配備了起泡的燈籠、超大威力的超級炸彈和令人頭骨震顫的超級炸彈，他必須在地球表面深處開闢一條令人眼花繚亂的道路，尋找變種人大佬 - 然後消滅他們！你能幫助傑森殺出一條血路，到達地心嗎？他快沒光了。他的時間不多了。只有你才能確保傑森在敵人炸毀他之前炸毀他的敵人。

Donkey Kong Land 2 (USA, Europe) (SGB En.name: 大金剛樂園2
Donkey Kong Land 2 (USA, Europe) (SGB En.original_desc:
In Donkey Kong Land 2, Donkey Kong has been captured by the evil Kaptain K. Rool, leaving it up to Diddy and Dixie Kong to save the day in this side-scrolling adventure. Fortunately, they will have plenty of help along the way from their friends.

Like the original Donkey Kong Land, all the graphics in this game are pre-rendered three dimensional models. The gameplay is also similar, with platform jumping and banana collecting remaining a core part of the game experience.
Donkey Kong Land 2 (USA, Europe) (SGB En.desc:
在《大金剛樂園 2》中，大金剛被邪惡的 K. K. Rool 船長抓獲，迪迪和迪克西·孔必須在這場橫版捲軸冒險中拯救世界。幸運的是，他們一路上會得到朋友的大量幫助。

與原版《Donkey Kong Land》一樣，該遊戲中的所有圖形都是預先渲染的三維模型。遊戲玩法也很相似，平台跳躍和香蕉收集仍然是遊戲體驗的核心部分。

Golf (World).name: 高爾夫球
Golf (World).original_desc: Golf features two challenging 18 hole courses where players are able to play a round of golf, and allows players to choose a club, adjust stance and control the swing. The game features three alternating views; an overhead long-range view of the entire hole, an overhead medium-range view from the ball's current location, and an overhead close-range view of the green. Gameplay modes include 1 player, or 2 player play with a link cable.
Golf (World).desc: 高爾夫設有兩個具有挑戰性的 18 洞球場，球員可以在這裡打一輪高爾夫球，並允許球員選擇球桿、調整站姿和控制揮桿。遊戲具有三種交替的視圖；整個洞的俯視遠景、球當前位置的俯視中景以及果嶺的俯視近景。遊戲模式包括 1 名玩家或 2 名玩家使用連接線進行遊戲。

Tiny Toon Adventures 2 - Montana's Movie.key: Tiny Toon Adventures 2 - Montana's Movie Madness (USA, Europe)
Tiny Toon Adventures 2 - Montana's Movie.original_name: Tiny Toon Adventures 2 : Montana's Movie Madness
Tiny Toon Adventures 2 - Montana's Movie.name: 小小卡通歷險記 2：蒙大拿州的電影瘋狂
Tiny Toon Adventures 2 - Montana's Movie.original_desc:
A brand new movie theater has just opened up in Acme Acres! But, it's unfortunately owned by none other than resident spoiled rich brat of Acme Acres, Montana Max, and he's decided to run movies in which he's the hero, and Buster Bunny is his arch-nemesis! Of course, Buster can't sit too still on that, so he's going to try and enter the movies and change the plots so Montana can't win at his dirty scheme of ruining Buster's reputation!

It's all up to Buster! If he manages to change all four flicks Monty has cooked up, he can try to face Montana rabbit-to...well, spoiled kid, in a final showdown! Time to get rolling!
Tiny Toon Adventures 2 - Montana's Movie.desc:
一家全新的電影院剛剛在 Acme Acres 開業！但是，不幸的是，它的主人不是別人，正是 Acme Acres 居民被寵壞的富家子蒙大拿·麥克斯 (Montana Max)，他決定經營以他為英雄的電影，而巴斯特兔子是他的宿敵！當然，巴斯特不能坐視不理，所以他要嘗試進入電影並改變情節，這樣蒙大拿就不能贏得他破壞巴斯特聲譽的骯髒計劃！

一切都取決於巴斯特！如果他能成功改變蒙蒂炮製的所有四部電影，他就可以嘗試在最後的對決中面對蒙大拿兔子……好吧，被寵壞的孩子！是時候開始滾動了！

Spanky's Quest (USA).name: 斯潘奇的任務
Spanky's Quest (USA).original_desc:
Spanky's Quest is a game about a monkey who decides to go on a picnic.  While on his way through the forest he see's a witch in the sky and out of nowhere bricks begin to make a tower around the area Spanky is in.  The witch challenges Spanky to come to the final tower and she will free him but before she flies away she turns the fruits in his knapsack into living fruit monsters.  Unknowingly, she drops a magic ball which agrees to help Spanky out on his quest.

The object of the game is to get through all six of the towers which consist of 10 levels as well as a boss battle.  In order to proceed to the next level, you must acquire the amount of keys the locked door requires.  Keys are found lying around until a monster picks them up in which case you must use your ball on them to get it.  The ball has for different attacks: baseball, soccer ball, volleyball and basketball.  In order to attain a stronger ball, the ball must be bounced on Spankey's head.  Spanky also gets different hats which give him a specific power until he loses it or the level ends.
Spanky's Quest (USA).desc:
Spanky's Quest 是一款關於一隻猴子決定去野餐的遊戲。在穿過森林的路上，他看到空中有一個女巫，不知從什麼地方冒出來的磚塊開始在 Spanky 所在的區域周圍建造一座塔。女巫向 Spanky 發起挑戰，要求他來到最後一座塔，她會釋放他，但在她飛走之前，她將他背包裡的水果變成了活生生的水果怪物。不知不覺中，她掉落了一個魔法球，魔法球同意幫助斯潘基完成他的任務。

遊戲的目標是通過所有六座塔樓，共 10 個關卡以及一場 Boss 戰。為了進入下一關，您必須獲得鎖著的門所需的鑰匙數量。鑰匙被發現躺在周圍，直到怪物撿起它們，在這種情況下，你必須使用你的球來獲取它。球有不同的攻擊方式：棒球、足球、排球和籃球。為了獲得更強的球，球必須彈到斯潘基的頭上。Spanky 還獲得了不同的帽子，這些帽子賦予他特定的力量，直到他失去它或關卡結束。

Tetris Blast (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhanced.name: 俄羅斯方塊爆炸
Tetris Blast (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhanced.original_desc:
In this version of Tetris, the basic 'clear the line of puzzle blocks' element is still here, but with an added twist: inside the many block shapes are bombs. By linking the bombs while clearing the play field as usual (creating a line of blocks), more of the field is cleared as the bombs explode. 

The usual gameplay modes are included, i.e. challenge, clear as many lines as possible, time trial, clear as many lines as possible before time runs out and 2 player battle.
Tetris Blast (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhanced.desc:
在這個版本的俄羅斯方塊中，基本的“清除拼圖塊的線條”元素仍然存在，但有一個額外的變化：在許多塊形狀內都有炸彈。通過像往常一樣在清理遊戲場地時連接炸彈（創建一排方塊），當炸彈爆炸時，更多的場地會被清理。

包括常見的遊戲模式，即挑戰、盡可能多地清除線、計時賽、在時間用完之前盡可能多地清除線和2人對戰。

Bionic Commando (USA).name: 仿生突擊隊
Bionic Commando (USA).original_desc:
You play a soldier with a bionic arm that extends and contracts.  Your arm allows you to grab on to fixed objects to swing around and climb up levels -- no jumping allowed! The arm also grabs opponents and pull them towards you.

Your mission is to infiltrate the enemy fortress, find your missing comrade, "Super Joe", and take out the evil leader, "Generalissimo Kilt", of the invading force that has been attacking your people for the last 2 years.

After most levels the Bionic Commando will recieve items. Often these items are required to successfully complete other levels. Additionally, each level will require a different colored communicator in order to make sense of message traffic
Bionic Commando (USA).desc:
你扮演一名士兵，擁有可伸縮的仿生手臂。你的手臂可以讓你抓住固定的物體來擺動和攀爬——不允許跳躍！手臂還會抓住對手並將他們拉向您。

你的任務是潛入敵人的堡壘，找到你失踪的戰友“超級喬”，並消滅過去兩年來一直攻擊你的人民的入侵部隊的邪惡領袖“基爾特大元帥”。

在大多數級別後，仿生突擊隊將收到物品。通常需要這些項目才能成功完成其他級別。此外，每個級別都需要不同顏色的通信器，以便理解消息流量

Rolan's Curse II (USA).name: 羅蘭的詛咒2
Rolan's Curse II (USA).original_desc:
King Barius is back for revenge! From the flaming depths of evil, he returns, bringing forth legions of monsters more vicious than anything the world has ever known!

Gather your wits and grab your sword! Team up with a band of worthy companions to search for treasure and magic. Then prepare yourself for a savage battle against the dreaded monarch of evil!
- Control up to 4 characters.
- Battery back-up feature lets you save your game anytime.
- Amazing Auto-Map feature will keep you from getting lost.
- Collect the fabled Fairy Wings and teleport anywhere in the game!!
Rolan's Curse II (USA).desc:
巴里烏斯國王回來報仇了！他從邪惡的火焰深處歸來，帶來了比世界上任何事物都更加邪惡的怪物軍團！

聚集你的智慧，拿起你的劍！與一群值得尊敬的伙伴合作尋找寶藏和魔法。然後準備好與可怕的邪惡君主進行一場野蠻的戰鬥吧！
- 最多控制 4 個角色。
- 電池備份功能可讓您隨時保存遊戲。
- 驚人的自動地圖功能將讓您不會迷路。
- 收集傳說中的仙女之翼並傳送到遊戲中的任何地方！

Ghostbusters II (USA, Europe).name: 捉鬼敢死隊 II
Ghostbusters II (USA, Europe).original_desc:
Loosely based on the movie of the same name, Ghostbusters II sees Virgo the Carpathian appear in New York city. He captures Diana's baby and it is up to the Ghostbusters to get him back. In order to accomplish this, the Ghostbusters: Igon, Ray, Peter and Winston, must chase Virgo through the courtrooms, the sewers, the apartments, the underground and the art museum.

Ghostbusters II is a top-view action game based off of New Ghostbusters II (the second Ghostbusters II license on NES) but with enough differences to be unique. Players begin by choosing two of the four ghostbusters, who all play the exact same. The first one selected is controlled by the player directly and carries a proton pack, the second ghostbuster is follows the first and carries the ghost trap. The objective of each level is to capture a predefined number of ghosts before the timer expires. The player moves up, down, left and right. One button will fire the proton gun directly in front of the first ghostbuster, stunning any ghosts. The second button will toss the trap directly in front of the second ghostbuster, trapping any stunned ghosts. While exploring the levels, any of the 2 remaining ghostbusters (as well as the ghostbusters' accountant Louis) not currently being used will occasionally show up. Touching them will provide power-ups (and often swap with a selected Ghostbuster) including vacuum guns, instant traps and invulnerability.
Ghostbusters II (USA, Europe).desc:
大致改編自同名電影，《捉鬼敢死隊 II》中，喀爾巴阡山處女座出現在紐約市。他抓住了戴安娜的孩子，捉鬼敢死隊必須把他救回來。為了實現這一目標，捉鬼敢死隊：伊貢、雷、彼得和溫斯頓必須在法庭、下水道、公寓、地下和藝術博物館中追逐處女座。

《捉鬼敢死隊 II》是一款基於《新捉鬼敢死隊 II》（NES 上的第二個《捉鬼敢死隊 II》許可）的俯視角動作遊戲，但有足夠的差異使其獨一無二。玩家首先從四個捉鬼敢死隊中選擇兩個，他們的玩法都完全相同。選擇的第一個由玩家直接控制並攜帶質子包，第二個捉鬼敢死隊跟隨第一個並攜帶幽靈陷阱。每個級別的目標是在計時器到期之前捕獲預定數量的幽靈。玩家向上、向下、向左、向右移動。按一下按鈕即可在第一個捉鬼敢死隊的正前方發射質子槍，擊暈任何鬼魂。第二個按鈕會將陷阱直接扔到第二個捉鬼敢死隊前面，困住任何被擊暈的鬼魂。在探索關卡時，當前未使用的剩餘 2 個捉鬼敢死隊（以及捉鬼敢死隊的會計師路易斯）中的任何一個都會偶爾出現。觸摸它們將提供能量提升（並且通常與選定的捉鬼敢死隊交換），包括真空槍、即時陷阱和刀槍不入。

Booby Boys (Japan) (Translated).name: 鰹鳥男孩
Booby Boys (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
Gameplay in Booby Boys is very simple. The goal of the level is to collect all of the sparkling chests. In doing so, a key will appear, which you can bring to a door in the level to go to the next one. There are ten levels in each world, and you freely choose to do each world in any order you want.

The main impediment to this process -- other than the clock, which kills you if time runs out -- are the enemies. You can press the B Button to dig a hole and trap enemies within when they walk in. (Holes can also kill you on higher difficulties.) If you want to close a hole, press B while facing it; if an enemy is within, they'll die and you'll gain points. (They will be replaced with a tombstone, which cannot have a hole dug on it anymore.) You'll also possibly gain some items.
Booby Boys (Japan) (Translated).desc:
Booby Boys 的遊戲玩法非常簡單。該關卡的目標是收集所有閃閃發光的箱子。這樣做時，會出現一把鑰匙，您可以將其帶到關卡中的一扇門以進入下一個關卡。每個世界有十個級別，你可以自由選擇以任何你想要的順序完成每個世界。

這個過程的主要障礙——除了時鐘之外，如果時間用完，時鐘就會殺死你——是敵人。你可以按 B 按鈕挖一個洞，當敵人走進來時將他們困在裡面。 （在更高的難度下，洞也會殺死你。）如果你想關閉一個洞，面對它時按 B ；如果敵人在裡面，他們就會死，你就會獲得積分。（它們將被墓碑取代，墓碑上不能再挖洞了。）你還可能獲得一些物品。

Magic Knight Rayearth (Japan) (SGB Enhan.name: 魔法騎士雷阿斯
Magic Knight Rayearth (Japan) (SGB Enhan.original_desc: It is an action role-playing video game based on the anime series of the same title.
Magic Knight Rayearth (Japan) (SGB Enhan.desc: 這是一款基於同名動漫系列的動作角色扮演視頻遊戲。

Mega Man II (USA).original_desc:
Dr. Wily has broken into the Chronos Institute and stolen a machine called Time Skimmer. According to Dr. Light's calculations, he has used the machine to travel roughly 37,426 years into the future. This can mean nothing good and so Mega Man, along with his dog Rush, sets out to find out more about Dr. Wily's plans.

Mega Man II follows the same formula as its predecessors, meaning the player has to complete a number of side-scrolling, platforming levels that are guarded by different bosses. Mega Man can only shoot left or right, but defeating a boss rewards him with a new weapon. Sometimes he will also find upgrades for Rush, which enable him to use Rush as a trampoline, a submarine or a jet.

While Mega Man II is not a conversion, the first four stages look and play very similar to some levels of Mega Man 2 for the NES. Likewise, levels five to eight resemble some levels of Mega Man 3. The bosses of the first eight stages are also old familiars from Mega Man 2 and 3.
Mega Man II (USA).desc:
威利博士闖入了時空研究所並偷走了一台名為“時間撇取器”的機器。根據萊特博士的計算，他已經利用這台機器旅行到了大約 37,426 年的未來。這可能沒有什麼好處，因此洛克人和他的狗拉什開始尋找有關威利博士計劃的更多信息。

《洛克人 II》遵循與其前作相同的公式，這意味著玩家必須完成許多由不同 Boss 守護的橫向捲軸、平台跳躍關卡。洛克人只能向左或向右射擊，但擊敗老闆會獎勵他一件新武器。有時他還會發現 Rush 的升級版本，使他能夠將 Rush 用作蹦床、潛艇或噴氣式飛機。

雖然《洛克人 II》不是一個轉換版，但前四個階段的外觀和玩法與 NES 版《洛克人 2》的某些關卡非常相似。同樣，第 5 至第 8 關類似於《洛克人 3》中的某些關卡。前 8 個關卡的 Boss 也是《洛克人 2》和《洛克人 3》中的老熟人。

Mickey's Dangerous Chase (USA).name: 米奇的危險追逐
Mickey's Dangerous Chase (USA).original_desc:
In Mickey's Dangerous Chase the player takes control of either Mickey or Minnie Mouse.  While on his way to deliver a very special gift to his girlfriend Minnie, Mickey is jumped by Pete who steals the present and takes off and it is up to the mouse duo to stop Pete and get back the present.

The gameplay is a side-scroller, where players pick up boxes to throw at enemies as well as discover power-ups that include short bursts of invincibility, extra lives and energy boosts that will help the player in their quest.  There are five different levels to play in including a lake, a mountain top, a forest and a shopping center and numerous enemies to avoid such as spiders, flying squirrels and even snowballs.
Mickey's Dangerous Chase (USA).desc:
在米奇的危險追逐中，玩家控制米奇或米妮。米奇在給女友米妮送一份非常特別的禮物的路上，被皮特襲擊了，皮特偷走了禮物並起飛，老鼠二人組必須阻止皮特並拿回禮物。

遊戲玩法是橫向捲軸遊戲，玩家拿起盒子扔向敵人，並發現能量提升，包括短暫的無敵爆發、額外的生命和能量提升，這將有助於玩家完成任務。有五個不同的關卡可供遊玩，包括湖泊、山頂、森林和購物中心，還有許多需要躲避的敵人，如蜘蛛、飛鼠，甚至雪球。

Chalvo 55 - Super Puzzle Action (Japan).name: Chalvo 55：超級益智動作
Chalvo 55 - Super Puzzle Action (Japan).original_desc: Jump and bounce through devilishly designed levels to collect the crystals needed to defeat the bosses in this sequel to the unreleased Virtual Boy game Bound High
Chalvo 55 - Super Puzzle Action (Japan).desc: 在未發布的 Virtual Boy 遊戲 Bound High 的續集中，跳躍和彈跳穿過設計邪惡的關卡，收集擊敗 Boss 所需的水晶

Q Billion (USA).name: 億問
Q Billion (USA).original_desc:
In Q Billion, you play a mouse which must level out a playfield filled with stacks of tiles. To do this, the mouse must climb onto one stack and push a taller, neighbouring stack so that tiles fall off, until there are no tiles stacked on top of each other. Oftentimes, there stacks are not adjacent to each other, which forces the mouse to push a tile next to the stack in order to have something to stand on. Since the mouse is so weak, it can only move a single tile. This calls for a lot of juggling, since in order to move a stack of three tiles (represented by a 3 in a square), it must move a single tile next to a stack of two tiles, then move another tile to the other side of the small stack and push the uppermost tile of the stack onto the single tile in order to create a stack of two next to the stack of three. If there is a distance greater than one or two squares between the stacks, it makes the task daunting and requires a lot of planning, which puts this game straight into the old style of Japanese puzzles pioneered by Sokoban.

Later stages introduce tiles of different kinds, symbolised by hearts, squares or stars. These tiles will, when moved together in groups of four, be eliminated; or at least the uppermost layer will. This calls for three-dimensional ? or even four-dimensional ? thinking on behalf of the player. None of the special tiles must be left on the screen for the stage to be cleared.

A second gaming mode contains ready-made puzzles which must be solved in a limited amount of time. An editing mode will also allow the player to create levels of his own.
Q Billion (USA).desc:
在《Q Billion》中，你扮演一隻老鼠，它必須平整一個充滿瓷磚的遊戲場地。要做到這一點，老鼠必須爬上一堆並推動更高的相鄰一堆，以使瓷磚掉落，直到沒有瓷磚相互堆疊。通常，這些堆棧彼此不相鄰，這迫使鼠標推動堆棧旁邊的圖塊以便有東西可以站立。由於鼠標的力量很弱，它只能移動一個方塊。這需要大量的雜技，因為為了移動一疊三塊瓷磚（由正方形中的 3 表示），它必須移動一疊兩塊瓷磚旁邊的單個瓷磚，然後將另一個瓷磚移動到小堆的另一側，並將該堆最上面的瓷磚推到單個瓷磚上，以便在三塊瓷磚旁邊創建兩塊瓷磚。如果堆疊之間的距離大於一兩個方格，則任務會變得艱鉅並且需要大量計劃，這使該遊戲直接陷入了推箱子開創的日本謎題的舊風格。

後來的階段引入了不同種類的瓷磚，以心形、正方形或星星為像徵。當這些瓷磚以四塊為一組移動到一起時，它們就會被消除；或者至少最上層會。這需要三維？甚至四維？代表玩家思考。屏幕上不得留下任何特殊圖塊才能清除舞台。

第二種遊戲模式包含現成的謎題，必須在有限的時間內解決。編輯模式還允許玩家創建自己的關卡。

Tetris Attack (USA, Europe) (Rev 1) (SGB.name: 俄羅斯方塊攻擊
Tetris Attack (USA, Europe) (Rev 1) (SGB.original_desc:
All is not well on Yoshi's Island! The devious king Bowser has cast a spell on the island's inhabitants, turning them into his mindless slaves. Only Yoshi has escaped its effects, and so he must set off to free his friends, and to defeat Bowser and break the spell.

Tetris Attack is a fact-paced action puzzler featuring the colorful cast of characters from Yoshi's Island. A stack of blocks continually rises from the bottom of the screen, and the player controls a cursor which can swap any two blocks horizontally. Make a row or column of three or more and they'll clear, potentially creating combos from new blocks falling to take their place. Combos will send large garbage blocks to your opponent, which must be eliminated by clearing a piece that is touching it, turning it into normal blocks.

The game offers a story mode against the computer, as well as a 2-player versus mode, an endless mode, a timed mode where a certain number of blocks must be cleared, and a puzzle mode where a set arrangement of blocks must be cleared in a specific number of moves. The game is based on the Japan-only title Panel de Pon.
Tetris Attack (USA, Europe) (Rev 1) (SGB.desc:
耀西島上的一切都不太好！狡猾的國王鮑澤對島上的居民施了咒語，將他們變成了他的無意識的奴隸。只有耀西逃脫了它的影響，因此他必須出發去釋放他的朋友，並擊敗鮑澤並打破咒語。

《Tetris Attack》是一款事實節奏的動作益智遊戲，以來自耀西島的豐富多彩的角色為特色。一堆方塊不斷從屏幕底部升起，玩家控制一個光標，可以水平交換任意兩個方塊。製作一行或一列三個或更多的方塊，它們就會被清除，並有可能從掉落的新方塊中創造出組合來取代它們。連擊會向你的對手發送大量垃圾塊，必須通過清除接觸它的棋子，將其變成正常塊來消除它們。

該遊戲提供了與電腦對抗的故事模式、2 人對戰模式、無盡模式、必須清除一定數量的方塊的計時模式以及必須在特定的移動次數中清除一組方塊的謎題模式。該遊戲基於僅限日本的遊戲《Panel de Pon》。

Boxxle II (USA, Europe).name: 博克斯勒II
Boxxle II (USA, Europe).original_desc:
A Challenging Follow-Up to the Original BOXXLE Game

BOXXLE II is a challenging, brain-teasing puzzle game based on moving creates around a warehouse. Time has passed since Willy met Wanda in the original BOXXLE storyline. Willy is hard at work in the warehouse when an alien abducts Wanda! How can he save her? He must build his own spaceship! Each time you help Willy move boxes into their proper spaces and clean up one level, he is able to buy parts for his rocket. But manual labor won't save the day. You'll need brain power, too, to beat BOXXLE II! There are over 120 different maze-like screens to keep you concentrating. BOXXLE II will "boxxle" your mind all over again.

- Enlarge or reduce any screen for a better look
- Three choices of theme music
- Build your own puzzles with three edit screens
- Special instant reply mode lets you retrace your mistakes
- Save wth password memory features
- Over 120 different maze-like screens
Boxxle II (USA, Europe).desc:
原版 BOXXLE 遊戲的挑戰性後續作品

BOXXLE II 是一款具有挑戰性、燒腦力的益智遊戲，其基礎是在倉庫中移動物品。自從威利在最初的 BOXXLE 故事情節中遇見旺達以來，時間已經過去了。威利正在倉庫里辛勤工作，旺達卻被外星人綁架了！他要怎樣才能救她？他必須建造自己的宇宙飛船！每次你幫助威利將箱子移到適當的空間並清理一層時，他就可以為他的火箭購買零件。但體力勞動並不能挽救局面。您還需要腦力來擊敗 BOXXLE II！有超過 120 個不同的迷宮式屏幕讓您集中註意力。BOXXLE II 將再次“震撼”您的思維。

- 放大或縮小任何屏幕以獲得更好的外觀
- 三種主題音樂選擇
- 使用三個編輯屏幕構建您自己的謎題
- 特殊即時回复模式，讓你追查錯誤
- 具有密碼記憶功能保存
- 超過 120 個不同的迷宮般的屏幕

Balloon Kid (USA, Europe).name: 氣球小子
Balloon Kid (USA, Europe).original_desc:
Balloon Kid is a unique side-scrolling platform game. You control a little girl who's brother has floated away on a big bunch of balloons. It's up to you to chase after him through 8 treacherous levels.  Instead of the usual jumping from platform to platform, you have a pair of balloons that allow you to float through the level. You must control your height carefully by tapping the 'A' button. Meanwhile, the screen is always scrolling to the left, and you have to keep up.

In addition to the single player adventure, there is a 2-player mode that allows you to compete against a friend via the Game Boy link cable.  In this mode you try to get your opponent to maneuver their balloon kid into the various level hazards.
Balloon Kid (USA, Europe).desc:
氣球小子是一款獨特的橫向捲軸平台遊戲。你控制一個小女孩，她的哥哥乘著一大堆氣球飄走了。你需要通過 8 個危險的關卡來追趕他。與通常從一個平台跳到另一個平台不同，你有一對氣球，可以讓你漂浮在水平面上。您必須通過點擊“A”按鈕仔細控制您的高度。與此同時，屏幕總是向左滾動，你必須跟上。

除了單人冒險之外，還有 2 人遊戲模式，可讓您通過 Game Boy 連接線與朋友競爭。在這種模式下，你試圖讓你的對手操縱他們的氣球孩子進入不同級別的危險。

Mickey Mouse - Magic Wands! (USA, Europe.key: Mickey Mouse - Magic Wands! (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhanced)
Mickey Mouse - Magic Wands! (USA, Europe.name: 米老鼠：魔法棒！
Mickey Mouse - Magic Wands! (USA, Europe.original_desc:
One day, Mickey and his friends went for a walk in a forest. They became so distracted by all the natural beauty surrounding them, they got lost. Pretty soon, they discovered a haunted castle. "That's the witch Yashja's castle," they told each other. "Once you enter, you can never escape! The castle is full of tricks and traps and even magic wands to create ice and fire. Let's not get any closer!"

All this chatter aroused Yashja from her slumber. "So! Who dares disturb my sleep?" she yelled. "You all shall pay!" Suddenly, a gaping hole opened up under Mickey's friends and they all fell in. Now Mickey has to save his friends, who are now being held captive by the witch!

To save his friends, Mickey has to collect puzzle pieces that completes images of his Disney friends, including Minnie Mouse, Donald Duck, Goofy and even obscure characters like Grandma Duck from the comic book series. To do this, Mickey has to wave his wand over crystals which conceal not only pieces of the image, but also items and even an occasional enemy. Each big level has ten small stages, each with at least one image to complete. Each tenth stage has an end boss to defeat. Also, the image to complete in the tenth stage of each level reveals the Disney character being held captive by the end boss of that level.
Mickey Mouse - Magic Wands! (USA, Europe.desc:
有一天，米奇和他的朋友們去森林裡散步。他們被周圍的自然美景弄得心煩意亂，以至於迷路了。很快，他們就發現了一座鬧鬼的城堡。“那是女巫亞甚賈的城堡，”他們互相告訴對方。“一旦進入，就永遠無法逃脫！城堡裡充滿了詭計和陷阱，甚至還有能夠製造冰火的魔杖，我們不要再靠近了！”

所有這些喋喋不休的談話把亞甚佳從睡夢中驚醒。“所以！誰敢打擾我睡覺？”她喊道。“你們都要付出代價！”突然，米奇的朋友們腳下出現了一個大洞，他們都掉進去了。現在米奇必須拯救他的朋友們，他們現在被女巫囚禁了！

為了拯救他的朋友，米奇必須收集拼圖來完成他的迪士尼朋友的形象，包括米妮老鼠、唐老鴨、高飛，甚至漫畫系列中的鴨奶奶等不起眼的角色。要做到這一點，米奇必須在水晶上揮舞魔杖，水晶不僅隱藏圖像的碎片，還隱藏物品，甚至偶爾隱藏敵人。每個大關卡都有十個小階段，每個階段至少有一張圖像需要完成。每個第十階段都有一個最終老闆需要擊敗。此外，每個關卡第十階段完成的圖像顯示迪士尼角色被該關卡的最終首領俘虜。

Castlevania Legends (USA, Europe) (SGB E.name: 惡魔城傳奇
Castlevania Legends (USA, Europe) (SGB E.original_desc:
Take a journey to the very beginning, when Dracula first rose up to terrorize the good people of Transylvania. None dared challenge him, and the people of the country lived in fear and terror - until a young girl rose up and decided to take matters into her own hands. That young girl was Sonia Belmont, the first in the line of the legendary Belmont clan.

While Castlevania Legends plays similar to the earlier Castlevania titles (the protagonist is only armed with a whip and needs to fight her way through five stages plus a hidden stage), there are also some unique features. While it is impossible to roam the stages freely, quite often the player can choose to go one way or another and in doing so skip some areas or find valuable items, collecting all of which will unlock the best ending. Sonia also possesses special power called Burning mode: once in a level (and once per life) she can boost her speed and attack power and become invincible for a short period of time.
Castlevania Legends (USA, Europe) (SGB E.desc:
踏上旅程回到最初，德古拉第一次崛起並恐嚇特蘭西瓦尼亞的善良人民。沒有人敢挑戰他，這個國家的人民生活在恐懼和恐怖之中 - 直到一個年輕女孩站起來，決定將事情掌握在自己手中。那個少女就是索尼婭·貝爾蒙特，傳說中的貝爾蒙特家族的第一代傳人。

雖然《惡魔城傳奇》的玩法與早期的《惡魔城》遊戲類似（主角僅手持鞭子，需要通過五個階段和一個隱藏階段來戰鬥），但也有一些獨特的功能。雖然不可能在舞台上自由漫遊，但玩家通常可以選擇走一條路或另一條路，這樣做可以跳過一些區域或找到有價值的物品，收集所有這些物品將解鎖最好的結局。索尼婭還擁有稱為燃燒模式的特殊能力：一旦進入一個關卡（並且每生命一次），她就可以提高她的速度和攻擊力，並在短時間內變得無敵。

Wario Land - Super Mario Land 3 (World).name: 瓦里奧樂園 : 超級馬里奧樂園 3
Wario Land - Super Mario Land 3 (World).original_desc: Wario, Mario's greedy rival from Super Mario Land 2: 6 Golden Coins, is more determined than ever to get a castle after being booted out of Mario's. He has heard that the pirates of Kitchen Island have a golden Statue of Princess Toadstool that's worth a king's ransom! Wario figures that if he swipes the Princess' statue for himself, as well as all the other loot the pirates have hoarded, he'll have more than enough cash for a castle that's even bigger and better than Mario's!
Wario Land - Super Mario Land 3 (World).desc: 瓦里奧是《超級馬里奧樂園 2：6 金幣》中馬里奧貪婪的對手，在被趕出馬里奧的城堡後，他比以往任何時候都更加堅定地想要獲得一座城堡。他聽說廚房島的海盜有一尊金黃色的傘菌公主雕像，價值不菲！瓦里奧認為，如果他為自己盜取公主的雕像，以及海盜們囤積的所有其他戰利品，他將有足夠的現金建造一座比馬里奧的城堡更大、更好的城堡！

Trip World (Europe).name: 瑪利歐賽車世界
Trip World (Europe).original_desc:
Thanks to the Maita Flower, Trip World is at peace. It is being protected by an old Shabubu, a member of a race of bunny-like beings. The flower grows on the holy mountain known as Mount Dubious. However, one day the old Shabubu is attacked and the Maita Flower is stolen. Trip World becomes disarranged and its inhabitants don't stop quarreling with each other. But there is one hope in the form of the old Shabubu's grandson, Yacopu (also spelled Yakopoo).

The player controls Yacopu through five stages in this side-scrolling platformer. The young Shabubu's trademark ability is to shapeshift into different forms. In his normal form, he is able to walk and jump as well as to kick enemies, Yacopu's primary way of attacking. Unlike in many other platformers, many of the enemies don't harm you on contact and push your character around instead. However, certain foes might attack you after you damaged them, while others do so from the beginning.

At almost any time, the player can change to the flying or fish form. Flying Yacopu is able to reach places he wouldn't otherwise be able to, while the fishy hero is best suited for underwater areas. You also come across power-ups that temporarily give your character new powers, such as stunning enemies with seeds, bouncing around as a ball, or attacking with an extended tail. Beneath the mountain, settings in the game include a jungle, the ocean, and a castle. In each stages, you have to defeat a boss at the end. Eventually, you will encounter the one who stole the Maita Flower. The flower must be retrieved in order to save peace in Trip World.
Trip World (Europe).desc:
多虧了麥塔花，旅行世界才得以平靜。它受到一位年長的沙布布（Shabubu）的保護，沙布布是一個類似兔子的生物種族的成員。這種花生長在被稱為可疑山的聖山上。然而有一天，老沙布布遭到襲擊，麥塔花被盜。旅行世界變得混亂，居民之間的爭吵不斷。但老Shabubu 的孫子Yacopu（也拼寫為Yakopoo）還有一個希望。

在這款橫向捲軸平台遊戲中，玩家通過五個階段控制 Yacopu。年輕的 Shabubu 的標誌性能力是變形為不同的形態。在正常形態下，他能夠行走、跳躍以及踢敵人，這是雅科普的主要攻擊方式。與許多其他平台遊戲不同的是，許多敵人不會在接觸時傷害你，而是會推動你的角色。然而，某些敵人可能會在你傷害他們後攻擊你，而另一些敵人從一開始就會攻擊你。

幾乎在任何時候，玩家都可以改變為飛行或魚的形態。飛行雅科普能夠到達他原本無法到達的地方，而魚腥英雄最適合水下區域。你還會遇到暫時賦予你的角色新力量的能力提升，例如用種子擊暈敵人、像球一樣彈跳或用延長的尾巴攻擊。遊戲中的山下場景包括叢林、海洋和城堡。在每個階段，你最終都必須擊敗老闆。最終，你會遇到偷走麥塔花的人。為了拯救旅行世界的和平，必須取回這朵花。

Donkey Kong (Japan, USA) (SGB Enhanced).name: 大金剛
Donkey Kong (Japan, USA) (SGB Enhanced).original_desc:
Donkey Kong's adventures continue with new tricks and traps for Mario!

Donkey Kong returns to Game Boy! This famous ape has kidnapped Pauline and climbed to the top of a perilous skyscraper. Challenged by many perils and unending puzzles, Mario must reach his arch rival. As he makes his way Mario will need to gather disappearing keys to unlock doors of hidden rooms. Donkey Kong devises evil tricks to confuse and trap him. Our heroic plumber has his hands full this time!

- Classic arcade fun with 10 stages and 100 advanced puzzles
- Thrilling new adventure elements for added excitement
- 4 megabyte game contains a battery back-up
Donkey Kong (Japan, USA) (SGB Enhanced).desc:
大金剛的冒險繼續為馬里奧帶來新的技巧和陷阱！

大金剛回歸 Game Boy！這只著名的猩猩綁架了寶琳，並爬上了一座危險的摩天大樓的頂部。面對許多危險和無盡的謎題，馬里奧必須找到他的宿敵。馬里奧在前進的過程中需要收集消失的鑰匙來打開隱藏房間的門。大金剛設計出邪惡的詭計來迷惑和困住他。我們英雄的水管工這次忙得不可開交！

- 經典街機樂趣，包含 10 個階段和 100 個高級謎題
- 驚心動魄的新冒險元素，增添刺激感
- 4兆字節遊戲包含備用電池

Battle Unit Zeoth (USA, Europe).name: 戰鬥單位澤斯
Battle Unit Zeoth (USA, Europe).original_desc:
Battle Unit Zeoth is a 2D futuristic side-scrolling shooter. Humanity is in danger -  a race of alien robots known as the "Grein" invaded the Solar System. They lost and fled, but left behind an underground base with self-replicating Grein machines. Two years after the invasion aliens attack again. However, the humans have made a special mech, Zeoth, designed for combat.

Player controls Zeoth who can move to the right and shoot enemies. The odd-numbered stages are horizontal scrolling stages and the even-numbered stages are a simple "platform" stages. Each stage ends in a boss fight. Zeoth can fly with a jetpack (but the player must tap a button to resist gravity) and can fire in four directions (right, left, down and up). The basic weapons can be improved. The mech can take some damage before being destroyed and has just one life, however, there are unlimited continues.
Battle Unit Zeoth (USA, Europe).desc:
Battle Unit Zeoth 是一款 2D 未來橫向捲軸射擊遊戲。人類正處於危險之中——一個被稱為“Grein”的外星機器人種族入侵了太陽系。他們迷失了方向並逃跑了，但留下了一個擁有自我複制格林機器的地下基地。入侵兩年後，外星人再次發動攻擊。然而，人類製造了一種特殊的機甲，Zeoth，專為戰鬥而設計。

玩家控制 Zeoth，它可以向右移動並射擊敵人。奇數編號的階段是水平滾動階段，偶數編號的階段是簡單的“平台”階段。每個階段都以 Boss 戰結束。Zeoth 可以攜帶噴氣背包飛行（但玩家必須點擊按鈕來抵抗重力），並且可以向四個方向（右、左、下、上）射擊。基礎武器可以改進。機甲在被摧毀之前可能會受到一些傷害，並且只有一次生命，但是，有無限的延續時間。

Super R.C. Pro-Am (USA, Europe).name: 超級遙控職業業餘選手
Super R.C. Pro-Am (USA, Europe).original_desc:
Super R.C. Pro-Am is the Game Boy update to Rare's classic radio controlled car game.  4 computer or human racers attempt to get around the track as fast as possible while avoiding hazards like oil slicks and traffic cones.  There are also weapons that you can use to disable the other cars temporarily.

The goal of the game is to collect the letter icons found on the tracks that spell "NINTENDO."  Collecting the letters allows you to move up to faster cars and eventually win the championship.
Super R.C. Pro-Am (USA, Europe).desc:
超級遙控Pro-Am 是 Rare 經典無線電控制汽車遊戲的 Game Boy 更新。4 名計算機或人類賽車手嘗試盡可能快地繞過賽道，同時避免浮油和交通錐等危險。您還可以使用武器暫時禁用其他車輛。

遊戲的目標是收集在拼寫“NINTENDO”的軌道上找到的字母圖標。收集字母可以讓你升級到更快的賽車並最終贏得冠軍。

Final Fantasy Legend II (USA).original_desc:
The second in the Final Fantasy Legend series increases the amount of detail over the original in gameplay and graphics.

The major changes are in the character classes and party members. Similar to FFL, starting a game of Legends II allows you to choose your main character from Humans, Monsters, Mutants and a new class: Robots. From here, you build your party of 4 from the same character classes. During gameplay special side-characters will join you in battle to help defeat certain enemies. 

The other improvement is in strategy. In FFL you gain experience points after each battle, increasing strength, etc. In FFLII, you gain different points and abilities depending on how you defeated the enemy. If you win by using a sword, your strength increases. If you use magic, your mana increases. This adds a more strategic approach to defeating enemies.
Final Fantasy Legend II (USA).desc:
《最終幻想傳奇》系列的第二部在遊戲玩法和圖像方面比原作增加了更多細節。

主要變化是角色類別和黨員。與 FFL 類似，開始 Legends II 遊戲時，您可以從人類、怪物、變種人和新類別：機器人中選擇主角。從這裡開始，您可以用相同的角色類別組建 4 人隊伍。在遊戲過程中，特殊的配角角色將加入你的戰鬥，幫助擊敗某些敵人。

另一個改進是在策略上。在FFL中，你在每次戰鬥後獲得經驗值，增加力量等。在FFLII中，你根據擊敗敵人的方式獲得不同的點數和能力。如果你用劍獲勝，你的力量就會增強。如果你使用魔法，你的魔力就會增加。這增加了擊敗敵人的更具戰略性的方法。

Kung-Fu Master (USA, Europe).name: 若福大師
Kung-Fu Master (USA, Europe).original_desc:
Loosely based on a movie, Kung-Fu Master is a side scrolling action game for one or two players, who alternate turns.

Mr. X has captured the pickpocket Sylvia and it is up to Thomas, a kung-fu master who owns a restaurant, to get her back. She is located on the top floor of Mr. X's castle and Thomas will need to fight his way to the top. Of course, this won't be easy as each floor has many opponents to get past and a floor boss at the end of each level. 

Thomas is able to move left and right, jump, duck, and punch and kick. Enemy projectiles such as knives can be kicked in the air to rebound them towards the enemy. On the top floor resides Mr. X himself.
Kung-Fu Master (USA, Europe).desc:
《功夫大師》大致改編自電影，是一款橫向捲軸動作遊戲，可供一到兩名玩家輪流玩。

X 先生抓獲了扒手西爾維婭，擁有一家餐廳的功夫大師托馬斯必須將她救回來。她位於 X 先生城堡的頂層，托馬斯需要奮力到達頂層。當然，這並不容易，因為每個樓層都有很多對手需要克服，並且每個樓層的末尾都有一個樓層老闆。

托馬斯能夠左右移動、跳躍、閃避、拳打腳踢。可以將敵人的射彈（例如刀子）踢到空中，將其反彈到敵人身上。X先生本人就住在頂樓。

Final Fantasy Legend III (USA).original_desc:
The final (no joke) Final Fantasy Legend title to grace the Game Boy, FFLIII tells the story of a great flood which destroys cities in the past, present and future. 
As you control a party of 4, with a choice of human and mutant classes, and travel back and forth through time collecting pieces of the great ship Talon so as to defeat the enemy that has flooded the lands.

The inclusion of a time travel storyline means that whatever you do in one time frame can have an affect on what happens in another time. Other major changes compared to the original 2 in the series are the ability to mutate your characters further and a change to the upgrade system.
Items picked up after battle can be attached to your mutants or humans to turn them into monsters or robots, increasing your parties power and abilities.
And although the original system of obtaning experience points after every battle has been removed, its replacement allows you to choose which magic stone each character can use, so they learn that specific magic type and never lose it.
Final Fantasy Legend III (USA).desc:
《FFLIII》是 Game Boy 上的最後一款（不是開玩笑的）《最終幻想傳奇》遊戲，講述了一場摧毀過去、現在和未來城市的大洪水的故事。
當你控制一個 4 人小隊，選擇人類和變種人類別時，在時間中來回旅行，收集大船 Talon 的碎片，以擊敗淹沒這片土地的敵人。

包含時間旅行故事情節意味著您在一個時間範圍內所做的任何事情都會對另一時間發生的事情產生影響。與該系列中的原版 2 相比，其他主要變化是進一步變異角色的能力以及升級系統的更改。
戰鬥後拾取的物品可以附加到你的變種人或人類身上，將他們變成怪物或機器人，增加你的隊伍的力量和能力。
雖然每場戰鬥後獲得經驗值的原始系統已被刪除，但它的替代品允許您選擇每個角色可以使用哪種魔法石，因此他們可以學習特定的魔法類型並且永遠不會丟失它。

Skate or Die - Bad 'N Rad (USA).name: 滑冰或死亡：Bad 'N Rad
Skate or Die - Bad 'N Rad (USA).original_desc: Skate Or Die: Bad'N Rad is a Jump'N Run that consists of 7 levels, three of which are viewed from a top-down perspective. The side-scrolling levels play similar to other Jump'N Runs, as you have to avoid obstacles and kill enemies by jumping on them. However, since you are on a skateboard, speed plays an important role, meaning that you cannot immediately stop and sometimes need to drive at full speed to manage wider jumps. The top-down levels play more similar to other Skate Or Die games as gradients influence your driving while you are trying to avoid obstacles, enemies and deadly spikes.
Skate or Die - Bad 'N Rad (USA).desc: Skate Or Die: Bad'N Rad 是一款 Jump'N Run 遊戲，共有 7 個關卡，其中三個關卡是從自上而下的角度觀看的。橫向捲軸關卡的玩法與其他 Jump'N Runs 類似，因為你必須避開障礙物並通過跳躍來殺死敵人。然而，由於您在滑板上，速度起著重要作用，這意味著您無法立即停止，有時需要全速行駛才能實現更寬的跳躍。自上而下的關卡與其他《Skate Or Die》遊戲更相似，因為當你試圖避開障礙物、敵人和致命的尖刺時，梯度會影響你的駕駛。

Kid Dracula (USA, Europe).name: 德古拉小子
Kid Dracula (USA, Europe).original_desc:
Kid Dracula is a side-scroller and a parody of the Castlevania series. The difference is you play as a young vampire rather than a vampire killer.

Gameplay consists of very standard jump and shoot platform action.  As you progress through the 8 levels, you gain the ability to perform spells, like turning into a bat. You will also receive guidance from your pal, the Grim Reaper.
Kid Dracula (USA, Europe).desc:
《德古拉小子》是一款橫向捲軸遊戲，是惡魔城系列的模仿作品。不同之處在於你扮演一個年輕的吸血鬼而不是吸血鬼殺手。

遊戲玩法包括非常標準的跳躍和射擊平台動作。當您通過 8 個級別時，您將獲得執行咒語的能力，例如變成蝙蝠。您還將收到您的朋友死神的指導。

Montezuma's Return! (Europe) (En,Fr,De,E.name: 蒙特祖瑪回歸！
Montezuma's Return! (Europe) (En,Fr,De,E.original_desc:
Max Montezuma is a soldier who also happens to be a descendant of a legendary Aztec emperor. One day Max's plane crashes on an uncharted, deserted island. Max discovers ancient ruins there and ventures to explore them, attempting to connect the mystery of the past with the events of the present.

Montezuma's Return is a sequel to Montezuma's Revenge, and also focuses on platforming gameplay which includes puzzle-solving, avoiding obstacles, and fighting enemies. Unlike its predecessor, it is a first-person 3D game. The player is able to see the protagonist's feet when moving the camera, to facilitate precise platform jumping.

Every level ends with a boss battle, and each boss must be defeated in a specific way. Max can punch and kick enemies, and also use environmental hazards to damage them; pushing enemies into water or luring them into traps will kill them. Some areas require Max to jump on moving platforms, climb ropes, swim, avoid falling into lava or deadly spikes, etc. Max can collect treasure on each level, bananas or watermelon slices to heal himself, and special items to unlock barriers.

The full version of Montezuma's Revenge is included on the CD.
Montezuma's Return! (Europe) (En,Fr,De,E.desc:
馬克斯·蒙特祖瑪是一名士兵，同時也是一位傳奇阿茲特克皇帝的後裔。有一天，麥克斯的飛機墜毀在一座未知的荒島上。麥克斯在那裡發現了古代遺跡，並冒險探索它們，試圖將過去的謎團與現在的事件聯繫起來。

《蒙特祖瑪的歸來》是《蒙特祖瑪的複仇》的續作，同樣專注於平台遊戲，包括解謎、躲避障礙和與敵人戰鬥。與前作不同的是，它是一款第一人稱 3D 遊戲。玩家在移動鏡頭時能夠看到主角的腳，以方便精確的跳台。

每個關卡都以Boss戰結束，每個Boss都必須以特定的方式擊敗。麥克斯可以拳打腳踢敵人，也可以利用環境危害來傷害他們；將敵人推入水中或引誘他們進入陷阱會殺死他們。有些區域需要麥克斯在移動平台上跳躍、攀爬繩索、游泳、避免落入熔岩或致命的尖刺等。麥克斯可以在每個關卡中收集寶藏、香蕉或西瓜片來治愈自己，以及解鎖障礙的特殊物品。

CD 中包含完整版的《蒙特祖瑪的複仇》。

Harvest Moon GB (USA) (SGB Enhanced).name: 牧場物語 GB
Harvest Moon GB (USA) (SGB Enhanced).original_desc:
Harvest Moon is a farming simulation where you must build and maintain a farm during the course of a year, while taking care of your budget and yourself. 

You have the ability to buy, sell and take care of farm animals, crops and any other supplies that you may have. You can trade with many of the town's people, and fellow farmers. If you link up a friend's Game Boy, you can trade items between players as well.

The local stores supply plenty of items to help you in your quest, at a cost, of course. And if you have the time, you can go about the town in search of a little fun away from work.

From an overhead perspective, you can explore your farming area, the local town and the Harvest Sprite tunnels, full of strange and wonderful creatures that can help or destroy your quest. There are four seasons (Summer, Autumn, Winter, Spring) and each brings with it new challenges such as keeping arm animals warm during the colder seasons, and supplying water to the crops during the warmer periods.
