The GBC version includes all new characters and background sprites in full color, but is also backwards compatible with the original Game Boy version.
Harvest Moon GB (USA) (SGB Enhanced).desc:
《Harvest Moon》是一款農業模擬遊戲，您必須在一年內建造和維護農場，同時照顧好您的預算和您自己。

您有能力購買、出售和照顧農場動物、農作物以及您可能擁有的任何其他物資。您可以與鎮上的許多居民和農民同胞進行貿易。如果您連接朋友的 Game Boy，您也可以在玩家之間交易物品。

當地商店提供大量物品來幫助您完成任務，當然需要付費。如果您有時間，您還可以到城裡去尋找工作之餘的一些樂趣。

從俯視角度，你可以探索你的農業區、當地城鎮和收穫精靈隧道，裡面充滿了奇怪而奇妙的生物，它們可以幫助或破壞你的任務。有四個季節（夏季、秋季、冬季、春季），每個季節都會帶來新的挑戰，例如在寒冷的季節為手臂動物保暖，以及在溫暖的季節為農作物供水。

GBC 版本包括所有新角色和全彩背景精靈，但也向後兼容原始 Game Boy 版本。

Wario Blast Featuring Bomberman! (USA, E.key: Wario Blast Featuring Bomberman! (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhanced)
Wario Blast Featuring Bomberman! (USA, E.name: 瓦里奧爆炸：以炸彈人為特色！
Wario Blast Featuring Bomberman! (USA, E.original_desc: OH, NO! Wario has stumbled upon the secret gateway into Bomberland! Now the greedy warmonger wants to claim the land, its inhabitants, and treasures as his own. Entering the underground labyrinth, he meets the resistance of the Madbombers - explosives experts who have some TNT tricks and surprises to toss at Wario. The battle heats up as Wario and Bomberman each try to outwit the other, level by level in a dynamite duel!
Wario Blast Featuring Bomberman! (USA, E.desc: 哦，不！瓦里奧偶然發現了通往轟炸機之地的秘密大門！現在，貪婪的戰爭販子想要將這片土地、其中的居民和財寶據為己有。進入地下迷宮後，他遇到了瘋狂炸彈人的抵抗，他們是炸藥專家，他們有一些 TNT 技巧和驚喜可以向瓦里奧投擲。瓦里奧和炸彈人都試圖在一場炸藥決鬥中逐級智胜對方，戰鬥愈演愈烈！

Yoshi's Cookie (USA, Europe).name: 耀西的餅乾
Yoshi's Cookie (USA, Europe).original_desc: Yoshi's Cookie is a fast-paced puzzle game. The player moves randomly placed cookies into rows and columns of cookies with similar patterns. When a row or column of the same cookies is successfully assembled, the line will disappear, and the player can begin to work on a new row or column. The "Yoshi" cookie is very special in both the 1-player and the 2-player game. Since this cookie is the key to both games, it should be used wisely.
Yoshi's Cookie (USA, Europe).desc: 耀西的餅乾是一款快節奏的益智遊戲。玩家將隨機放置的餅乾移動到具有相似圖案的行和列中。當成功組裝一行或一列相同的餅乾時，該線將消失，玩家可以開始處理新的行或列。“耀西”餅乾在 1 人遊戲和 2 人遊戲中都非常特別。由於此 cookie 是這兩款遊戲的關鍵，因此應明智地使用它。

Astro Rabby (Japan).name: 天文拉比
Astro Rabby (Japan).original_desc:
Astro Rabby is a top-down platformer in which the player takes control over a rabbit which has to travel through a number of levels with forced scrolling. Unfortunately there are only so much usable platforms available, in the space levels even less, which have to hit by performing controlled jumps. The platforms come in three heights which are indicated by their size - the bigger, the higher. Landing on a platform creates a lot of force and either causes the block to crack and, if it has a question mark on it, gives a power up (extra time or points). 

The levels loop until the player finds a heart hidden in the question mark blocks - but landing on a cracked platform causes it to give way. Of course there are also enemies which have to be avoided or shot with the gun. Those leave behind power ups which give additional ammo or improve the jumping height respectively speed.
Astro Rabby (Japan).desc:
Astro Rabby 是一款自上而下的平台遊戲，玩家控制一隻兔子，它必須通過強制滾動來穿越多個關卡。不幸的是，可用的平台非常有限，在太空層中則更少，必須通過執行受控跳躍來擊中。平台有三種高度，由其尺寸決定——越大，越高。降落在平台上會產生很大的力，要么導致方塊破裂，要么如果方塊上有問號，就會獲得力量（額外的時間或分數）。

關卡循環進行，直到玩家找到一顆隱藏在問號方塊中的心 - 但降落在破裂的平台上會導致它讓路。當然，也有必須躲避或用槍射擊的敵人。那些留下的能量提升可以提供額外的彈藥或提高跳躍高度和速度。

Yoshi (USA).name: 耀西
Yoshi (USA).original_desc:
You have to help Mario cope with falling Goombas, Bloopers, Boo Buddies, and Piranha Plants.

 As they fall, catch them on trays. Switch and shuffle them to save the day. Stack two of a kind and they both disappear. Or capture a whole bunch between two eggshell halves. A different kind of Yoshi will appear depending on how many enemies are between the eggshell halves.

 There is a password feature to save your progress.
Yoshi (USA).desc:
你必須幫助馬里奧應對掉落的 Goombas、Bloopers、Boo Buddies 和食人魚植物。

當它們掉落時，將它們接在托盤上。切換並洗牌以挽救局面。堆疊兩個同類，然後它們都會消失。或者將整個蛋殼夾在兩個半蛋殼之間。根據蛋殼兩半之間有多少敵人，會出現不同類型的耀西。

有密碼功能可以保存您的進度。

Legend of the River King GB (USA) (SGB E.key: Legend of the River King GB (USA) (SGB Enhanced)
Legend of the River King GB (USA) (SGB E.original_name: Legend of the River King GB
Legend of the River King GB (USA) (SGB E.name: 河王傳奇GB
Legend of the River King GB (USA) (SGB E.original_desc:
This unique RPG provides a world of fishing as the prime objective.

There are two modes of play, The Fish and Raise.

The Fish: As a young boy, you must search out the fish called Guardian, the only fish in the river that can cure a disease caught by your sister, Teruyo. This mode combines RPG elements such as buying items, talking to the town's folk and searching the local river for the Guardian fish. The fishing element comes into play when you bait or lure fish at the river, in hopes to find a fish.

Raise mode allows you to purchase a fish tank and the extras, and raise a small fish. Much like the many Pokémon type games, you can feed it, keep the tank clean and raise the fish.
Legend of the River King GB (USA) (SGB E.desc:
這款獨特的角色扮演遊戲以釣魚世界為主要目標。

有兩種遊戲模式：“魚”和“養”。

魚：作為一個小男孩，你必須找到一條叫做守護者的魚，這是河裡唯一可以治愈你姐姐輝代染上的疾病的魚。該模式結合了 RPG 元素，例如購買物品、與小鎮居民交談以及在當地河流中尋找守護魚。當您在河邊用魚餌或引誘魚以希望找到魚時，釣魚元素就會發揮作用。

飼養模式允許您購買魚缸和額外的東西，並飼養一條小魚。就像許多神奇寶貝類型的遊戲一樣，你可以餵牠，保持魚缸清潔並養魚。

Fortified Zone (USA, Europe).name: 防禦區
Fortified Zone (USA, Europe).original_desc:
A male and a female commando named Masato & Mizuki are sent to the jungle on a mission to destroy an enemy base and everyone in it. Stealth is required, since brute force will only lead into their capture.

You are able to switch between the two characters at any time, something rarely seen in video games even today, twelve years after its release.
Fortified Zone (USA, Europe).desc:
名為 Masato 和 Mizuki 的男女突擊隊員被派往叢林，執行摧毀敵方基地及其中所有人的任務。秘密行動是必要的，因為暴力只會導致他們被捕獲。

你可以隨時在兩個角色之間切換，這在電子遊戲中很少見，即使在發布十二年後的今天也是如此。

Catrap (USA).name: 捕蟲器
Catrap (USA).original_desc:
Banished to a mysterious underground labyrinth of complex mazes, two explorers are faced with one chance to reverse the curse: solve all 100 puzzles set out in mazes before them. 

But watch it! Every maze has monsters patrolling the depths of the labyrinth. Help Catgirl and Catboy push around huge blocks to bridge a path to yet another maze, or topple a block a few stories over the pursuing monsters. If you make a mistake, simply use the rewind function and travel back in time to correct it. With 100 mazes in this labyrinth, it will be quite a challenge to get out of the curse's reach!

Catrap is more than just a game of mindbending intrigue and action. Be the architect of the underground labyrinth and make your own games of intricate puzzles.

Whether you choose to be a maze builder or a maze solver, we know you can help Catboy and Catgirl land on their feet.

Catrap (known as Pitman in Japan) is a puzzle game in which the player maneuvers the player, an anthropomorphic cat, to navigate a room while clearing obstacles and kicking monsters and ghosts off the screen. Once the player has knocked all of the enemies off the screen, he advances to the next level. Advancement can prove difficult for the player as increasingly intricate obstacles are presented to overcome all of the monsters and ghosts. Arguably, the easiest route to solve the problem is through trial and error. A player may try one combination of maneuvers by moving the obstacle in one direction, then he may find himself trapped. The player can hit the 'A'-button to reverse his movements and try again in a different way until he finds the solution that enables him to access all of the baddies to knock them off the screen. Trial and error seems to make up a large portion of the game. Players can also create their own mazes. The game is credited with having originated the time-rewind mechanic.
Catrap (USA).desc:
兩名探險家被放逐到一個充滿複雜迷宮的神秘地下迷宮，他們面臨著一個扭轉詛咒的機會：解決他們面前迷宮中的所有 100 個謎題。

但請注意！每個迷宮都有怪物在迷宮深處巡邏。幫助貓女和貓小子推過巨大的石塊，架起通往另一個迷宮的道路，或者推倒幾層樓高的石塊，壓倒追趕的怪物。如果您犯了錯誤，只需使用倒帶功能即可及時返回以糾正錯誤。這個迷宮有100個迷宮，要擺脫詛咒的魔掌將是一個不小的挑戰！

Catrap 不僅僅是一款令人費解的陰謀和動作遊戲。成為地下迷宮的建築師，製作你自己的複雜謎題遊戲。

無論您選擇成為迷宮建造者還是迷宮解謎者，我們都知道您可以幫助貓男孩和貓女孩站起來。

Catrap（在日本稱為 Pitman）是一款益智遊戲，玩家操縱擬人化的貓在房間中導航，同時清除障礙並將怪物和鬼魂踢出屏幕。一旦玩家將屏幕上的所有敵人擊倒，他就會進入下一關。隨著克服所有怪物和幽靈的障礙越來越複雜，玩家的進步可能會變得困難。可以說，解決問題最簡單的途徑是通過反複試驗。玩家可以通過向一個方向移動障礙物來嘗試一種策略組合，然後他可能會發現自己被困住了。玩家可以點擊“A”按鈕來反轉他的動作，並以不同的方式重試，直到找到解決方案，使他能夠訪問所有壞人，將他們從屏幕上擊落。嘗試和錯誤似乎構成了遊戲的很大一部分。玩家還可以創建自己的迷宮。該遊戲被譽為首創了時間倒帶機制。

Boxxle (USA, Europe) (Rev 1).name: 博克斯勒
Boxxle (USA, Europe) (Rev 1).original_desc:
Just like in Soko-Ban, it is your goal to push a number of crates onto certain spots in order to finish a level. 

Finding the right way to move all the crates on the right spots becomes increasingly difficult and you have to plan numerous steps in advance in order not to block your own way. 

The game features over 25 levels with 10 sub-levels each one. You can always choose the order in which you want to complete the sub-levels, but you have to complete all sub-levels in order to advance to the next main-level. 

If you have finished the game or become hopelessly stuck, there is also an option to create your own levels.
Boxxle (USA, Europe) (Rev 1).desc:
就像在 Soko-Ban 中一樣，您的目標是將多個板條箱推到特定位置以完成關卡。

找到正確的方法將所有板條箱移動到正確的位置變得越來越困難，你必須提前計劃許多步驟，以免擋住自己的路。

該遊戲有超過 25 個關卡，每個關卡有 10 個子關卡。您始終可以選擇完成子級別的順序，但您必須完成所有子級別才能進入下一個主級別。

如果您已完成遊戲或陷入困境，還可以選擇創建自己的關卡。

Cave Noire (Japan) (Translated).name: 黑洞
Cave Noire (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
Cave Noire is a roguelike. The game evolves around four quests (killing monsters, freeing fairies or collecting gold/orbs) with ten difficulties each. The difficulty determines how big the target number is, the stats the player starts with and what monsters are encountered. Starting a quest creates a randomly generated dungeon where the player has one chance to reach the goal - death means a new dungeon has to be created. Beating a difficultly level unlocks the next; this is also the one thing the game saves.

The dungeons itself are shown from a top-down perspective and feature the hero, walls, floor tiles, monsters and items to collect. Movement is turn-based and each turn is divided into four phases (player movement, player attack, monster attack and finally monster movement). Attacks are only possible when the two participants stand besides each other and the computer simply calculates the result from the statistics (attack, defense, luck and a a random component) which then lowers the health points of the attacked hero/monster. Of course reaching a health of zero means defeat. The mentioned statistics can be improved by finding and using certain items like weapons or armor. Potions, spells and rings which have additional effects when used/equipped, e.g. health refreshments, healing poison, dealing much damage or invisibility.

Important to note is that the environment also plays an important part in the quest. The walls and tiles may have special effects when touched, examples are pits (the player/monster falls to the next level of the dungeon and takes damage), breakable walls, lava or teleporters. Some rooms may be covered in fog which obscure the floor tiles until the hero walks onto it (monsters still can be made out). There is a specific kind of monster which clears the whole room when killed - but at the same time another one has the exact opposite effect.
Cave Noire (Japan) (Translated).desc:
Cave Noire 是一款 Roguelike 遊戲。遊戲圍繞四個任務（殺死怪物、釋放仙女或收集黃金/寶珠）展開，每個任務有十個難度。難度決定了目標數量有多大、玩家開始時的屬性以及遇到的怪物。開始任務會創建一個隨機生成的地牢，玩家有一次機會達到目標 - 死亡意味著必須創建一個新的地牢。突破一個難度級別即可解鎖下一個難度級別；這也是遊戲保存的一件事。

地下城本身是從自上而下的角度展示的，以英雄、牆壁、地磚、怪物和要收集的物品為特色。移動是回合製的，每個回合分為四個階段（玩家移動、玩家攻擊、怪物攻擊和最後怪物移動）。只有當兩個參與者並排站立並且計算機簡單地計算統計結果（攻擊、防禦、運氣和隨機成分）時，攻擊才有可能，然後降低被攻擊英雄/怪物的生命值。當然，生命值達到零就意味著失敗。可以通過查找和使用某些物品（例如武器或盔甲）來改進上述統計數據。使用/裝備時具有附加效果的藥水、咒語和戒指，例如健康茶點、治療毒物、造成大量傷害或隱身。

值得注意的是，環境在任務中也起著重要作用。牆壁和瓷磚在觸摸時可能會產生特殊效果，例如坑（玩家/怪物掉落到地牢的下一層並受到傷害）、易碎牆壁、熔岩或傳送器。有些房間可能被霧覆蓋，遮住地磚，直到英雄走上它（仍然可以辨認出怪物）。有一種特定類型的怪物被殺死後會清理整個房間 - 但同時另一種怪物具有完全相反的效果。

Ninja Gaiden Shadow (USA).name: 忍者龍劍傳之影
Ninja Gaiden Shadow (USA).original_desc:
Ninja Gaiden Shadow is a prequel to Ninja Gaiden. It is 1985, 3 years before the events of the NES game, and Jaquio has not yet been awakened. However, Emperor Garuda, an evil dictator, threatens New York city and it is up to the Ryu Hayabusa to fight him.

This game is an action side-scroller. Ryu can run, jump and beat his enemies using a sword. He also has a grappling-hook device, which can be used to reach higher platforms, which can then be hand-climbed across. By collecting power ups Ryu can use a magical technique called "the art of the fire wheel", an ascending and spinning wheel of fire which will take more damage than his usual sword. He has up to 5 charges of this technique. Ryu has a life meter with six units, which can be replenished by finding proper power ups inside containers.

The game is divided in 5 stages. Each stages has sub-screens, and the main objective is to go from left to right till the end of the screen, destroying the enemies in the way. Among the enemies Ryu will find humans, cyborgs and machines. At the end of each stage a boss fight awaits Ryu.
Ninja Gaiden Shadow (USA).desc:
《忍者龍劍傳之暗影》是《忍者龍劍傳》的前傳。現在是 1985 年，距 NES 遊戲事件發生還有 3 年，Jaquio 還沒有被喚醒。然而，邪惡的獨裁者迦樓羅皇帝威脅著紐約市，隼龍必須與他作戰。

該遊戲是一款動作橫版捲軸遊戲。龍可以奔跑、跳躍並使用劍擊敗敵人。他還有一個抓鉤裝置，可以用來到達更高的平台，然後可以用手爬上去。通過收集能量提升，Ryu 可以使用一種名為“火輪藝術”的魔法技術，這是一種上升和旋轉的火輪，它會比他常用的劍承受更多的傷害。他對該技術的指控最多為 5 次。Ryu 有一個包含六個單元的生命表，可以通過在容器內找到適當的能量來補充。

比賽分為5個階段。每個階段都有子屏幕，主要目標是從左到右直到屏幕末尾，消滅路上的敵人。在敵人中，Ryu 會發現人類、機器人和機器。每個階段結束時，Ryu 都會面臨一場 Boss 戰。

Batman - The Video Game (World).name: 蝙蝠俠:電子遊戲
Batman - The Video Game (World).original_desc:
He's totally new. Totally tough. And he'll stop at nothing to make sure justice prevails!
From the dark streets of GOTHAM CITY to the deepest corners of the criminal underground comes the CAPED CRUSADER as you've never seen him before.

Incredibly strong. Armed to the teeth. And ready to put his life on the line for the sake of all, on a search-and-destroy mission to end THE JOKER'S reign of terror. He leaps, he flies, he dodges enemy fire and delivers it right back ... with a vengeance.

This is no kid stuff. This is as real as video gaming gets. If you liked what you saw in the movie, you're gonna love what you see here. Because this time around, BATMAN is all business, and he won't let anything ... anything ... stand in his way.
Batman - The Video Game (World).desc:
他是全新的。非常艱難。他將不惜一切代價確保正義得到伸張！
從哥譚市的黑暗街道到地下犯罪的最深處，披著斗篷的十字軍登場，你以前從未見過他。

難以置信的強大。武裝到牙齒。為了所有人的利益，他準備冒著生命危險，執行搜索和摧毀任務，結束小丑的恐怖統治。他跳躍，他飛翔，他躲避敵人的火力，然後將其擊退......以復仇的方式。

這不是小孩子的東西。這就像視頻遊戲一樣真實。如果您喜歡在電影中看到的內容，那麼您也會喜歡在這裡看到的內容。因為這一次，蝙蝠俠只顧公事，他不會讓任何事……任何事……妨礙他。

Bubble Ghost (USA, Europe).name: 泡泡幽靈
Bubble Ghost (USA, Europe).original_desc:
Bubble Ghost needs to blow a bubble out of his creator's castle. Your task is to guide him so as to direct the bubble through the gaps in each room. The bubble's direction is affected by which part of the ghost hits it.

Candles, fans, and other obstacles serve to make little Bubble Ghost's task harder. Bubble Ghost is invincible, but the bubble is prone to bursting if it hits anything at pace. You have five bubbles before the game is over.
Bubble Ghost (USA, Europe).desc:
泡泡幽靈需要從他的創造者的城堡中吹出一個泡泡。你的任務是引導他引導氣泡穿過每個房間的縫隙。氣泡的方向受到幽靈擊中它的部分的影響。

蠟燭、風扇和其他障礙物讓小泡泡幽靈的任務變得更加困難。泡泡幽靈是無敵的，但如果它高速撞到任何東西，泡泡很容易破裂。遊戲結束前你有五個泡泡。

Dr. Mario (World) (Rev 1).name: 馬里奧博士
Dr. Mario (World) (Rev 1).original_desc:
In this Tetris-style game, you play as Dr. Mario, who must drop differently coloured pills onto viruses to remove them from the bottle. Each pill is split into two, with each side being of one of three different colours, red, blue or yellow. Align three pills of the same colour to a virus of the corresponding colour (or any combination of pills and viruses totaling four or more) and it will be removed from the bottle, along with the aligned pills. The level is cleared when there are no viruses left, and the game is over when the pills reach the top and Dr. Mario can't drop any more pills.

Included in the game is the normal mode, a time trial, and a two player battle mode to see who can remove the most viruses.
Dr. Mario (World) (Rev 1).desc:
在這款俄羅斯方塊風格的遊戲中，您扮演馬里奧博士，他必須將不同顏色的藥丸扔到病毒上，以將其從瓶子中清除。每個藥丸被分成兩半，每一面都是三種不同顏色之一：紅色、藍色或黃色。將三個相同顏色的藥丸與相應顏色的病毒（或總共四個或更多藥丸和病毒的任意組合）對齊，它將與對齊的藥丸一起從瓶子中取出。當沒有病毒殘留時，關卡就通關了；當藥丸到達頂部並且馬里奧博士無法再掉落任何藥丸時，遊戲就結束了。

遊戲包括普通模式、計時賽和兩人對戰模式，看看誰能清除最多的病毒。

Ninja Taro (USA).name: 忍者太郎
Ninja Taro (USA).original_desc:
High Adventure in the Far East!
It's the era of feudal war in Japan. One Shogun struggles to unite the provinces, but he needs help.
His villainous arch-rival is rumored to be dead, but a merciless legion of anarchy continues to plague the countryside. If he is dead, then who could be leading the evil forces which prevent Japan from attaining peace and order?

This chaos must be stopped!
From the ranks of the Phantom sect to the Shogun's aid comes Ninja Taro. With the cunning of a thief, the skill of a master, and a legendary sword, he must venture forth to tame the minions of evil, and unravel the riddle that will unite the empire!
Ninja Taro (USA).desc:
遠東的高級冒險！
那是日本的封建戰爭時代。一位幕府將軍努力統一各省，但他需要幫助。
據傳他邪惡的宿敵已經死了，但無情的無政府主義軍團繼續困擾著鄉村。如果他死了，那麼誰會領導阻礙日本實現和平與秩序的邪惡勢力呢？

這種混亂必須停止！
忍者太郎從幻影教的行列中得到了幕府將軍的幫助。憑藉盜賊的狡猾、大師的技藝和傳奇之劍，他必須勇敢前行，馴服邪惡的爪牙，解開統一帝國的謎團！

DuckTales (USA).name: 迪士尼的鴨子故事
DuckTales (USA).original_desc: While in the basement of Uncle Scrooge's mansion, Huey, Dewey and Louie discover an old piece of paper. When they show it to Uncle Scrooge, he recognizes it as part of his great, great Uncle Fergus McDuck's legendary treasure map! With the remaining parts of the map hidden around the world, it's up to Uncle Scrooge to find them and discover Fergus McDuck's secret treasure!
DuckTales (USA).desc: 在史克魯奇叔叔豪宅的地下室裡，休伊、杜威和路易發現了一張舊紙。當他們把它拿給史克魯奇叔叔看時，他認出這是他偉大的弗格斯·麥克老鴨叔叔傳奇藏寶圖的一部分！地圖的其餘部分隱藏在世界各地，史克魯奇叔叔必須找到它們並發現弗格斯·麥克老鴨的秘密寶藏！

Mega Man III (USA).name: 洛克人 III
Mega Man III (USA).original_desc:
Mega Man 3 is a traditional side-scrolling platformer: you jump from brick to brick while avoiding pits and shooting robots. It's quite similar, in all respects, to other Mega Man games; however, this is the first time that you get a sidekick. It's also the first time you're allowed to slide instead of merely walking. 

Rush is your dog who helps out by offering other modes of transportation when you need it. He starts out with the 'Rush Coil' ability to launch you to the top of the screen like a springboard; later he acquires the 'Rush Jet' ability to turn into a guided, floating platform to carry you wherever you need to go; and he also gets the 'Rush Marine' ability which is a submarine that works just like the jet except underwater and with the added ability to hop around out of the water (you can actually jump while on the jet but the jet continues to hover beneath you whereas you stay inside the submarine). All of these abilities function just like boss weapons.

When you defeat the boss at the end of a level you gain his power - or at least a similar power. You may pause the game at any time and switch to any single power you have. It supplants your regular Arm Cannon with a limited - but superior - ability. The weapon ammo is displayed next to your energy meter. There are eight of these, corresponding to the eight main levels, even though there are twenty-one levels in the entire game. 

Enemies will often supply you with both energy and ammo refills. You can also collect Energy Tanks which can only be used once but will entirely restore your health. You start the game with three lives. Other features include Surprise Boxes lying around for you to find. There are infinite continues and a password feature to resume play at the beginning of any level.
Mega Man III (USA).desc:
《洛克人 3》是一款傳統的橫向捲軸平台遊戲：您從一塊磚跳到另一塊磚，同時避開坑和射擊機器人。它在各個方面都與其他《洛克人》遊戲非常相似；然而，這是你第一次得到一個夥伴。這也是您第一次被允許滑行而不僅僅是步行。

Rush 是您的狗，它會在您需要時提供其他交通方式來提供幫助。他首先使用“Rush Coil”能力，將你像跳板一樣發射到屏幕頂部；後來，他獲得了“Rush Jet”能力，可以變成一個引導的浮動平台，帶你去任何你需要去的地方；他還獲得了“衝鋒海軍陸戰隊”能力，這是一艘潛艇，其工作方式與噴氣式飛機一樣，除了在水下，並且具有跳出水面的附加能力（你實際上可以在噴氣式飛機上跳躍，但當你留在潛艇內時，噴氣式飛機繼續在你下面盤旋）。所有這些能力的作用就像老闆武器一樣。

當你在關卡結束時擊敗老闆時，你將獲得他的力量 - 或者至少是類似的力量。您可以隨時暫停遊戲並切換到您擁有的任何單一能力。它以有限但卓越的能力取代了常規的手臂加農炮。武器彈藥顯示在能量計旁邊。儘管整個遊戲有二十一個關卡，但其中有八個，對應八個主要關卡。

敵人通常會為你提供能量和彈藥補充。您還可以收集只能使用一次的能量罐，但會完全恢復您的生命值。你以三個生命開始遊戲。其他功能包括隨處可見的驚喜盒。有無限繼續和密碼功能，可在任何級別開始時恢復遊戲。

Kid Icarus - Of Myths and Monsters (USA,.key: Kid Icarus - Of Myths and Monsters (USA, Europe)
Kid Icarus - Of Myths and Monsters (USA,.original_name: Kid Icarus : Of Myths and Monsters
Kid Icarus - Of Myths and Monsters (USA,.name: 小伊卡洛斯:神話與怪物
Kid Icarus - Of Myths and Monsters (USA,.original_desc:
An evil force is threatening to invade the Angel Land.  Palutena, the ruler-goddess, sends a warrior named Pit on a quest to prepare for the upcoming attack. Pit must find three ancient treasures and face down the evil force.

Kid Icarus: Of Mythis and Monsters is the Game Boy version of one of Nintendo's classic side scrolling platform/adventure games. Throughout the levels Pit will collect hearts, upgrade his strength, collect treasures, and learn to fly.
Kid Icarus - Of Myths and Monsters (USA,.desc:
一股邪惡勢力威脅要入侵天使之地。統治者女神帕魯特娜派遣一位名叫皮特的戰士前去尋找，為即將到來的攻擊做準備。皮特必須找到三件遠古寶藏並對抗邪惡力量。

Kid Icarus: Of Mythis and Monsters 是任天堂經典橫向捲軸平台/冒險遊戲之一的 Game Boy 版本。在整個關卡中，皮特將收集愛心、升級力量、收集寶藏並學習飛行。

Great Greed (USA).name: 大貪婪
Great Greed (USA).original_desc:
As Great Greed begins, you are accidentally warped to another dimension by a wizard by the name of 'Microwave'?. With no immediate way back, you help the people fight off the scourge named 'Bio-Haz' who is consuming this dimension with evil and destruction.

This new dimension you find yourself in is not terribly unlike the one you came from, with the exception that everyone is named after foods or food-related items and most of the monsters appear to be mutated vegetables and the like.

This RPG breaks from the normal formula in a few respects. The battle system does not use any menus, switching all commands to simple button pushes. A being attack, B for dodge, Start will run and the D-Pad is shortcuts to certain spells. The combat is also live, in the sense that if you take too long to complete your turn, your opponent will attack again.

Using a battery-backed save system, the game will automatically auto-save after every successful battle.
Great Greed (USA).desc:
隨著《大貪婪》的開始，你不小心被一個名叫“微波”的巫師扭曲到了另一個維度？在沒有立即回頭路的情況下，你幫助人們擊退名為“Bio-Haz”的禍害，它正在以邪惡和破壞吞噬這個維度。

你發現自己所處的這個新維度與你原來的維度並沒有太大不同，除了每個人都以食物或與食物相關的物品命名，而且大多數怪物似乎都是變異的蔬菜等。

這款角色扮演遊戲在幾個方面打破了常規模式。戰鬥系統不使用任何菜單，將所有命令切換為簡單的按鈕按下。A 表示攻擊，B 表示閃避，開始將運行，方向鍵是某些咒語的快捷方式。戰鬥也是實時的，如果你花太長時間完成回合，你的對手將再次攻擊。

使用電池供電的保存系統，遊戲將在每次成功的戰鬥後自動保存。

Atomic Punk (USA).name: 原子朋克
Atomic Punk (USA).original_desc: Dynablaster lets you battle through classic Bomberman action in single-player or take on new twists in Game A, where you explore zones from a world map in any order. The faster you clear a level and the more blocks you destroy, the more gold you earn to spend on power-ups like extra lives or extended blast ranges. Before entering each new area, you choose which of these panels to bring along. In multiplayer mode, you face off in classic Bomberman fashion – either in Panel Mode, where players start weak and gather upgrades, or in Powerful Mode, where you launch into the chaos with full firepower. Strategy, timing, and nerves of steel will decide whether you dominate or go out in a glorious blast.
Atomic Punk (USA).desc: 在《Dynablaster》中，您可以在單人遊戲中體驗經典的炸彈人動作，也可以在遊戲 A 中體驗新的變化，以任意順序探索世界地圖中的區域。你通關的速度越快，摧毀的方塊越多，你賺到的金幣就越多，可以花在額外生命或擴大爆炸範圍等能量提升上。在進入每個新區域之前，您選擇要攜帶哪些面板。在多人遊戲模式中，你以經典的炸彈人風格對峙——無論是在面板模式下，玩家開始較弱並收集升級，還是在強大模式下，你以全火力進入混亂。策略、時機和鋼鐵般的意志將決定你是佔據主導地位還是在光榮的爆炸中出局。

Tiny Toon Adventures - Babs' Big Break (.key: Tiny Toon Adventures - Babs' Big Break (USA, Europe)
Tiny Toon Adventures - Babs' Big Break (.original_name: Tiny Toon Adventures : Babs' Big Break
Tiny Toon Adventures - Babs' Big Break (.name: 小小卡通歷險記：寶寶的大突破
Tiny Toon Adventures - Babs' Big Break (.original_desc:
Tiny Toon Adventures is based on an animated series of the same name. The Tiny Toons are kid versions of Warner Bros. famous cartoon characters.

Babs is an aspiring actress. She sets off one day to perfect her craft and make her way to the theater. Buster Bunny, and his friends Plucky and Hampton, notice that Babs is leaving and decide to follow her to the theater. Thus, the game starts, as you control Buster, Plucky, or Hampton as they follow Babs through 4 side-scrolling levels.
Tiny Toon Adventures - Babs' Big Break (.desc:
《小小卡通歷險記》改編自同名動畫系列。小卡通是華納兄弟著名卡通人物的兒童版本。

巴布斯是一位有抱負的女演員。有一天，她出發去完善自己的技藝，並前往劇院。巴斯特兔和他的朋友勇敢和漢普頓注意到巴布斯要離開，並決定跟隨她去劇院。因此，遊戲開始，您控制 Buster、Plucky 或 Hampton，讓他們跟隨 Babs 通過 4 個橫向捲軸關卡。

Gargoyle's Quest (USA, Europe).name: 石像鬼的任務
Gargoyle's Quest (USA, Europe).original_desc:
The friendly Ghoul Realm was invaded by aliens know as the Destroyers ages ago.  The Destroyers almost captured the Ghoul Realm except a powerful fire came from the sky and destroyed them.  The Realm is threatened again and the secret of the fire must be recovered.

You play Firebrand, a gargoyle who has powerful claws that allow him to cling to walls and other surfaces on a verticle plane.  Firebrand can also hover and fly for awhile with his wings.  Destroy the enemy characters with your firery breath.  The game also contains an adventure type story that is unfolded by interacting with characters from an over-head perspective.
Gargoyle's Quest (USA, Europe).desc:
友好的食屍鬼王國很久以前就被稱為毀滅者的外星人入侵了。毀滅者幾乎佔領了食屍鬼領域，但從天而降的強大火焰摧毀了他們。王國再次受到威脅，必須恢復火的秘密。

你扮演Firebrand，一個石像鬼，擁有強大的爪子，可以讓他緊貼牆壁和垂直平面上的其他表面。Firebrand還可以用他的翅膀懸停和飛行一段時間。用你的火焰呼吸摧毀敵人角色。遊戲還包含一個冒險類型的故事，通過從俯視角度與角色互動來展開。

Picross 2 (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (Transl.name: 繪圖方塊 2
Picross 2 (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (Transl.original_desc:
Picross 2 is the Japanese only sequel to the Game Boy puzzle game, Mario's Picross.  Your goal is to reveal the hidden picture inside each grid by chipping away the correct squares.  Clues along the grid's edges help you figure out which squares should be chipped away, and which should be left alone.  The puzzles are much more advanced than those in Mario's Picross - easy puzzles are in a 15x15 grid, while standard Picross puzzles are four 15x15 grids connected together, solved one section at a time.

Picross 2 has two modes of play: the first, Mario's Picross, has you solving Picross puzzles with Mario.  In this mode, the timer ticks down from 30 minutes, and you must solve the puzzle before the timer reaches zero.  If you chip away an incorrect square, you are penalized time (first two minutes, then four, then eight).

After solving a certain amount of puzzles in Mario's Picross mode, you can play Wario's Picross.  In this mode, the timer starts from zero and counts upwards.  You are not penalized time for any mistakes, however, this means that you do not know which squares are correct and which ones are incorrect until the puzzle is complete.
Picross 2 (Japan) (SGB Enhanced) (Transl.desc:
《Picross 2》是 Game Boy 益智遊戲 Mario's Picross 的日本唯一續作。您的目標是通過消除正確的方塊來揭示每個網格內隱藏的圖片。網格邊緣的線索可以幫助您找出哪些方塊應該被削掉，哪些方塊應該保留。這些謎題比 Mario's Picross 中的謎題高級得多 - 簡單的謎題是在 15x15 網格中，而標準的 Picross 謎題是四個連接在一起的 15x15 網格，一次解決一個部分。

Picross 2 有兩種遊戲模式：第一種是 Mario 的 Picross，讓您與 Mario 一起解決 Picross 謎題。在此模式下，計時器從 30 分鐘開始計時，您必須在計時器歸零之前解決謎題。如果您消除了不正確的方塊，您將受到處罰（前兩分鐘，然後四分鐘，然後八分鐘）。

在馬里奧的繪圖方塊模式中解決一定數量的謎題後，您就可以玩瓦里奧的繪圖方塊。在此模式下，計時器從零開始向上計數。您不會因任何錯誤而受到懲罰，但這意味著您在拼圖完成之前不知道哪些方格是正確的，哪些方格是錯誤的。

Rolan's Curse (USA).name: 羅蘭的詛咒
Rolan's Curse (USA).original_desc:
Once the people of Rolan was terrorized by the evil ruler King Barius before he was imprisoned in a castle deep within the forest. When the king many years later was released he immediately unleashed legions of regenerating monsters on the citizens of the land. Now a hero (or two if you play it in multiplayer) is needed to defeat him and his minions.

The game is an action based RPG played with an isometric perspective. As you battle your way through enemy territory you have two weapons, the sword that you start the game with and a Fire Wand that throws fireballs. You will also find some items to use, i.e. a magic axe that can be used to clear blocked passages, chamelon's ring that makes you part of the terrain and shield to help in defense.
Rolan's Curse (USA).desc:
曾經，羅蘭的人民受到邪惡統治者巴里烏斯國王的恐嚇，然後將他囚禁在森林深處的一座城堡裡。許多年後，當國王被釋放時，他立即向這片土地上的公民釋放了大批再生怪物。現在需要一個英雄（或者兩個，如果你在多人遊戲中玩的話）來擊敗他和他的爪牙。

該遊戲是一款基於等距視角的動作角色扮演遊戲。當你在敵人的領土上戰鬥時，你有兩種武器，你開始遊戲時使用的劍和可以投擲火球的火杖。你還會發現一些可以使用的物品，例如可以用來清理堵塞通道的魔法斧頭、讓你成為地形一部分的變色龍戒指和幫助防禦的盾牌。

Battle Arena Toshinden (USA) (SGB Enhanc.name: 斗場東信田
Battle Arena Toshinden (USA) (SGB Enhanc.original_desc:
In Battle Arena Toshinden eight world renown weapon fighters have been invited to a mysterious tournament. It is one of the first one-on-one beat-em-ups to feature the ability to sidestep a full 360 degrees around the opponent allowing one to strike from any angle. Aside from the 3D movement, Toshinden's game play can be considered similar to Street Fighter, but in 3d and with a little less depth to the moves.

Two versions of Toshinden were released; for the Sony PlayStation and later a lesser known version for DOS PC's. However the PC version is not a straight port of the PlayStation version and plays and looks notably different despite sharing the same characters, attacks and controls.

The U.S and E.U PlayStation versions of Toshinden feature redone voices in English and redone music using different instruments. 

The lyrics on Sofia's stage music in the Japanese version, which were actually in English, were removed in the process, likely due to their suggestive nature. 

Sofia's and Ellis' voices in the English translation are also notably adjusted, for presumably the same reason; while the other characters English voices generally match the tones of the original Japanese voice actors, Sofia is far less suggestive sounding, while Ellis sounds notably older.

The later DOS version of Toshinden however, uses the same audio as the Japanese PlayStation version in all regions, albeit recorded at a considerably lower quality than they were on PlayStation.
Battle Arena Toshinden (USA) (SGB Enhanc.desc:
在戰鬥競技場 Toshinden，八位世界知名的武器戰士被邀請參加一場神秘的錦標賽。它是首款能夠繞開對手 360 度的一對一格鬥遊戲之一，允許玩家從任何角度進行攻擊。除了 3D 動作之外，《Toshinden》的遊戲玩法可以被認為與《街頭霸王》類似，但採用 3D 形式，並且動作深度稍差一些。

發行了兩個版本的 Toshinden；適用於索尼 PlayStation，後來又推出了鮮為人知的適用於 DOS PC 的版本。然而，PC 版本並不是 PlayStation 版本的直接移植版，儘管共享相同的角色、攻擊和控制，但遊戲玩法和外觀卻明顯不同。

美國和歐盟 PlayStation 版本的《Toshinden》採用了重製的英語語音和使用不同樂器重製的音樂。

日版索菲亞舞台音樂中的歌詞實際上是英文的，但在此過程中被刪除，可能是因為它們具有暗示性。

出於同樣的原因，英文翻譯中索菲亞和埃利斯的聲音也進行了顯著調整；雖然其他角色的英語聲音通常與原始日本配音演員的語氣相匹配，但索菲亞的聲音聽起來遠沒有那麼具有暗示性，而埃利斯聽起來明顯更老。

然而，後來的 DOS 版本的《Toshinden》在所有地區都使用與日本 PlayStation 版本相同的音頻，儘管錄製質量比 PlayStation 上的要低得多。

Penguin Wars (USA).name: 企鵝大戰
Penguin Wars (USA).original_desc: Are you ready to indulge in some animal antics? To compete with some fun-loving characters? Then PENGUIN WARS is the game for you! The action never stops as you try to roll ten balls across the playing court while your wacky opponent attempts to do the same. Pitch 'em! Dodge 'em! You won't have a second to rest once this game gets rolling!
Penguin Wars (USA).desc: 你準備好體驗一些動物的滑稽動作了嗎？與一些有趣的角色競爭？那麼《企鵝戰爭》就是適合您的遊戲！當您嘗試在球場上滾動十個球時，動作永遠不會停止，而您古怪的對手也試圖做同樣的事情。推銷他們！躲避他們！一旦遊戲開始，你就沒有時間休息了！

Wario Land II (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhance.name: 瓦里奧大陸2
Wario Land II (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhance.original_desc:
Seeking revenge on Wario after he stole their treasure in Wario Land: Super Mario Land 3, special agents from the Black Sugar Gang of Kitchen Island sneak into Wario's newly built castle, steal back the treasure, and leave the castle and the surrounding area a mess. As Wario, you must clean the place up and take back what you now call your own.

In a change from the original Wario Land, Wario is now immortal, to a certain point. Instead of dying when hit by an enemy, Wario loses the coins he collected along his travels in each level. And he can also turn into other Warios. For example, if he is hit by a bee, Wario puffs up into a giant ball of air, and floats up to the top of the level. Only when hit by a sharp object will he return to normal. There are other types, like Fire Wario and Zombie Wario, and each can have its advantages, like getting to other areas otherwise unreachable, or they can halt your progress.
Wario Land II (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhance.desc:
廚房島黑糖幫的特工在《瓦里奧樂園：超級馬里奧樂園3》中偷走了瓦里奧的寶藏後，為了向瓦里奧報仇，潛入瓦里奧新建的城堡，偷回寶藏，讓城堡和周邊地區一片狼藉。作為瓦里奧，你必須清理這個地方並奪回你現在所謂的自己的東西。

與最初的瓦里奧大陸相比，瓦里奧現在在某種程度上是不朽的。瓦里奧並沒有在被敵人擊中時死亡，而是失去了他在每個關卡中收集的硬幣。而且他還可以變成其他瓦里奧。例如，如果他被蜜蜂擊中，瓦里奧就會膨脹成一個巨大的氣球，並漂浮到水平的頂部。只有被尖銳物體擊中，他才會恢復正常。還有其他類型，例如火焰瓦里奧和殭屍瓦里奧，每種類型都有其優勢，例如到達其他無法到達的區域，或者它們可能會阻止您的進度。

Tetris 2 (USA, Europe) (Rev 1) (SGB Enha.name: 俄羅斯方塊2
Tetris 2 (USA, Europe) (Rev 1) (SGB Enha.original_desc:
Unlike the original Tetris, Tetris 2 has you clearing the field of blocks in a different way. Each play field starts with different colored dots (in this case black, gray and white), with one of each color flashing. 

The blocks are made up of the same three colors, and by matching blocks of the same color over the top or to the side of the dot will clear the dot and those blocks from the screen. If you clear a flashing dot, all the corresponding dots of the same color will be cleared.

To complete the round just clear the dots, not the blocks themselves.
Tetris 2 (USA, Europe) (Rev 1) (SGB Enha.desc:
與原版俄羅斯方塊不同，俄羅斯方塊 2 讓您以不同的方式清除方塊。每個遊戲區域都以不同顏色的點（在本例中為黑色、灰色和白色）開始，每種顏色中的一個會閃爍。

這些塊由相同的三種顏色組成，通過將相同顏色的塊匹配到點的頂部或側面，可以清除屏幕上的點和這些塊。如果清除一個閃爍的點，則所有相應的相同顏色的點都將被清除。

要完成這一輪，只需清除點，而不是塊本身。

Final Fantasy Legend, The (USA).name: 最终幻想VII
Final Fantasy Legend, The (USA).original_desc:
The first 'Final Fantasy' title on the Game Boy, Legend allows you to choose from 8 different characters, from the usual human male or female to zombie, wererat, redbull (not the drink), clipper or mutant male or female. No matter which you choose, the goal stays the same: Increase your experience points and abilities by defeating many varied enemies through-out the land.

Much like the FF series of old (and new), you can choose members to join your party and the quest that lies ahead (either warriors, mutants or creatures). Every character has a limit to the amount of moves available during every battle and experience points are gained after each fight, increasing stamina, power, etc.
Final Fantasy Legend, The (USA).desc:
Game Boy 上的第一個“最終幻想”遊戲 Legend 允許您從 8 個不同的角色中進行選擇，從常見的人類男性或女性到殭屍、鼠人、紅牛（不是飲料）、快船或變異男性或女性。無論您選擇哪一個，目標都保持不變：通過擊敗這片土地上的許多不同的敵人來增加您的經驗值和能力。

就像 FF 系列的舊（和新）一樣，你可以選擇成員加入你的隊伍和前方的任務（戰士、變種人或生物）。每個角色在每次戰鬥中的可用移動量都有限制，每次戰鬥後都會獲得經驗值，增加耐力、力量等。

Pocket Bomberman (Europe) (SGB Enhanced).name: 袖珍轟炸機人
Pocket Bomberman (Europe) (SGB Enhanced).original_desc: In contrast to the overhead view of other Bomberman titles, Pocket Bomberman features sidescrolling platformer gameplay. Like other Bomberman games, Bomberman must defeat all enemies in each stage to advance. The game features a total of 5 worlds spanning 25 levels. Each world follows a different theme, including forest, underwater, cloudtops and a dark underworld. At the end of each world is a boss fight. There is one mini game called Jump Mode in which players must guide Bomberman through an Easy, Medium, or Hard course. Bomberman will constantly jump and the player can only place bombs in this mode.
Pocket Bomberman (Europe) (SGB Enhanced).desc: 與其他 Bomberman 遊戲的俯視圖相比，Pocket Bomberman 具有橫向捲軸平台遊戲玩法。與其他炸彈人遊戲一樣，炸彈人必須擊敗每個階段的所有敵人才能晉級。遊戲共有 5 個世界，25 個關卡。每個世界都有不同的主題，包括森林、水下、雲端和黑暗的地下世界。每個世界的盡頭都會有一場 Boss 戰。有一款名為“跳躍模式”的迷你游戲，玩家必須引導炸彈人完成簡單、中等或困難的路線。炸彈人會不斷跳躍，玩家只能在此模式下放置炸彈。

James Bond 007 (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhanc.name: 007：初露锋芒
James Bond 007 (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhanc.original_desc:
Bond is once again in the thick of things, this time travelling the eastern hemisphere in order to stop an elite weapons smuggling ring. In order to do so, Bond must use all of the weapons and gadgets on hand, including the trusty laser watch, pistols, Ak-47's and more.

Bond will also have the chance to visit the casino, where you can spend some cash on blackjack and the like, while some of the most famous Bond villains make appearances in the hopes that they will stop the secret agent from completing his task.
James Bond 007 (USA, Europe) (SGB Enhanc.desc:
邦德再次陷入困境，這一次他前往東半球，以阻止精英武器走私團伙。為了做到這一點，邦德必須使用手頭的所有武器和小玩意，包括值得信賴的激光手錶、手槍、Ak-47 等等。

邦德還將有機會參觀賭場，在那裡你可以花一些現金購買二十一點等，而一些最著名的邦德惡棍也會出現，希望他們能阻止特工完成他的任務。

Cosmo Tank (USA).name: 宇宙坦克
Cosmo Tank (USA).original_desc: CosmoTank is a space tank battle game. You're the commander of the tank 'Tiger a-1' and your mission is to fight on land and in space against the Master Insect and his minions. The game features both top-down levels and first person levels in which you can freely move around in all directions. Settings feature both open outdoor environments, caves and space.  Slowly upgrade your cannon and armor as you progress for more firepower and the ability to sustain more hits.
Cosmo Tank (USA).desc: CosmoTank 是一款太空坦克戰鬥遊戲。你是“Tiger a-1”坦克的指揮官，你的任務是在陸地和太空中對抗昆蟲大師和他的爪牙。該遊戲具有自上而下的關卡和第一人稱關卡，您可以在其中自由地向各個方向移動。設置具有開放的室外環境、洞穴和空間。隨著你的進步，慢慢升級你的大砲和裝甲，以獲得更多的火力和承受更多命中的能力。

R-Type II (Europe).name: R-Type II
R-Type II (Europe).original_desc:
The second R-Type brings more of the same shoot-em up action.
Gameplay is identical to the previous R-Type, except you now have two new weapons.

There are six levels, with themes similar to the previous game.  Notable parts include an underwater battle in level 2, and a giant Bydo fleet in level 3.

The Game Boy version of R-Type 2 is missing 1 level and both of the new weapons from the original arcade game.
R-Type II (Europe).desc:
第二款 R-Type 帶來了更多相同的射擊動作。
遊戲玩法與之前的 R-Type 相同，只是你現在有了兩種新武器。

有六個關卡，主題與前作類似。值得注意的部分包括第 2 關中的水下戰鬥和第 3 關中的巨型 Bydo 艦隊。

Game Boy 版本的 R-Type 2 缺少 1 個關卡以及原街機遊戲中的兩種新武器。

Quarth (USA, Europe).name: 誇斯
Quarth (USA, Europe).original_desc: Quarth is a typical puzzle/arcade game. Quarth can be moved from right to left while the screen scrolls down. The playing field is filled with different blocks and your aim is to fill them in so they form complete rectangles or squares. Only when you succeed in this mission, the concerned blocks will disappear. New 'unformed' blocks appear while the playing field scrolls down making you play into full action at all times. As soon as a line of blocks reaches the bottom line, it is Game Over. Then you'll be granted 10 seconds to decide if you want continue the level. Each Level consists of 9 Areas and you progress to the next level once you've cleared the last area. The Battle mode is a dual player mode.
Quarth (USA, Europe).desc: Quarth 是一款典型的益智/街機遊戲。當屏幕向下滾動時，Quarth 可以從右向左移動。比賽場地充滿了不同的方塊，你的目標是將它們填滿，使它們形成完整的矩形或正方形。只有當你成功完成這個任務時，相關的方塊才會消失。當比賽場地向下滾動時，會出現新的“未成型”方塊，讓您始終充分發揮作用。一旦一行方塊到達底線，遊戲就結束了。然後您將有 10 秒的時間來決定是否要繼續該關卡。每個級別由 9 個區域組成，清除最後一個區域後即可進入下一個級別。對戰模式是雙人遊戲模式。

Legend of Zelda, The - Link's Awakening.key: Legend of Zelda, The - Link's Awakening (USA, Europe) (Rev 2)
Legend of Zelda, The - Link's Awakening.original_name: The Legend of Zelda : Link's Awakening
Legend of Zelda, The - Link's Awakening.name: 薩爾達傳說 智慧的再現
Legend of Zelda, The - Link's Awakening.original_desc: After being attacked at sea, Link's ship sinks, and he finds himself stranded on Koholint Island. He awakens to see a beautiful woman looking down at him. He soon learns the island has a giant egg on top of a mountain that the Wind Fish inhabits deep inside. Link is told to "awaken the wind fish and all will be answered," so Link sets out on another quest.
Legend of Zelda, The - Link's Awakening.desc: 在海上遭到襲擊後，林克的船沉沒，他發現自己被困在科霍林特島。他醒來時看到一個美麗的女人正俯視著他。他很快得知島上的山頂上有一個巨大的蛋，風魚棲息在裡面。林克被告知“喚醒風魚，一切都會得到答案”，因此林克開始了另一個任務。

Ninja Boy (USA, Europe).name: 忍者男孩
Ninja Boy (USA, Europe).original_desc:
Ninja Boy is based off Super Chinese. 

As such, players control a young Kung-Fu hero from a bird's-eye perspective and are able to move and attack up, down, left, right. Players use the hero's punch and kick abilities to defeat enemies. 

Players can also find weapons and other items scattered across the game to use against the enemy hordes. After defeating a set number of enemies the players is allowed to run into an exit and proceed to the next level.  

As the levels progress, difficult enemies become more numerous.
Ninja Boy (USA, Europe).desc:
忍者男孩是根據《超級中國人》改編的。

因此，玩家以鳥瞰的視角控制年輕的功夫英雄，並能夠上下左右移動和攻擊。玩家使用英雄的拳打腳踢能力來擊敗敵人。

玩家還可以找到分散在遊戲中的武器和其他物品來對抗敵人。擊敗一定數量的敵人後，玩家可以跑進出口並進入下一關。

隨著關卡的進展，困難的敵人會變得越來越多。

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III - Radic.key: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III - Radical Rescue (USA)
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III - Radic.original_name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III : Radical Rescue
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III - Radic.name: 忍者神龜 III : 徹底營救
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III - Radic.original_desc:
The player begins the game by taking control of Michaelangelo, who must rescue the other turtles, along with Splinter and April O'Neil, who have been kidnapped by Shredder.[2] Unlike other games based on the franchise, this is a scrolling action-adventure game reminiscent of the Metroid and the later Castlevania: Symphony of the Night. Each turtle has a different ability which is necessary to finish the game. Michaelangelo can hover using his nunchakus as a helicopter, Leonardo can drill the floor by spinning with his katana, Raphael can hide himself inside his shell to enter passages that are otherwise too small to enter, and Donatello can stick to and climb walls.

The bosses are Scratch, Dirtbag, a Triceraton, Scale Tale, and Shredder (in this game known as Cyber-Shredder).
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III - Radic.desc:
玩家在遊戲開始時控制米開朗基羅，他必須拯救其他海龜，以及被施萊德綁架的斯普林特和阿普麗爾·奧尼爾。[2]與其他基於該系列的遊戲不同，這是一款捲軸動作冒險遊戲，讓人想起《銀河戰士》和後來的《惡魔城：夜想曲》。每隻烏龜都有不同的能力，這是完成遊戲所必需的。米開朗基羅可以使用他的雙截棍作為直升機懸停，達芬奇可以通過用武士刀旋轉來鑽地板，拉斐爾可以將自己隱藏在他的殼內以進入否則太小而無法進入的通道，而多納泰羅可以堅持並攀爬牆壁。

Boss 是 Scratch、Dirtbag、Triceraton、Scale Tale 和 Shredder（在本遊戲中稱為 Cyber-Shredder）。

Nemesis (USA).name: 復仇女神
Nemesis (USA).original_desc:
Nemesis is the first entry in the long-running Gradius series on the Game Boy. Its side-scrolling shoot'em up gameplay follows the series template closely. Players control the Vic Viper through five levels, most based on levels in earlier entries, for a kind of 'greatest hits' of the series. There is a cave level (as in level 1 of the original Gradius), the mandatory Moai stage, a Gigeresque organic level, a graveyard (similar to bonus stages in the MSX and PC Engine version of the original Gradius) and a high-tech base. Besides the classic core ship in the first level, all boss enemies are entirely new.

The cycling Gradius power-up system is reused here: collected power ups advance the power meter which can be activated at any time to gain the highlighted item. The line-up includes the classic selection of speedups, missiles, dual shots, lasers, option satellites and forcefields.

The game allows players to start in any of the five levels and even to set the number of lives to a maximum of 99.
Nemesis (USA).desc:
Nemesis 是 Game Boy 上長期運行的 Gradius 系列的第一款作品。其橫向捲軸射擊遊戲玩法緊密遵循系列模板。玩家通過五個關卡控制 Vic Viper，大部分是基於早期作品中的關卡，這是該系列的“最熱門”遊戲。有一個洞穴關卡（與原版 Gradius 的第 1 級相同）、強制性的摩艾關卡、Gigeresque 有機關卡、墓地（類似於原版 Gradius 的 MSX 和 PC 引擎版本中的獎勵關卡）和高科技基地。除了第一關的經典核心船外，所有頭目敵人都是全新的。

此處重複使用了循環 Gradius 能量提升系統：收集的能量提升可推進功率計，功率計可隨時激活以獲得突出顯示的項目。該陣容包括加速器、導彈、雙發、激光、可選衛星和力場的經典選擇。

遊戲允許玩家從五個級別中的任意一個開始，甚至可以將生命數設置為最大 99。

Wave Race (USA, Europe).name: 波浪競賽
Wave Race (USA, Europe).original_desc:
Wave Race for the Game Boy is an aquatic racing game. You control a personal water craft around courses that are marked out by buoys in the circuit mode. In the slalom mode, you must maneuver through several sets of gates floating on the water.

Gameplay is viewed from an overhead perspective. There are four racers in each race. They can be controlled either by human players or by very tough AI controlled players.
Wave Race (USA, Europe).desc:
Game Boy 的 Wave Race 是一款水上賽車遊戲。您可以在電路模式下控制由浮標標記的路線周圍的個人船隻。在迴轉模式中，您必須通過漂浮在水面上的幾組門。

遊戲玩法是從俯視角度來看的。每場比賽有四名選手參加。它們可以由人類玩家控制，也可以由非常強大的人工智能控制玩家控制。

Parodius (Europe).name: 顯示後
Parodius (Europe).original_desc:
This is mostly the parody of Gradius (Nemesis on some systems), with some flavor from other shoot-em-ups, like Twinbee. The series is available on numerous platforms.

The game is a right-to-left scrolling shoot-em-up. You can choose from 4 different flying creatures, with different weapons. You must finish 7 stages, each having a boss at the end. You may start at either one, but must complete every level to advance to the final stage.
Parodius (Europe).desc:
這主要是對 Gradius（某些系統上的 Nemesis）的模仿，帶有一些來自其他射擊遊戲（如 Twinbee）的味道。該系列可在多個平台上使用。

該遊戲是一款從右到左滾動的射擊遊戲。您可以從 4 種不同的飛行生物中進行選擇，並配備不同的武器。你必須完成 7 個階段，每個階段最後都有一個 Boss。您可以從任一級別開始，但必須完成每個級別才能進入最後階段。

Metal Masters (USA).name: 金屬大師
Metal Masters (USA).original_desc:
Metal Masters is a one versus one fighting game with robots. Each robot has two basic attacks: ranged and melee; which one is used depends on how close the opponent is. In each scenario, the player can control the attacks of the robot: when in ranged mode the used weapon system is chosen (each of the four body parts has its own) and during melee combat, the direction of the punches is controlled. 

Each successful hit gives points which decide the winner if no fighter goes down within the time limit. A knockdown is achieved by emptying the opponent's life bar. Additionally each hit (with a big bonus for winning) gives prize money which in turn is invested in upgrading the robot. The player can buy new parts for the four components (main body, legs and the individual arms) - but an upgraded robot also influences the difficulty of the next enemy. While being inside a fight, the AI can be set to take over the own robot.
Metal Masters (USA).desc:
Metal Masters 是一款與機器人一對一的格鬥遊戲。每個機器人都有兩種基本攻擊：遠程和近戰；使用哪一種取決於對手的距離有多近。在每種場景中，玩家都可以控制機器人的攻擊：在遠程模式下，選擇所使用的武器系統（四個身體部位都有自己的武器系統），在近戰戰鬥中，控制出拳的方向。

每次成功擊中都會給予分數，如果沒有戰鬥機在時限內倒下，則分數決定獲勝者。擊倒是通過清空對手的生命條來實現的。此外，每次擊中（獲勝後可獲得巨額獎金）都會獲得獎金，而獎金又將用於投資升級機器人。玩家可以為四個部件（主體、腿和單獨的手臂）購買新零件 - 但升級的機器人也會影響下一個敵人的難度。在戰鬥中，人工智能可以設置為接管自己的機器人。

Game & Watch Gallery (USA) (Rev 1) (SGB.name: 遊戲與手錶畫廊
Game & Watch Gallery (USA) (Rev 1) (SGB.original_desc:
The Game & Watch Gallery is Nintendo's first portable compilation featuring their popular line of original 1980's handheld games, featuring the popular "Mr. Game & Watch" himself, as well as Mario and friends.

The compilation consists of four popular titles from the Game & Watch Series, each with a "Classic" and "Modern" version of each game:

1. Octopus: Collects as much treasure as your bag can hold, while avoiding the octopus tentacles that continually swing around you.  In the "Modern" version, Mario becomes the diver, and as he collects more treasure, his bag becomes heavier, making it harder to return to the surface.  Mario can also delay the octopus tentacles by throwing treasure at them.

Fire: Position your net to catch the falling people jumping from the burning building.  The "Modern" version has Mario and Luigi rescuing Toad, Yoshi and Donkey Kong Jr. from Princess Peach's Castle.  Each falling character has different weights and falling patterns.

Manhole: The player must cover the holes to keep the continually walking people from falling through the manholes and into the sewers.  In the "Modern" version, Yoshi must use his tongue to keep Mario, Toad and Donkey Kong Jr. from falling thought the hole, each character having different speeds and patterns.

Oil Panic: The player must collect the dripping blobs of oil before they slip past and ruin everything.  The "Modern" version has Bowser dropping oil blobs at Mario, who has to catch the oil and dump it over to Yoshi before the Koopa King gets the best of Mario.

Each mode (Classic and Modern) has two difficulties: Easy and Hard.  The higher score a player gets in each version, new unlockable bonuses will become available via the "Gallery Corner".  These bonuses include release dates, pictures and animations which tell in greater detail the history behind Gunpei Yokoi's portable creations.
Game & Watch Gallery (USA) (Rev 1) (SGB.desc:
Game & Watch Gallery 是 Nintendo 的首個便攜式合集，展示了 1980 年代流行的原創掌上游戲系列，其中包括廣受歡迎的“Game & Watch 先生”本人以及馬里奧和朋友們。

該彙編由 Game & Watch 系列的四款熱門遊戲組成，每款遊戲都有“經典”和“現代”版本：

1. 章魚：收集盡可能多的寶藏，同時避開不斷在你周圍擺動的章魚觸手。在“現代”版本中，馬里奧成為潛水員，隨著他收集的寶藏越多，他的包就會變得更重，從而更難返回水面。馬里奧還可以通過向章魚觸手扔寶物來延遲它們的觸手。

火災：放置網以捕捉從燃燒的建築物中跳下的墜落人員。“現代”版本中，馬里奧和路易吉從桃子公主的城堡中救出蟾蜍、耀西和小金剛。每個墜落角色都有不同的重量和墜落模式。

沙井：玩家必須蓋住洞，以防止不斷行走的人們從沙井掉入下水道。在“現代”版本中，耀西必須用舌頭阻止馬里奧、蟾蜍和小金剛掉進洞裡，每個角色都有不同的速度和模式。

石油恐慌：玩家必須收集滴下的油滴，以免它們滑過並毀掉一切。在“現代”版本中，庫巴向馬里奧扔了油滴，馬里奧必須接住油並將其傾倒給耀西，然後庫帕國王才能擊敗馬里奧。

每種模式（經典和現代）都有兩個難度：簡單和困難。玩家在每個版本中獲得的分數越高，將通過“畫廊角”獲得新的可解鎖獎金。這些獎勵包括發布日期、圖片和動畫，更詳細地講述了橫井軍平便攜式創作背後的歷史。

Maru's Mission (USA).name: 瑪魯的使命
Maru's Mission (USA).original_desc:
One day while Maru and Cori are taking a walk in Central Park, a strange thing happens. Out of nowhere this weird looking guy shows up and waylays the unsuspecting couple. Before Maru can respond, the weird looking guy and Cori vanish without a trace, leaving Maru behind wondering what in the world just happened.

Maru's Mission is a side scrolling action game. Traveling throughout the world from such locations as the USA and Romania, you fight mythological monsters such as Isis and Dracula. 

Maru can shoot sparks in rapid succession and can also get access to a variety of powerful different weapons. Maru can collect hearts to replenish his health and jump to avoid obstacles or dodge enemies. Levels are usually finished by defeating a level boss which sometimes earns a new weapon.
Maru's Mission (USA).desc:
有一天，當馬魯和科里在中央公園散步時，發生了一件奇怪的事情。這個長相怪異的傢伙突然出現並攔住了這對毫無戒心的夫婦。還沒等 Maru 做出反應，那個奇怪的傢伙和 Cori 就消失得無影無踪，留下 Maru 不知道到底發生了什麼。

《Maru's Mission》是一款橫向捲軸動作遊戲。從美國和羅馬尼亞等地周遊世界，與伊希斯和德古拉等神話怪物作戰。

Maru 可以快速連續發射火花，還可以使用各種強大的不同武器。馬魯可以收集紅心來補充生命值，並跳躍來避開障礙物或躲避敵人。關卡通常是通過擊敗關卡老闆來完成的，有時會獲得新武器。

Painter Momopie (Japan) (Translated).name: 畫家莫莫派
Painter Momopie (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
In Painter Momopie the player has the important task to wipe all the castle floors. The castle is divided into several rooms which have to be finished within a time limit one after another. Those rooms have varying layouts with more open spaces, tight gangways or dead ends - but every field is dirty.

 Cleaning is the simple matter of walking over a tile and if everything is clean, the level is done. However, there are also ghosts walking around the rooms which kill the player at touch.

 The protagonist has access to a few magic spells which grant advantages when used, e.g. a time stop, killing a near enemy or speed up. Each spell costs a certain amount of magic points.
Painter Momopie (Japan) (Translated).desc:
在 Painter Momopie 中，玩家的重要任務是擦拭城堡的所有地板。城堡分為幾個房間，必須在規定的時間內依次完成。這些房間的佈局各不相同，有更多的開放空間、狹窄的過道或死胡同——但每個地方都很髒。

清潔很簡單，只需在瓷磚上行走即可，如果一切都乾淨，則水平度已完成。然而，房間裡也有鬼魂走來走去，一碰就會殺死玩家。

主角可以使用一些魔法咒語，這些咒語在使用時會帶來優勢，例如時間停止，殺死附近的敵人或加速。每個法術都會消耗一定數量的魔法點。

Fastest Lap (USA).name: 最快圈速
Fastest Lap (USA).original_desc: In this game you play the role of a F1 race car driver who wants to make it to the top. The gameplay involves you doing qualifying laps and  then racing opponents in the main races. The game is played from a top down perspective. You can also tweak your cars engine and tires to suit the circuit you are on. There are four main teams you can race for.
Fastest Lap (USA).desc: 在這款遊戲中，你扮演一位想要登上頂峰的 F1 賽車手。遊戲玩法包括你進行排位賽圈數，然後在主要比賽中與對手比賽。該遊戲是從自上而下的角度進行的。您還可以調整您的汽車發動機和輪胎以適應您所在的賽道。您可以代表四支主要球隊參加比賽。

Tetris (World) (Rev 1).name: 俄羅斯方塊
Tetris (World) (Rev 1).original_desc:
This version of Tetris is one of many conversions of the famous block-stacking game, and was included with the Game Boy upon its release in several territories. The goal is to place pieces made up of four tiles in a ten-by-twenty well, organizing them into complete rows, which then disappear. As rows are cleared, the pace of the game increases and the background changes, and the game ends if the stack reaches the top of the well.

The game is very similar to Nintendo's own NES version of the game, featuring the same "Type A" endless and "Type B" set-clear modes. The game also features a 2-player versus mode that can be played with two Game Boys, two copies of Tetris, and a Game Boy link cable. Clearing lines in this mode will cause the other player's stack to rise, with the goal being to make the other player lose.
Tetris (World) (Rev 1).desc:
這個版本的俄羅斯方塊是著名的積木堆疊遊戲的眾多轉換之一，並在多個地區發佈時包含在 Game Boy 中。目標是將由四塊瓷磚組成的碎片放入十乘二十的井中，將它們組織成完整的行，然後消失。當行被清除時，遊戲的節奏會加快，背景也會發生變化，如果堆棧到達井的頂部，遊戲就會結束。

該遊戲與任天堂自己的 NES 版本遊戲非常相似，具有相同的“Type A”無盡模式和“Type B”設置清除模式。該遊戲還具有 2 人對戰模式，可以使用兩個 Game Boy、兩份俄羅斯方塊和一根 Game Boy 連接線來玩。在此模式下清除線路將導致其他玩家的籌碼增加，目標是讓其他玩家輸掉。

R-Type (USA, Europe).name: R-Type
R-Type (USA, Europe).original_desc:
R-Type is a side scrolling shoot 'em up best known for its extremely tough and strategic gameplay.  You control the R-9 spaceship as it launches a last-ditch effort to repel the evil Bydo empire.

The R-9 comes equipped as standard with a small gun which can only take down the smallest of enemies without firing several shots. By holding down the fire button, it can be loaded up so as to release a large burst of energy, eliminating all but the strongest enemies in its path. From time to time, pods will come flying in your direction. Upon being shot, they release an upgrade. The first one will invariably be the one called "The Force", which is a weapons pod that clings either to the front or the back of your ship, absorbing any enemy bullets or acting as a bumper with which you can fly head-on into them. You can also use it as an offensive weapon by firing it and pulling it back in. Mastering the Force is vital to surviving in R-Type, since it must be used both as protection against bullet clusters, as a remote controlled cannon, and in order to clear the screen from obstacles. Other upgrades give you target-seeking missiles or a bigger main gun. Different gun types, differentiated by their colour, serve different purposes. The blue one sends laser beams bouncing across the screen (good for tunnels), the red one fires straight ahead, and the yellow one follows any walls it may encounter (good for artillery emplacements).

The stages of R-Type are made in an organic style, certainly inspired by H. R. Giger's artwork for the Alien movies. When it came out, it was considered trend-setting since it broke off from the stereotypical sci-fi mould of other shoot'em'ups. In part, the levels themselves are your enemy, which is exemplified by the fourth, where spider-like creatures weave webs that cover the screen and block your path, or levels with intricate tunnel systems. Still, the levels are best handled with a combination of strategy and reflexes, without the memorisation that is required of R-Type's contemporary rival, Gradius.
R-Type (USA, Europe).desc:
R-Type 是一款橫向捲軸射擊遊戲，以其極其艱難和戰略性的遊戲玩法而聞名。你控制 R-9 宇宙飛船，它會發起最後的努力，擊退邪惡的 Bydo 帝國。

R-9 標配一門小型火砲，只能擊落最小的敵人，而無需發射數槍。通過按住開火按鈕，它可以被裝載，從而釋放出大量的能量，消滅路徑上除了最強大的敵人之外的所有敵人。有時，豆莢會朝你的方向飛來。被射擊後，他們會發布升級。第一個總是被稱為“原力”的武器吊艙，它是一個武器吊艙，可以緊貼在你的船的前部或後部，吸收任何敵人的子彈，或者充當保險槓，讓你可以正面飛向他們。你也可以通過發射它並將其拉回來將其用作進攻性武器。掌握原力對於在 R-Type 中生存至關重要，因為它必須既可以用作防禦子彈群的保護，也可以用作遙控大砲，也可以用來清除屏幕上的障礙物。其他升級為您提供目標搜尋導彈或更大的主砲。不同的槍支類型通過顏色區分，有不同的用途。藍色發射激光束在屏幕上彈跳（適合隧道），紅色發射直接向前射擊，黃色發射則沿著可能遇到的任何牆壁（適合火砲陣地）。

R-Type 的舞台採用有機風格製作，靈感當然是受到 H. R. Giger 的《異形》電影藝術作品的啟發。當它問世時，它被認為是引領潮流的，因為它打破了其他射擊遊戲的刻板科幻模式。在某種程度上，關卡本身就是你的敵人，第四個關卡就是一個例子，蜘蛛狀的生物編織著覆蓋屏幕並阻擋你的道路的網，或者帶有復雜隧道系統的關卡。儘管如此，這些關卡最好通過策略和反應的結合來處理，而不需要像 R-Type 的當代競爭對手 Gradius 那樣需要記憶。

Sword of Hope, The (USA).name: 異度神劍 (遊戲)
Sword of Hope, The (USA).original_desc:
A dragon has gained control over the king of Riccar, manipulating him into removing the Sword of Hope from a painting, releasing its curse. Summoning the dark power mammon the dragon turned the people of Riccar into trees. When Prince Theo is born, the king tries to murder him, but Theo is saved by the brave knight Pascal who flees with him  into a forest where three magicians live who conceal the king's castle underground to prevent the evil from spreading. After living in the forest for 15 years, Prince Theo is finally strong enough to try and stop the dragon, using the Sword of Hope one of the magicians had retrieved.

Sword of Hope combines Adventure and RPG elements. The prince can select commands such as "look", "open", "magic", "use" etc. to interact with  the game world, talk to NPCs or solve puzzles. When he encounters an enemy, the game switches to a turn based battle mode in which enemies have to be fought in typical console style RPG battles.
Sword of Hope, The (USA).desc:
一條龍控制了里卡國王，操縱他從畫中取出希望之劍，釋放了它的詛咒。龍召喚黑暗力量瑪蒙，將里卡的人民變成了樹木。當西奧王子出生時，國王試圖謀殺他，但西奧被勇敢的騎士帕斯卡救了，帕斯卡和他一起逃進了森林，那裡住著三個魔法師，他們將國王的城堡隱藏在地下，以防止邪惡蔓延。在森林裡生活了 15 年之後，西奧王子終於有足夠的力量嘗試使用一位魔術師取回的希望之劍來阻止巨龍。

希望之劍結合了冒險和角色扮演元素。王子可以選擇“看”、“打開”、“魔法”、“使用”等命令來與遊戲世界互動、與 NPC 交談或解決謎題。當他遇到敵人時，遊戲會切換到回合製戰鬥模式，必須在典型的主機風格角色扮演遊戲中與敵人戰鬥。

Bugs Bunny Crazy Castle 2, The (USA).name: 兔八哥瘋狂城堡2
Bugs Bunny Crazy Castle 2, The (USA).original_desc: Honey Bunny has been kidnapped by an evil witch, who has placed her inside a huge castle. Bugs must find a way through the castle to save Honey in his second Game Boy adventure. This time around Bugs must collect 8 keys in each of the 28 levels to advance. Along the way, Foghorn Leghorn, Wile E. Coyote, Yosemite Sam, and others will attempt to impede your progress.
Bugs Bunny Crazy Castle 2, The (USA).desc: 蜂蜜兔被邪惡女巫綁架，並被安置在一座巨大的城堡裡。在他的第二次 Game Boy 冒險中，巴哥斯必須找到穿過城堡的方法來拯救哈妮。這次，Bugs 必須在 28 個關卡中的每個關卡中收集 8 個鑰匙才能晉級。一路上，Foghorn Leghorn、Wile E. Coyote、Yosemite Sam 和其他人會試圖阻礙你的前進。

Contra - The Alien Wars (USA) (SGB Enhan.name: 魂斗羅:異形戰爭
Contra - The Alien Wars (USA) (SGB Enhan.original_desc:
Welcome to 2636 the year the notorious Red Falcon gets even-with an unprecedented alien onslaught orchestrated to push the Contra forces to their ultimate reaches.

Plunge through a molten massacre on a high speed voyage to the guts of the archenemy alien. Check out the side and top perspectives that engulf you in a 3-D sensation. Pick off solar slimedogs while you scale over walls swing from girders and ropes whatever it takes to defeat Red Falcon's allies. Sweat through five gut-splitting stages including the Streets of the Neo City and the Mucho Grande Badlands.

The intensity is so real that the explosions will nearly knock you off your feet. And the Boss Enemies are so gigantic, your screen can hardly hold them. You'll need to wrap both hands around artillery powerful enough to make today's weapons look like squirt guns. Tbe Contra legacy is alive and dangerous.
Contra - The Alien Wars (USA) (SGB Enhan.desc:
歡迎來到 2636 年，這一年臭名昭著的紅隼展開了報復——一場史無前例的外星人精心策劃的猛攻將魂斗羅勢力推向了極限。

在高速航行中，衝入熔岩般的屠殺，直達大敵外星人的內臟。查看讓您沉浸在 3D 感覺中的側面和頂部視角。當你翻過牆壁時，用大樑和繩索擺動，消滅太陽粘液狗，不惜一切代價擊敗紅隼的盟友。汗流浹背地闖過五個令人心碎的關卡，包括新城街道和穆喬格蘭德荒地。

其強度是如此真實，爆炸幾乎會讓你驚呆。而且頭目敵人是如此巨大，你的屏幕幾乎無法容納它們。你需要用雙手握住足夠強大的火砲，使今天的武器看起來像水槍。魂斗羅的遺產仍然存在，但也很危險。

Ninja Boy 2 (USA, Europe).name: 忍者男孩2
Ninja Boy 2 (USA, Europe).original_desc: Ninja Boy 2 is an Action game, developed and published by Culture Brain, which was released in Japan in 1991 as Super Chinese Land 2.
Ninja Boy 2 (USA, Europe).desc: 《忍者小子2》是一款動作遊戲，由Culture Brain開發並發行，於1991年在日本發行，名為《超級中華大地2》。

Gargoyle's Quest II - The Demon Darkness.key: Gargoyle's Quest II - The Demon Darkness (Japan) (Translated)
Gargoyle's Quest II - The Demon Darkness.original_name: ZZZ(notgame):Gargoyle's Quest II - The Demon Darkness
Gargoyle's Quest II - The Demon Darkness.name: ZZZ:石像鬼的任務 II - 黑暗惡魔

Castlevania - The Adventure (USA).name: 惡魔城:冒險
Castlevania - The Adventure (USA).original_desc:
A challenge you can't walk away from!

After getting his wings clipped in Castlevania and Simon's Quest, the death defying Count has risen again.

Desiring revenge even more than blood, he'll descend upon your Game Boy, with fangs glistening by the light of the silvery full moon.

To survive his maze of torture chambers and vampire crypts, you must unlock the castle's secrets by locating hearts, crystals and crosses. You must also possess the strength to master the Mystic Whip, which wards off unearthly evils like the She Worm.

So risk your neck and accept Drac's challenge. Because if you fail to destroy him now, he will rule the night forever.
Castlevania - The Adventure (USA).desc:
一個你無法逃避的挑戰！

在《惡魔城》和《西蒙的任務》中翅膀被折斷後，這位不畏死亡的伯爵再次崛起。

他對複仇的渴望甚至超過了對鮮血的渴望，他會降臨到你的遊戲機上，他的獠牙在銀色滿月的光芒下閃閃發光。

為了在充滿酷刑室和吸血鬼地穴的迷宮中生存，你必須通過找到心、水晶和十字架來解開城堡的秘密。你還必須擁有掌握神秘鞭子的力量，它可以抵禦諸如母蟲之類的超凡邪惡力量。

所以，冒著生命危險接受德拉克的挑戰吧。因為如果你現在不能消滅他，他將永遠統治黑夜。

Tennis (World).name: 網球
Tennis (World).original_desc:
Tennis is, as the name implies, Nintendo's version of the sport. One player vs computer or two players will compete in tennis in a more or less standard suite of rules (scoring, sets etc.).

Players are controlled by the movement buttons, but while button A indicates a low hit, button B indicates a high one. You have the choice of four levels of computer AI, or two player via Game Boy link cable. The usual assortment of shots are available, including forehand and backhand, lobs and volleys when up close to the net.
Tennis (World).desc:
顧名思義，網球是任天堂版的這項運動。一名球員與計算機或兩名球員將按照一套或多或少標準的規則（得分、局數等）進行網球比賽。

玩家由移動按鈕控制，按鈕 A 表示低擊，而按鈕 B 表示高擊。您可以選擇四個級別的計算機人工智能，或通過 Game Boy 連接電纜選擇兩個玩家。可以使用常見的各種擊球方式，包括正手和反手、高球和近網截擊。

Fighting Simulator 2 in 1 - Flying Warri.key: Fighting Simulator 2 in 1 - Flying Warriors (USA, Europe)
Fighting Simulator 2 in 1 - Flying Warri.name: 格鬥模擬器 - 2合1飛行戰士
Fighting Simulator 2 in 1 - Flying Warri.original_desc:
AVAILABLE FOR THE 1ST.TIME ON THE GAME BOY! 2 GAMES IN 1, THIS IS ONE OF THE MOST POWERFUL VS TOURNAMENT GAME EVER MADE! I FIGHTING SIMULATOR MODE

There are 7 different contact sport to choose from in this game pack,including Kung-fu wrestling,and boxing. Choose your favorite sport and play for the World Championship! By using the GameLink feature,you can enjoy a vs tournament with your friends. Fierce fights for the title of the strongest in the world begin now!

II FLYING WARRIORS ACTION GAME MODE

Besides a fighting simulator mode,there is a scroll action game too. Our superhero Rick,fights against a mysterious enemy, the Dark Dragon. Fight through the numerous formidable enemies and traps and get tne legendary treasure back from evil's hand.
Fighting Simulator 2 in 1 - Flying Warri.desc:
第一次在 GAME BOY 上可用！2 合 1 遊戲，這是有史以來最強大的對抗錦標賽遊戲之一！I 格鬥模擬器模式

該遊戲包中有 7 種不同的接觸運動可供選擇，包括功夫摔跤和拳擊。選擇你最喜歡的運動並參加世界錦標賽！通過使用GameLink功能，您可以與朋友一起享受vs錦標賽的樂趣。爭奪世界最強稱號的激烈戰鬥現在開始！

II 飛天戰士動作遊戲模式

除了格鬥模擬器模式外，還有捲軸動作遊戲。我們的超級英雄瑞克，與神秘的敵人黑暗之龍作戰。戰勝眾多強大的敵人和陷阱，從邪惡之手奪回傳奇寶藏。

Adventures of Star Saver, The (USA, Euro.key: Adventures of Star Saver, The (USA, Europe)
Adventures of Star Saver, The (USA, Euro.name: 拯救星人歷險記
Adventures of Star Saver, The (USA, Euro.original_desc:
On a routine check through the city, police officer Tony and his sister find themselves sucked up by a UFO and transported to a distant land. Separated from his sister, Tony is left stranded in the middle of nowhere, but luckily for him the aliens left something for him, having stolen a mech from elsewhere in the galaxy. Powerful and deadly, the mech seems to have a mind of its own, and agrees to join Tony on the quest to find his sister.

The side-scrolling shooter pits you against a host of different alien creatures across the galaxy. You'll start inside the mech itself, collecting weapon upgrades along the way to increase your chances of defeating the alien scum. But be careful, if you're hit by them, you'll lose the safety of the mech and be all by yourself.
Adventures of Star Saver, The (USA, Euro.desc:
在對城市進行例行檢查時，警官托尼和他的妹妹發現自己被不明飛行物吸到了一個遙遠的地方。托尼與妹妹失散，被困在荒無人煙的地方，但幸運的是，外星人從銀河係其他地方偷走了一台機甲，為他留下了一些東西。強大而致命的機甲似乎有自己的思想，並同意與托尼一起尋找他的妹妹。

這款橫向捲軸射擊遊戲讓你對抗銀河系中許多不同的外星生物。你將從機甲內部開始，一路收集武器升級，以增加擊敗外星敗類的機會。但要小心，如果你被它們擊中，你就會失去機甲的安全，只剩下你自己了。

Avenging Spirit (USA, Europe).name: 復仇之魂
Avenging Spirit (USA, Europe).original_desc:
In Avenging Spirit the protagonist is a spirit out for revenge. He has been murdered by a group of gangsters and his girlfriend has taken hostage by them. Her father uses his brand new machine to call the man's spirit back from the dead, telling him that they are holding his daughter ransom unless he turns over his research of ghost energy.

In side-scrolling fashion, the game features six different stages - the city, the rooftops, a factory, the city sewers and two levels dealing with the mobsters base of operation. The player is able to possess enemies, 20 in all, and use any skills or weapons they have, to complete the level. The player's health is represented by ghost energy and it is drained when he is not inside a host. The story leads to two different endings.
Avenging Spirit (USA, Europe).desc:
在《復仇之魂》中，主角是一個為複仇而奮鬥的靈魂。他被一群歹徒謀殺，他的女朋友被他們扣為人質。她的父親用他的全新機器將這個人的靈魂從死裡復活，並告訴他，除非他交出他對幽靈能量的研究，否則他們正在勒索他女兒的贖金。

以橫向捲軸的方式，遊戲有六個不同的階段——城市、屋頂、工廠、城市下水道和兩個處理黑幫行動基地的關卡。玩家能夠附身敵人（總共 20 個），並使用他們擁有的任何技能或武器來完成關卡。玩家的生命值由幽靈能量表示，當他不在宿主體內時，幽靈能量就會被耗盡。故事導致兩個不同的結局。

Frog For Whom the Bell Tolls, The (Japan.key: Frog For Whom the Bell Tolls, The (Japan) (Translated)
Frog For Whom the Bell Tolls, The (Japan.original_name: Kaeru no Tame ni Kane wa Naru
Frog For Whom the Bell Tolls, The (Japan.name: 為了改變，為了賺錢
Frog For Whom the Bell Tolls, The (Japan.original_desc:
Prince Richard and Prince Sablé have been rivals since they were young.  When news arrives of a princess in a far-off kingdom who requires rescuing, Richard dashes off in the hopes of saving her before Sablé manages to.  Left to catch up, Sablé explores the land, and soon becomes cursed, turning into a frog whenever a strange bell is heard.  Sablé must remove the curse and rescue the princess.

Kaeru No Tame Ni Kane Wa Naru is an action-adventure game.  The game plays in two modes: a top-down view (where most exploration and battle is done), and a side-scrolling view (where more puzzle solving is done than battles).  Battling is not actually performed by the player, instead it is all automatic.  If you bump into an enemy, you will see a dust cloud appear, and the pair will scuffle, with each character's health draining.  Whoever loses all their health first loses the battle.  Sablé can increase his battle advantage by collecting heart containers (to increase his life bar), and power ups that increase statistics like power and defense.

Another feature of Kaeru No Tame Ni Kane Wa Naru is Sablé's ability to transform into a frog at certain points in the game.  This allows him to access areas that he previously could not.  The main goal of the game is to conquer a huge castle, however, sections are sealed off until you complete parts of the story, allowing you to explore it in small parts at a time.
Frog For Whom the Bell Tolls, The (Japan.desc:
理查德王子和薩布萊王子從小就是競爭對手。當遙遠王國的一位公主需要營救的消息傳來時，理查德趕緊出發，希望能在薩布萊成功之前救出她。為了追趕，薩布萊探索了這片土地，很快就受到了詛咒，每當聽到奇怪的鈴聲時就會變成青蛙。薩布萊必須解除詛咒並營救公主。

《Kaeru No Tame Ni Kane Wa Naru》是一款動作冒險遊戲。遊戲有兩種模式：自上而下的視圖（大部分探索和戰鬥都在其中完成）和橫向滾動視圖（解決謎題比戰鬥更多）。戰鬥實際上並不是由玩家執行的，而是完全自動的。如果你撞到敵人，你會看到一片塵埃雲出現，兩人會扭打在一起，每個角色的生命值都會耗盡。誰先失去全部生命值，誰就輸掉了戰鬥。薩布萊可以通過收集心臟容器（以增加他的生命條）和增加能量和防禦等統計數據的能量來增加他的戰鬥優勢。

Kaeru No Tame Ni Kane Wa Naru 的另一個特點是 Sablé 能夠在遊戲中的某些時刻轉變成青蛙。這使他能夠進入以前無法進入的領域。遊戲的主要目標是征服一座巨大的城堡，但是，在您完成部分故事之前，各個部分都會被封鎖，讓您一次可以探索一小部分。

Aerostar (USA, Europe).name: 航空之星
Aerostar (USA, Europe).original_desc: Aerostar is a top-down, vertically-scrolling shooter. The player controls an aircraft, but instead of going all across the screen, it can only stay on or fly over a preset road. However, it can ascend at the cost of disabling your weapons before descending back onto either another road or the one it was on before. Like most top-down shooters, there are power-up pods which provide an array of missiles, lasers, and guardian pods. In the end of each level there are extremely tough bosses. No storyline is provided.
Aerostar (USA, Europe).desc: Aerostar 是一款自上而下、垂直滾動的射擊遊戲。玩家控制一架飛機，但它不能飛過屏幕，只能停留在預設的道路上或飛過預設的道路。然而，它可以以禁用你的武器為代價，然後下降到另一條道路或之前所在的道路上。與大多數自上而下的射擊遊戲一樣，遊戲中也有能量提升艙，可提供一系列導彈、激光和守護艙。每個關卡的最後都有非常難對付的老闆。沒有提供故事情節。

Nemesis II - The Return of the Hero (Eur.key: Nemesis II - The Return of the Hero (Europe)
Nemesis II - The Return of the Hero (Eur.original_name: Nemesis II : The Return of the Hero
Nemesis II - The Return of the Hero (Eur.name: 復仇女神II:英雄歸來
Nemesis II - The Return of the Hero (Eur.original_desc:
In the year 6664 Dr. Venom, the director of the Space Science Agency, was exiled to the planet Sard for his involvement in a failed rebellion and illegal scientific activities. One year later, he joined forces with the Bacterion invaders, escaped Sard, and took control of the space surrounding the planet Gradius. In 6666, the local government sends Colonel James Burton on the newest hyperspace fighter known as Metalion. The goal is clear: stop Dr. Venom and the Bacterion army before they conquer the planet.

Nemesis 2 (Gradius 2 in Japan) is a side-scrolling shoot-em-up. The gameplay is for the most part similar to that of Gradius. The player-controlled ship can alternate between three main weapons: Missile, Double, and Laser. Extra weapons such as various types of lasers, napalm missiles, reflex ring, and back beam can be collected as power-ups and equipped. In addition, special power-ups can be acquired, their effects ranging from slowing down enemies to turning the Metalion into an invincible drill-like machine for a brief amount of time. Boss battles are followed by optional mini-stages, which grant the player new weapons if completed successfully.
Nemesis II - The Return of the Hero (Eur.desc:
6664年，太空科學局局長毒液博士因參與失敗的叛亂和非法科學活動而被流放到薩德星球。一年後，他與細菌入侵者聯手，逃離了薩德，並控制了格拉迪烏斯行星周圍的空間。6666 年，當地政府派遣詹姆斯·伯頓上校駕駛最新的超空間戰鬥機“梅塔利翁”。目標很明確：在毒液博士和細菌軍隊征服地球之前阻止他們。

《Nemesis 2》（日本版《Gradius 2》）是一款橫向捲軸射擊遊戲。遊戲玩法在很大程度上與《Gradius》類似。玩家控制的飛船可以在三種主要武器之間切換：導彈、雙發武器和激光。額外的武器，如各種類型的激光、凝固汽油彈、反射環和後光束，可以作為能量收集和裝備。此外，還可以獲得特殊的能量提升，其效果包括減慢敵人的速度，以及在短時間內將金屬金屬變成無敵的類似鑽頭的機器。Boss 戰之後是可選的迷你階段，如果成功完成，這些階段將授予玩家新武器。

Super Mario Land 2 - 6 Golden Coins (USA.key: Super Mario Land 2 - 6 Golden Coins (USA, Europe) (Rev 2)
Super Mario Land 2 - 6 Golden Coins (USA.name: 超級馬里奧樂園 2：6 個金幣
Super Mario Land 2 - 6 Golden Coins (USA.original_desc: Second in the Game Boy's line of Mario games, this one takes the evolutionary steps that Super Mario 3 for the NES took with it's predecessors. New graphics, power-ups, challenges, and a completely original storyline. A bad version of Mario, Wario, takes over Mario's castle and locks him out using 6 golden coins. Mario must search for said coins all over Mario Land to take back his castle and go one-on-one with Wario himself.
Super Mario Land 2 - 6 Golden Coins (USA.desc: 作為 Game Boy 的馬里奧遊戲系列中的第二款，這款遊戲繼承了 NES 版《超級馬里奧 3》及其前身的進化步驟。新的圖形、能力、挑戰和完全原創的故事情節。馬里奧的壞版本瓦里奧佔領了馬里奧的城堡，並用 6 個金幣將他鎖在了門外。馬里奧必須在馬里奧樂園各處尋找所述硬幣，以奪回他的城堡並與瓦里奧本人進行一對一的戰鬥。

Kwirk - He's A-maze-ing! (USA, Europe).name: Kwirk：他太令人驚奇了！
Kwirk - He's A-maze-ing! (USA, Europe).original_desc: Kwirk is a puzzle-game, in which you have to help a tomato reach the exit of numerous levels. The path to the exit is blocked by boxes, holes and spinning doors. Boxes can be pushed aside or into holes to make them traversable and there are different types of spinning doors. In some levels, it is also possible (and necessary) to control several different characters to help the main character get to the exit. As the game progresses, levels get larger and more complicated.
Kwirk - He's A-maze-ing! (USA, Europe).desc: Kwirk 是一款益智遊戲，您必須幫助番茄到達多個關卡的出口。通往出口的道路被盒子、洞和旋轉門擋住。盒子可以被推到一邊或推入孔中以使其可以通過，並且有不同類型的旋轉門。在某些關卡中，還可以（並且有必要）控制幾個不同的角色來幫助主角到達出口。隨著遊戲的進展，關卡變得更大、更複雜。

Gremlins 2 - The New Batch (World).name: 小魔怪2：新一批
Gremlins 2 - The New Batch (World).original_desc: Gizmo is trapped inside Clamp Centre by the evil Gremlins. Your mission? Help him battle his way to the control center and rid the city forever of the Gremlin menace! It's not going to be easy. You'll have to use cunning and wits to survive with only the weapons you find inside Clamp Centre... matches, a flashlight, tomatoes, and a homemade bow and arrow. But, if you're lucky, the door to Mr. Wing's Magic Shop may mystically appear... and let you buy some very special - and powerful - items to help you. This game has all the traps, mazes, and lightning quick moves to push your skill to the limits. And it has graphics that seem to come alive on the screen. Gremlins. Stopping them is not going to be easy. Don't say we didn't warn you!
Gremlins 2 - The New Batch (World).desc: Gizmo 被邪惡的 Gremlins 困在 Clamp Center 內。你的使命？幫助他殺出一條血路，到達控制中心，讓這座城市永遠擺脫小魔怪的威脅！這並不容易。你必須運用狡猾和智慧才能生存，只使用你在夾鉗中心找到的武器……火柴、手電筒、西紅柿和自製的弓箭。但是，如果你幸運的話，翼先生魔法商店的門可能會神秘地出現……並讓你購買一些非常特殊且強大的物品來幫助你。這款遊戲擁有所有陷阱、迷宮和閃電般的快速動作，可將你的技能推向極限。它的圖形在屏幕上看起來栩栩如生。小魔怪。阻止他們並不容易。別說我們沒有警告你！

Dr. Franken (USA).name: 博士。法郎
Dr. Franken (USA).original_desc:
Franky, one of the many creations of Dr Von Frankenbone, has awoken to find his love, Bitsy, has vanished. Discovering the other evil creations of the castle has taken Bitsy and left pieces of her around the castle, Franky must find his way through the many levels and put Bitsy back together.

Franky can shoot his way past many of the evil creatures, but you must also dodge falling objects and jump over trapdoors to stay alive. Power outlets can re-charge Franky to full health, while lamps must be used to see through the dark dungeons.
Dr. Franken (USA).desc:
弗蘭基是馮·弗蘭肯伯恩博士的眾多創造物之一，他醒來後發現他的愛人比西消失了。弗蘭奇發現城堡中的其他邪惡造物已經帶走了比西，並在城堡周圍留下了她的碎片，弗蘭基必須找到穿越各個關卡的方法，將比西重新組合起來。

弗蘭奇可以射殺許多邪惡的生物，但你也必須躲避墜落的物體並跳過活板門才能生存。電源插座可以為弗蘭奇補充生命值，而必須使用燈才能看清黑暗的地牢。

Vattle Giuce (Japan).name: 瓦特爾·朱斯
Vattle Giuce (Japan).original_desc: A vertical shoot-'em-up released for the Game Boy in Japan in 1991.
Vattle Giuce (Japan).desc: 1991 年在日本為 Game Boy 發布的一款垂直射擊遊戲。

World Heroes 2 Jet (USA, Europe) (SGB En.name: 世界英雄2噴氣機
World Heroes 2 Jet (USA, Europe) (SGB En.original_desc:
World Heroes 2 JET is the third game in the World Heroes series. A third tournament featuring warriors from all over the world (and different periods in time) has begun, and it's up to you to fight to the finish to find out who is organizing it.

The game is an upgrade / fine-tuning of World Heroes 2, and contains many new features:Two new fighters, Jack and Ryofu, have been added to the game
Two all-new fighting modes have been added: "Entry to the Tournament" (story mode), and "The Forging of Warriors"
You can now dash towards or away from your opponent
If you and your enemy hit each other with an attack that has the same power, you'll freeze for a moment and push each other awayAll new stages and music have also been included."Entry to the Tournament" features you fighting several elimination rounds against three different opponents; you have to win two out of three one-round matches to move on. "The Forging of Warriors" is a training mode where you can fight against four different enemies in order to hone your skills.
World Heroes 2 Jet (USA, Europe) (SGB En.desc:
World Heroes 2 JET 是 World Heroes 系列的第三款遊戲。由來自世界各地（以及不同時期）的戰士參加的第三場錦標賽已經開始，你要奮戰到底，找出組織者。

該遊戲是《世界英雄2》的升級/微調，並包含許多新功能：遊戲中添加了兩名新戰士，傑克和Ryofu
新增兩種全新戰鬥模式：“參賽模式”（故事模式）、“武士鍛造”
你現在可以沖向或遠離你的對手
如果你和你的敵人用具有相同威力的攻擊互相擊中，你們會凍結一會兒並將對方推開。還包括所有新的階段和音樂。“進入錦標賽”的特點是你與三個不同的對手進行幾輪淘汰賽；你必須贏得三場一輪比賽中的兩場才能繼續前進。“武士鍛造”是一種訓練模式，你可以與四種不同的敵人作戰，磨練你的技能。

Donkey Kong Land (USA, Europe) (SGB Enha.name: 大金剛樂園
Donkey Kong Land (USA, Europe) (SGB Enha.original_desc:
In a modifiication of Donkey Kong Country, Donkey Kong teams up with his buddy Diddy for new adventures and gorilla antics. Facing high-flying pigs, killer bees, and reptilian Kremlings, the simian duo swings back into action on the Game Boy. 

The two Kongs each have similar abilities when compared to the SNES game.
 
This game isn't exactly a remake of DKC; for instance, there are new levels and enemies, and Candy Kong does not save your game: instead you must collect all four Kong letters.
Donkey Kong Land (USA, Europe) (SGB Enha.desc:
在《大金剛鄉村》的修改版中，大金剛與他的好友迪迪合作，進行新的冒險和大猩猩的滑稽動作。面對高空飛翔的豬、殺人蜂和爬行動物克雷姆林，這對猿猴二人組在 Game Boy 上重新投入行動。

與 SNES 遊戲相比，這兩款 Kong 的能力相似。

這款遊戲並不完全是 DKC 的重製版；它是 DKC 的重製版。例如，有新的關卡和敵人，而 Candy Kong 不會保存你的遊戲：相反，你必須收集所有四個 Kong 字母。

Donkey Kong Land III (USA, Europe) (Rev.key: Donkey Kong Land III (USA, Europe) (Rev 1) (SGB Enhanced)
Donkey Kong Land III (USA, Europe) (Rev.name: 大金剛樂園III
Donkey Kong Land III (USA, Europe) (Rev.original_desc:
DK and Diddy Kong have left in search of The Lost World after hearing of a contest to find it on the radio. This leaves Dixie stuck with minding her baby cousin Kiddy Kong. Frustrated at this, she decides to take Kiddy with her and find The Lost World before everyone else!
The level archetypes are the same as in Donkey Kong Country 3, which takes place in the "Northern Kremisphere". While the levels have the same environments and the Donkey Kong Country 3 bosses return, the worlds and stage layouts are all unique.
Donkey Kong Land III (USA, Europe) (Rev.desc:
DK 和 Diddy Kong 在廣播中聽說一場尋找失落世界的競賽后，出發去尋找失落的世界。這讓迪克西不得不照顧她的小表弟基迪·康。對此感到沮喪的她決定帶著基迪一起，搶在其他人之前找到失落的世界！
關卡原型與《大金剛國度 3》相同，故事發生在“北半球”。雖然關卡環境相同且《大金剛國度 3》的 Boss 回歸，但世界和舞台佈局都是獨一無二的。

Pokemon - Red Version (USA, Europe) (SGB.name: 神奇寶貝紅色版
Pokemon - Red Version (USA, Europe) (SGB.original_desc: You begin your journey in Pallet Town as a young boy. After a dangerous brush with wild Pokémon, Professor Oak teaches you how to capture Pokémon, and then sends you on your way as a fledgling Trainer. During your journey through Kanto, you must capture Pokémon to record their information in your Pokédex, as well as become a better Trainer by competing in Gyms scattered throughout the region. Once you've proven your mettle as a Pokémon Trainer, it's time to take on the Elite Four, a crack group of Trainers that will put all of your learned skills to the test.
Pokemon - Red Version (USA, Europe) (SGB.desc: 作為一個小男孩，你在托盤鎮開始了你的旅程。在與野生神奇寶貝發生危險的衝突之後，大木教授會教你如何捕捉神奇寶貝，然後讓你作為一名初出茅廬的訓練家踏上征程。在關東之旅中，你必須捕捉神奇寶貝，將它們的信息記錄在你的圖鑑中，並通過在遍布該地區的道館中競爭來成為一名更好的訓練家。一旦你證明了自己作為神奇寶貝訓練師的勇氣，就該挑戰精英四人組了，這是一個由精英訓練師組成的團隊，他們將考驗你所學到的所有技能。

Darkwing Duck (USA).name: 迪士尼的黑翼鴨
Darkwing Duck (USA).original_desc:
Darkwing Duck is a 2D 3rd person platform game featuring this Disney super-hero, friend of Lauchpad McQuack (the Duck Tales character who worked as a pilot for Scrooge McDuck).

As a decent super-hero, his role is to save the city from his enemies.

Graphics are cartoonish, like other Disney licenses developed by Capcom, but darker.

Gameplay is similar to Mega Man and Duck Tales, in the same jump and run style. Controls are easy to handle.
Darkwing Duck (USA).desc:
Darkwing Duck 是一款 2D 第三人稱平台遊戲，主角是這位迪士尼超級英雄，Lauchpad McQuack（《鴨子故事》中的角色，曾擔任 Scrooge McDuck 的飛行員）的朋友。

作為一個正派的超級英雄，他的職責是從敵人手中拯救城市。

與卡普空開發的其他迪士尼授權產品一樣，圖形是卡通風格的，但顏色更暗。

遊戲玩法類似於《洛克人》和《鴨子故事》，具有相同的跳躍和奔跑風格。控制裝置易於操作。

Sword of Hope II, The (USA).name: 異度神劍 (遊戲)
Sword of Hope II, The (USA).original_desc: The Sword of Hope II follows the story of Prince Theo, who, together with the young survivor Mute and other allies, sets out to confront evil. Five hundred years ago, King Winder sealed the demon Zakdos in a casket, but when a thief breaks it open, Zakdos escapes, annihilates nearly all of wizard Colin's clan, and steals the Sword of Hope, once used to seal away a dragon. Your mission is to stop Zakdos and reclaim the sword before the dragon awakens. Unlike its predecessor, you now command a party of up to three characters. The world is explored from a first-person perspective by selecting directional arrows and using commands such as “look,” “open,” or “hit” to interact with the environment, talk to NPCs, or solve puzzles. Battles are turn-based – you can attack, use items or magic, or attempt to escape.
Sword of Hope II, The (USA).desc: 《希望之劍 II》講述了西奧王子的故事，他與年輕的倖存者穆特和其他盟友一起出發對抗邪惡。五百年前，溫德王將惡魔扎克多斯封印在棺材裡，但當小偷打開棺材時，扎克多斯逃脫，消滅了巫師科林的幾乎所有氏族，並偷走了曾經用來封印巨龍的希望之劍。你的任務是阻止扎克多斯並在巨龍甦醒之前奪回寶劍。與前作不同的是，你現在可以指揮一支最多由三個角色組成的隊伍。通過選擇方向箭頭並使用“看”、“打開”或“點擊”等命令來與環境互動、與 NPC 交談或解決謎題，從第一人稱視角探索世界。戰鬥是回合製的——你可以攻擊、使用物品或魔法，或者嘗試逃跑。

Kirby's Block Ball (USA, Europe) (SGB En.name: 卡比的方塊球
Kirby's Block Ball (USA, Europe) (SGB En.original_desc: Kirby takes on a new challenge, blockball.
