The playing field contains a variety of blocks, and using Kirby's rolling technique, you must set him into motion (with paddles situated around the field of play, similar to pinball) to clear the blocks from the field. Each level contains more and more blocks to clear, and after a few rounds you take on boss characters in a one-on-one round to see if you can clear more blocks.
Kirby's Block Ball (USA, Europe) (SGB En.desc: 卡比接受了新的挑戰：方塊球。比賽場地包含各種方塊，並且使用卡比的滾動技術，您必須讓他運動（在比賽場地周圍放置槳，類似於彈球）以清除場地中的方塊。每個關卡都包含越來越多的方塊需要清除，幾輪之後，您將與頭目角色進行一對一的戰鬥，看看您是否可以清除更多的方塊。

Operation C (USA).name: 操作C
Operation C (USA).original_desc:
Operation C is a Game Boy sequel to the popular NES titles Contra and Super C and is, essentially, a side-scrolling shooter. You play a Rambo-esque character that goes around shooting everything in sight, collecting weapon upgrades and bonuses.

The game introduces the character of Black Viper to the series' oft-jumbled continuity.  Black Viper would later return in the Nintendo DS title, Contra 4, as the primary villain.  

The game features only five levels, two of which are played from an overhead perspective similar to Super C.  Operation C is also notable in featuring the upgradable Spread Gun (from three to five shots) and introducing the Hunter Gun.  

There is also the occasional platform element such as jumping puzzles, moving platforms etc., and the mandatory end-level boss.
Operation C (USA).desc:
C行動是流行的NES遊戲《魂斗羅》和《Super C》的Game Boy續作，本質上是一款橫向捲軸射擊遊戲。你扮演一個蘭博式的角色，四處射擊視線中的一切，收集武器升級和獎金。

該遊戲將黑毒蛇這一角色引入了該系列經常混亂的連續性中。黑毒蛇後來在任天堂 DS 遊戲《魂斗羅 4》中回歸，作為主要反派。

該遊戲只有五個關卡，其中兩個關卡是從類似於 Super C 的俯視視角進行的。 C 行動的另一個亮點是可升級的散佈槍（從三發到五發）並引入了獵人槍。

還有偶爾的平台元素，如跳躍謎題、移動平台等，以及強制性的最終級別老闆。

Mega Man V (USA) (SGB Enhanced).name: 洛克人 V
Mega Man V (USA) (SGB Enhanced).original_desc:
One peaceful day, Mega Man and his sister Roll are enjoying a quiet stroll through a meadow when they are suddenly attacked by a robot named Terra, who says that he and his soldiers, the StarDroids, are going to conquer the Earth! Mega Man attempts to fight off this new foe, but is quickly beaten by the StarDroid's far superior firepower.

Later, Mega Man awakens to find Dr. Light standing over him, telling him that the StarDroids have almost taken over the world. But thankfully he was quickly able to examine both their firepower and their structures, and was able to modify Mega Man's weapon system into something much more powerful. Mega Man tries this new weapon, and finds that he can now fire his whole fist! Dr. Light dubs this new weapon the "Mega Arm"!

Now, armed with the Mega Arm, and a new companion, the robotic cat Tango, Mega Man must destroy the StarDroids and save the planet while he can!
Mega Man V (USA) (SGB Enhanced).desc:
一個平靜的一天，洛克人和他的妹妹羅爾正在草地上安靜地散步，突然遭到一個名叫泰拉的機器人的攻擊，泰拉說他和他的士兵星際機器人將征服地球！洛克人試圖擊退這個新敵人，但很快就被 StarDroid 強大的火力擊敗。

後來，洛克人醒來，發現光博士站在他身邊，告訴他星際機器人幾乎已經佔領了世界。但值得慶幸的是，他很快就能夠檢查它們的火力和結構，並能夠將洛克人的武器系統修改為更強大的東西。洛克人嘗試了這種新武器，發現他現在可以用整個拳頭射擊！萊特博士將這種新武器稱為“超級手臂”！

現在，裝備了巨型手臂和新夥伴機器貓探戈，洛克人必須摧毀星際機器人並儘其所能拯救地球！

Dead Heat Scramble (USA).name: 不分勝負的爭奪
Dead Heat Scramble (USA).original_desc: Dead Heat Scramble is a relatively simple racing game. The player chooses between three cars (dune buggy, sand rail or off-road truck) and races against the clock while dodging obstacles like other cars or blockades. The ten courses, which have to be unlocked in a linear order, take place in a tube and are shown in a cross-sectional view from above. The cars can move left and right on the bend. Other than that there are also a few power-ups to collect on the way which bring advantages like a nitro boost.
Dead Heat Scramble (USA).desc: Dead Heat Scramble 是一款相對簡單的賽車遊戲。玩家在三輛汽車（沙丘越野車、沙地鐵路或越野卡車）之間進行選擇，並與時間賽跑，同時躲避其他汽車或封鎖等障礙物。必須按線性順序解鎖的十個過程在管子中進行，並以俯視剖視圖顯示。汽車可以在彎道上左右移動。除此之外，沿途還可以收集一些道具，這些道具可以帶來硝基提升等優勢。

Heiankyo Alien (USA).name: 平安京外星人
Heiankyo Alien (USA).original_desc:
1000 years ago the city of Kyo was suddenly invaded by aliens.  A Kebiishi (knight of the past) was entrusted to defend the city.

The game starts with a maze where the kebiishi and some aliens appear.  The aliens start moving through the maze wherever they please.  While trying to keep from getting eaten, the kebiishi digs holes where the aliens will likely travel.  If an alien comes to a finished hole, it will fall in an be trapped for a while.  While the alien is trapped in the hole, you can fill the hole to bury it.  If all aliens are buried, the round ends and you can proceed to the next round.  

The Game Boy version includes both the original arcade version as well as an enhanced version with new graphics and original features such as a super alien that has special powers, moves to avoid holes and chases the keibiishi. Two players can play via the video link cable.
Heiankyo Alien (USA).desc:
1000年前，京城突然遭到外星人入侵。一名軾比石（過去的騎士）被委託保衛這座城市。

遊戲從一個迷宮開始，其中出現了kebiishi和一些外星人。外星人開始在迷宮中隨心所欲地移動。在試圖避免被吃掉的同時，kebiishi 還在外星人可能會旅行的地方挖洞。如果外星人來到一個已完成的洞，它會掉進去並被困一段時間。當外星人被困在洞裡時，你可以填滿洞來埋葬它。如果所有外星人都被埋葬，則該輪結束，您可以進入下一輪。

Game Boy 版本包括原始街機版本以及具有新圖形和原始功能的增強版本，例如具有特殊能力的超級外星人、躲避漏洞的動作以及追逐怪異者。兩個玩家可以通過視頻連接線進行遊戲。

Solomon's Club (USA).name: 所羅門俱樂部
Solomon's Club (USA).original_desc:
Solomon's Club is a sequel to Solomon's Key, which has similar gameplay combining platform gaming with puzzle elements. There are five levels, each with ten rooms. In each room you must retrieve the key and go to the exit.

You can create or remove blocks to your left and right, or while crouching lower-left and lower right. You can use these blocks as platform to climb onto, or use them to block enemies or fire balls. You can also break blocks by jumping from below them, like doing a headbutt. There are several enemies, such as fire breathing dragons, shooting gargoyles and ghosts.

Collect bells to release fairies from the exit as bonus points, and collect coins for money to spend in shops. Some rooms have a shop where you can buy items, such as fire balls or hammers.
Solomon's Club (USA).desc:
《所羅門俱樂部》是《所羅門之匙》的續作，其遊戲玩法類似，將平台遊戲與解謎元素相結合。共有五層，每層有十個房間。在每個房間中，您必須取回鑰匙並前往出口。

您可以在左側和右側創建或刪除塊，或者在左下角和右下角蹲下時創建或移除塊。您可以使用這些方塊作為爬上的平台，或使用它們來阻擋敵人或火球。你還可以通過從下面跳來打破方塊，就像用頭撞一樣。有幾種敵人，例如噴火龍、射擊石像鬼和幽靈。

收集鈴鐺以從出口釋放仙女作為獎勵積分，並收集硬幣以在商店消費。部分客房設有商店，您可以購買火球或錘子等物品。

SolarStriker (World).name: 太陽前鋒
SolarStriker (World).original_desc: You are in control of the ultra high-performance fighter ship, the SolarStriker.  It is your mission to attack and destroy the main Reticulon base.  There are six vertical scrolling stages that you must progress through in order to destroy Reticulon.  Each stage is under control of a boss which must be destroyed to clear the area.  One of the first shooters for GameBoy.
SolarStriker (World).desc: Windows Vista為微軟於2006年11月所公布的一套作業系統，並於2007年1月30日正式發售。儘管微軟在美國紐約等地舉行了多場的宣傳活動為其造勢，微軟執行長史蒂夫·巴爾默親自在活動上表示：「Windows Vista就是下一代家庭互聯式娛樂的核心，它的出現是下一代家庭互聯式娛樂開始。」而微軟董事長比爾·蓋茲亦宣稱新作業系統將比以前所有計算平台都要優秀，當消費者們看到Windows Vista時，會讓他們帶來驚喜不已， 但無論是在隱私、安全、效能、翻譯以及產品啟動等各方面，Vista反而受到許多批評。

Castlevania II - Belmont's Revenge (USA,.name: 惡魔城 II : 貝爾蒙特的複仇
Castlevania II - Belmont's Revenge (USA,.original_desc: The curse of the Belmont family has struck again in the second Castlevania adventure for the Game Boy.  This game takes place 15 years after the first monochrome adventure.  Christopher's son has disappeared, and 4 mysterious castles have risen out of the fog.  He must travel to each castle and conquer the demons he finds there in order to rescue his son. Perhaps Dracula is not as dead as we thought.
Castlevania II - Belmont's Revenge (USA,.desc: 貝爾蒙特家族的詛咒在 Game Boy 的第二部惡魔城冒險中再次襲來。這款遊戲發生在第一次單色冒險 15 年後。克里斯托弗的兒子失踪了，四座神秘的城堡從迷霧中升起。他必須前往每座城堡並征服在那裡發現的惡魔才能營救他的兒子。也許德古拉並沒有我們想像的那麼死。

Dropzone (Europe).name: 空降區
Dropzone (Europe).original_desc:
Dropzone is basically a Defender variant, closely recreating the gameplay of the original Defender with its speedy scrolling and frantic gameplay.

The player controls a spaceman with a jet-pack, flying across a barren landscape whose skies are inhabited by a number of different aliens, from the simple Planter to the slowly advancing Blunder Storm or the quick, aggressive Nemesite. 

Planters and Nemesites will try to pickup the small men walking on the surface, who must then be rescued. The player has to shoot down the alien, while avoiding to hit the man. Sometimes, the aliens will carry an android, which is similar to the human but deadly. Care must be taken so as to not pick up the androids. All men must be transported to a surface base, where they are put in safety - this is the Dropzone.
Dropzone (Europe).desc:
Dropzone 基本上是 Defender 的變體，通過其快速滾動和瘋狂的遊戲玩法，緊密地重現了原始 Defender 的遊戲玩法。

玩家控制一名背著噴氣背包的太空人，飛越一片貧瘠的土地，天空中居住著許多不同的外星人，從簡單的種植者到緩慢前進的錯誤風暴或快速、侵略性的涅姆斯特。

種植園主和涅墨斯人將嘗試救起在地表行走的小矮人，然後必須將他們營救。玩家必須擊落外星人，同時避免擊中人類。有時，外星人會攜帶一個機器人，它與人類相似但致命。必須小心，不要撿起機器人。所有人員都必須被運送到安全的地面基地——這就是空降區。

Hammerin' Harry (Europe).name: 錘擊哈利
Hammerin' Harry (Europe).original_desc:
Hammerin' Harry: Ghost Building Company is the sequel to Hammerin' Harry.

This episode has Harry fighting more than just workers. He has to defeat an army of ghosts in a series of environments, including construction site, sewer, airship, jungle, and finally, the headquarters where he meets the evil ghost building machine. Rather than using his mallet, Harry can obtain a spiked ball which does more damage than the mallet. There are five stages, and each one ends with Harry fighting a boss. Upon completion of a stage, the gameplay switches from a beat-em-up to a horizontal shooter where Harry flies through the air, defeating airborne enemies and avoiding dangerous objects.
Hammerin' Harry (Europe).desc:
《錘擊哈利：幽靈建築公司》是《錘擊哈利》的續作。

在這一集中，哈利不僅與工人作戰。他必須在建築工地、下水道、飛艇、叢林等一系列環境中擊敗幽靈大軍，最後在總部遇到邪惡的幽靈建築機器。哈利可以不用木槌，而是獲得一個比木槌造成更多傷害的尖刺球。有五個階段，每個階段都以哈利與老闆戰鬥結束。完成一個階段後，遊戲玩法將從格鬥遊戲切換為水平射擊遊戲，哈利在空中飛行，擊敗空中的敵人並避開危險物體。

DragonHeart (USA, Europe).name: 龍心
DragonHeart (USA, Europe).original_desc: Dragonheart is based on the 1996 fantasy film of the same name. The player controls Bowen the dragon slayer, through eight levels fighting many dragons and encountering characters from the film, such as Gilbert, Kara and King Einon. The exploration is presented in a 1st-person-view and the battles are presented in a side-scrolling view. The player can get information about the current quest from peasants that are found in the many villages and houses throughout the game. The battles resort only to two buttons, one to attack and other to defend.
DragonHeart (USA, Europe).desc: 《龍心》改編自 1996 年的同名奇幻電影。玩家控制屠龍者鮑文，通過八個關卡，與眾多巨龍戰鬥，並遇到電影中的角色，如吉爾伯特、卡拉和艾農國王。探索以第一人稱視角呈現，戰鬥以橫向捲軸視角呈現。玩家可以從遊戲中許多村莊和房屋中發現的農民那裡獲得有關當前任務的信息。戰鬥只需要兩個按鈕，一個用於攻擊，另一個用於防禦。

Super Mario Land (World) (Rev 1).name: 超級瑪利歐3D樂園
Super Mario Land (World) (Rev 1).original_desc: Once upon a time, there was a peaceful world called Sarasaland. In this world there were 4 kingdoms named Birabuto, Muda, Easton and Chai. One day, the skies of Sarasaland were suddenly covered by a huge black cloud. From a crack in this cloud, the unknown space monster Tatanga emerged to try to conquer Sarasaland. Tatanga hypnotized the people of all the kingdoms so that he could control them in any way he liked. In this way he took over Sarasaland. Now, he wants to marry Princess Daisy of Sarasaland and make her his queen. Mario came to know of these events, and he has started on a journey to the Chai Kingdom where Princess Daisy is held captive, in order to restore peace to Sarasaland. Can Mario defeat Tatanga, release people from his interstellar hypnosis, and rescue Princess Daisy? It's all up to you and Mario's skill. Go for it Mario!
Super Mario Land (World) (Rev 1).desc: 從前，有一個和平的世界，名叫薩拉薩蘭。這個世界上有4個王國，分別是比拉布托、穆達、伊斯頓和柴。有一天，薩拉薩蘭的天空突然被一片巨大的烏雲遮蓋。從雲層的裂縫中，未知的太空怪物塔坦加出現，試圖征服薩拉薩蘭。塔坦加催眠了所有王國的人民，以便他可以以任何他喜歡的方式控制他們。就這樣他接管了薩拉薩蘭。現在，他想娶薩拉薩蘭的黛西公主並立她為王后。馬里奧得知這些事件後，開始前往黛西公主被囚禁的柴王國，以恢復薩拉薩蘭的和平。馬里奧能否擊敗塔坦加，將人們從他的星際催眠中解救出來，並拯救黛西公主呢？這一切都取決於你和馬里奧的技能。加油馬里奧！

Batman - Return of the Joker (USA, Europ.key: Batman - Return of the Joker (USA, Europe)
Batman - Return of the Joker (USA, Europ.name: 蝙蝠俠:小丑歸來
Batman - Return of the Joker (USA, Europ.original_desc: The seedy underworld is crawling with criminals. Even worse - the JOKER is back on top of 'em all! Law and order means nothing... until now! Because BATMAN is here - and the action is hotter than ever! Ear-crunching sound effects. Pulse-quickening music. Graphics that are as hot as 16-bit. And this time, BATMAN hits fast and hard. Flying, leaping, and sliding to attack! And striking at the heart of the JOKER. The CAPED CRUSADER has a totally new arsenal at his command: Batarang, Crossbow, Sonic Neutralizer. He's even got a superfueled jetpack. And even more powerful weapons at the touch of a button. BATMAN has got to use all of his power. Because this world is a very dark place, and you never know where the JOKER is hiding!
Batman - Return of the Joker (USA, Europ.desc: 骯髒的地下世界充斥著犯罪分子。更糟糕的是——小丑又回到了他們之上！法律和秩序毫無意義……直到現在！因為蝙蝠俠來了 - 而且動作比以往任何時候都更加激烈！刺耳的音效。令人心跳加速的音樂。與 16 位一樣熱門的圖形。這一次，蝙蝠俠出擊又快又狠。飛行、跳躍、滑行攻擊！並擊中小丑的核心。斗篷十字軍擁有全新的武器庫供他指揮：蝙蝠鏢、十字弓、聲波中和器。他甚至還有一個超級燃料噴氣背包。只需按一下按鈕即可獲得更強大的武器。蝙蝠俠必須使用他所有的力量。因為這個世界是一個非常黑暗的地方，你永遠不知道小丑藏在哪裡！
